You started dating in secret, while pretending to be best friends, and the two of you both keep it a secret by dating guys. Getting time alone together is surprisingly pretty easy since you spend all your time together growing up, but apparently you’ve still had trouble keeping the secret.

With this revelation, you have mixed feelings now. You had a crush on Claire since even before you grew apart, and now you’re dating her! This makes you excited, but the fact that you’re also dating a guy to keep it a secret lessens that excitement a little. The fact that your a girl now is still unfortunate, but since you now know Claire is a closet lesbian, maybe being a girl will make up for it. However, you could become a guy again, and try to find a way to swap her sexual orientation with someone else, but that could make things complicated since the people you swap with notice the swaps. Even if you don’t tell them about your powers if your mother was anything to go by. While suddenly finding themselves attracted to a different gender might not be as strange as suddenly losing your breasts to your four hear old son, it would still be complicated. So maybe you should just try being a girl for a while, and enjoy dating your crush.

The idea of exploring the outside world sounded rather exciting to you. You remember having gone outside to so many places on your own when you had been big, so what would make now any different. You didn't realize that while you may have had agency as a "big boy", a 4 year old such as yourself should not be without an adult supervisor, you didn't think about how Mommy would get worried if you were suddenly nowhere to be found in the house, how you would probably get in trouble for leaving the house without permission - and that Jesse might end up being held accountable for you doing so. Instead you just thought that it would be fun to play around outside.

And besides, you wanted to have some fun with your powers - you had already given your old life away with your swap powers, why not do something for you for a change?

You go back to your room to put on some socks and shoes, knowing that you should always wear socks and shoes outside of the house. Ready to go, you quietly close your door and walk downstairs. However as you pass by the sleeping form of your Mommy on the couch, another thing occurred to you. You could just swap some things with Mommy like before. Where as before was a somewhat unpleasant experience, this time it would be for fun. You think to yourself how maybe you could swap ages with Mommy so that she would get to have fun as a little girl again, or maybe swap genders to make yourself a girl (you also wondered what it would be like to have two fathers instead of just 1) - or maybe just swap a few certain features like hair color or something.

You think to yourself whether you would rather explore the outside world or mess around with Mommy.

While Mark had been your best friend in your former life, little 2 year old you didn't think much about the morality of your actions or how Mark would feel - all 2 year old you cared about was that you now had a way to become big again. You however wonder what you and Jesse will do to trick Mark into swapping with you, but your sister assures you that she has it all figured out.

After a few days of Jesse giving Mark the silent treatment, which were also filled with her dealing with an impatient 2 year old you, she finally gets a call from Mark. On the phone, Mark is seemingly apologizing for "going a little too fast" with her while Jesse plays along. You deal with 3 minutes of hearing Jesse and your best friend make lovey dovey talk, even though this time it was clearly much more shallow and fake (especially from Jesse's end), before she finally they finally seem to arrange something. Hanging up the phone, Jesse picks you up into her arms. "He took the bait, little bro. We are going to come over to his house with his parents being away for the night. I already told him that I would be bringing you with me since I 'have to babysit' - but as far as he knows you are just there to play or watch tv while he and I 'make some love'"

"make love" you say

"sorry... I mean I could explain all the details, but it involves cooties. Lots and Lots of cooties" she says

"EWWW! GROSS!" you whine, sticking your tongue out in disgust. Even though you remember that you would have desired nothing more than such an experience back when you had been big, your 2 year old mind find such concepts gross - and also girls were icky.

"Oh grow up, little bro" she says, ignoring the irony of the statement, "I'm not really gonna be doing that to Mark, it's just a ruse to catch him off guard so that you can swap anything you like with him"

...

Jesse unstraps you from the baby seat, carrying you out of the car towards Mark's house. You couldn't help but feel really small as she does this, and the car ride didn't help either. You thought to yourself how you couldn't wait to be big again as Jesse rings the doorbell, with Mark almost immediately opening the door.

"Come on in, babe" Mark greets Jesse, who forces a clearly fake smile on her face. "And you must be the little brat Jez has to watch over" he adds as he ruffles your hair. Mark's rude behavior makes you almost forget that he had been your best friend; he really has it coming to him now as far as your were concerned.

Jesse sets you down on the floor by the tv, whispering you the words "you know what to do" as she does so. Mark doesn't waste any time approaching Jesse and grabbing her hand. "Well, we better start cooking babe" he says, pulling on your sister's arm towards the stairs.

"wrong way, the kitchen is over there" you say innocently. That was not what you were supposed to say, but you were confused as to why he was not heading to the kitchen if he had wanted to cook. Mark laughs at you, you sit there confused.

"how funny, anyway Jez, I'm getting really hungry and I can'y wait to get myself a little taste if you know what I mean" Mark says. Again you are confused

"Only if I get to taste the flavor of you know what" Jesse plays along, pointing at Mark's crotch - Mark clearly starts to look very amused. You are confused as to why those two are talking so much about food if they aren't even heading to the kitchen but you then remember something.

"Big sis, don't go. I don't wanna play along" you say, making sure to look as innocent as possible. For whatever reason, Mark started to look a little agitated.

"How about we just hang out a bit down here before we get to business" Jesse says. She then leans in closer and whispers into Mark's ear "after all, we wouldn't want my baby brother to start screaming, waking up the entire neighborhood so that someone will catch us in the act, do we?". You don't hear what these words, but you do know whatever your sister had said to Mark, he all of a sudden seems less frustrated with you.

"well if you say so" is all Mark says as he heads towards the couch behind you, still holding onto Jesse's hand. Once the two were seated, Jesse suggests watching some tv - while assuring Mark that they can "have some fun" once you start to get a little drowsy. The plan however is not for you to fall asleep, instead to simply pretend to be an innocent little boy while Jesse has Mark watch TV with them until the next phase of her masterplan.

After an episode of Spongebob, which Jesse clearly puts on for you, Mark starts commenting on you, how you seem to carefree.

"Well he is only 2 after all" Jesse remarks, only to wink at you. Now 2 year old you doesn't understand what winking is supposed to indicate, but you guess that she must be proceeding with the next part of the plan.

"Hey Jez, ever thought about how stressful school is" Mark asks. Jez shakes her head no and asks Mark what he means, pretending to do so out of curiosity.

"Well all the school ever does is throw a bunch of random homeworks at us and then expects us to do it all on time while also piling a bunch of pointless tests at our feet. And meanwhile my folks are always getting at me on how I need to take school more seriously." he explains. You don't understand a thing he is saying. "well you know what," he adds, "I say they aren't taking us seriously."

"Oh really?" Jesse remarks

"I mean we are young Jez. All I wanna do is have fun in my life. Don't you want to too?" he says. Jesse nods as to play along with his little rant.

"Meanwhile my baby brat brother in kindergarten gets to do nothing except eat sleep and play. Wouldn't it be good if you could, oh I don't know, being as carefree as that again Jez?"

"So.. would you say you want a life as carefree as say..." Jesse says before pointing at you, "my baby brother?". She looks at you almost as though she is telling you to get ready.

"I mean sure, why not" Mark says. Jesse then sports the most evil grin you have ever seen.

"perfect" she says as changes start happening between you and Mark.

Mark starts shouting a bunch of weird words you never heard of before -except from Mommy and Daddy whenever they are having a fight - as she starts shrinking, his clothes changing with him as well. As the teenage boy who was trying to bang you sister continued to regressed, he stopped cursing and started to show signs of mental regression. You on the other hand were very clearly not only getting older but all the knowledge you had lost was flooding back into your brain. You also feel your diaper change into plain underwear, clearly a sign that you were becoming 100% potty trained again.

Once the swap was over, with Mark left as a confused 2 year old boy on the couch, you stood up and observed yourself. You look for the nearest reflection you could find, being satisfied with a close by window in which you see your old 16 year old self reflecting back at you again. After being stuck as a little kid for who knows how long, you were back to your old self. You were soon interrupted from your gaze by Jesse who had decided to jump onto you, giving you a tight hug.

"We did it bro" she says, pointing at the now baby Mark, who was still confused as to what was going on. You push her back a bit. "Oh I see" Jesse remarks, "no hard feelings about leaving you trapped as a baby, right bro?" she is clearly trying to win you over with soft talk. You were still mad at your sister for having not only left you as a baby beforehand but also trying to make you think that you had never been a teenager. At the same time however you still loved your baby sister - even if she would have appeared to be your twin sister to everyone else.

"No hard feelings, sis" you say before giving your sister a tight hug, which she returns. However you politely break the hug soon after as you just thought something.

"I did only swap potty training, age and intelligence with Mark, right?" you ask your sister - " or did 2 year old me inadvertently swap something else with him?"

" Me wanna big boy." he demanded.

" No, me wanna be big."

The bed was only one step up from a crib. There was a changing table and diapering supplies in one of the corners.

Mark started to cry again. Jesse rolled the crying toddler outside. She pushed the stroller down the street and around the block. Bystanders took notice, but didn't see anything wrong. Soon time and the rhythm of the stroller's movement quieted Mark.

" Listen Mark, the only way to become big again is the usual way. But if you want to make a fuss then I'll see to it that not only won't you get older you will become younger then you are now. So young that you won't be able to walk or talk. I could also make you grow up a girl. Do you want that?"

Mark didn't know what had happened. He didn't know but Jesse couldn't make good on her threat. Besides he couldn't think very well as in all respects he was only 2 years old. "guess I'll stay here till then" you changed your mind. Your sister set herself on the couch spot on your left, the toddler-fied Mark still in her arms. She looks at you, "could you be a dear and look after Marky for a bit, dear brother", placing the little Mark, still sucking on his pacifier, into your arms. You were gonna tell your sister, Jesse, that she did not wait for an answer, but Jesse gave you this cutesy, puppy-dog eyed face. It was very similar to the face she would make when she had been your little sister and wanted something, you had never been able to resist that face. And you couldn't resist this one either, instead sitting idly on the couch with the toddler sitting on your lap while your sister got up to get some water. "She's like my age now and yet some things still haven't changed" you think.

Taking a look at the toddler-fied version of your former best friend in your arms, you couldn't help but feel some slight guilt about helping your sister's revenge on Mark. You yourself had been tricked by Jesse into becoming a 2 year old boy, body and mind, and now Mark was doomed to what had been your fate. Even though you knew that there would have likely not been another opportunity to get back your proper age, intellect, and life, having Mark as some sacrificial lamb seemed kind of cruel. Though the more you thought, the more you "reasoned" that this was his fault anyway, "in all fairness, Mark did try to hurt my sister - and hooked up with her in the first place". Even after what Jesse did to you, she was still your sister, and even if she could no longer be called your little sister you were nevertheless just as protective of her as a teenage girl as when she has been only 4. And Mark had always been very pushy with his past girlfriends anyway. If anything, all was now right with the world, that's what you thought at least as your sister placed a gently peck on the check when she returned.

Eventually Mark's mother returned to the house, thanking Jesse and you several times for watching over her son, who had fallen asleep on the couch. "I'll go tuck him in, you two can go home now. Have a good night" she had said picking up the little Mark. Out the door you headed towards the car, you were glad that you weren't going to have to ride in a booster seat this time. You were going to open the door to the driver's seat when you had remembered one thing you forgot. "I'm still driving" your sister's sly remark meant that you would be driving shotgun tonight. Jesse drove the car out of Mark's neighborhood, you asked her if she would ever let you do the driving sometime. "You know, even though you got your age back, my memories of this new reality very clearly remember Mom once saying how I was the first twin out, so technically speaking I am still your big sister, aren't I". That answered your question you guessed.

Your sister shrugged her shoulders, her hands still on the wheel, "I mean I'm not the one with the swapping powers. And I want to make clear that I have no intention of becoming little again so you're just gonna have to get used to having a twin sister from now on", she said the 2nd sentence in a playfully teasing tone.

"Shame, you were such a cute little girl when you were 4" you remarked, a grin on your face

"are you saying I'm not cute anymore?"

"well, actually" You take a look at your sister before you admit: "I think you're drop-dead gorgeous now. Maybe if we weren't siblings, I'd definitely considering dating you"

"I think I need some time before I go back to boys"

"Mark was always too pushy with the girls". Jesse starts chuckling, and soon your join in. "I could get used to this" you thought

As the car continues down the highway, does something pop in your head?

11511111111222114221232321121.content:
“Hey, uh Jess. I was wondering...” You started.

“Wondering what?” Jesse asked.

“How about we swap genders for now?” You suggested.

“Wait, what?” She looked at you, before quickly looking back at the road. “Why? You want to be a girl?”

“Not forever. I was just curious about what it’s like to be a girl, so I wanted to try it for a while, and I thought maybe you might want to try being a guy for a bit.” You replied.

“Aren’t you worried I might not want to swap back with you?” Jesse asked. “You’d be stuck as a girl.”

“Not really. Even if you decide not to swap back with me, I’m sure I could find a guy to swap with.” You stated.

“Are you sure?” Jesse asked again.

“Yeah, like I said, it would just be for a while.” You said. “Plus, you said you need time before you go back to boys. If you were one yourself, you wouldn’t have to worry about guys hitting on you or anything.”

“Yeah, instead YOU would be dealing with that.” Jesse giggled.

“I can handle it. I don’t plan on getting a boyfriend.” You chuckled. “I may be curious about being a girl, but not about dating guys. I’d rather be a lesbian than that.”

“Yeah, but even if we swap genders, there’s no guarantee your sexuality wouldn’t change too. After all, reality changes with each swap, so if you became a girl, reality will change so you were born a girl. Which means, you would’ve grown up as a girl, so you might end up liking guys anyway.” Jesse theorized.

“Maybe, but there are plenty of lesbians out there who grew up as girls, so my sexuality might not change.” You guessed.

“You never know, what if other people have the same swapping power as you. All the lesbians in the world could’ve become lesbians by having their sexuality swapped with guys.” Jesse joked.

“That...is a weird thought.” You said, thinking about it. “If I’m NOT the only one with this power, then that just raises so many questions.”

“Yeah, no kidding.” Jesse agreed. “So many people could’ve had their traits swapped and we never even knew. Hell, if someone has a trait swapping power that doesn’t require permission, even WE could’ve had our traits swapped and just never knew.”

“Okay, my brain’s gonna fry itself if we keep talking about this, it’s way too confusing.”

Jesse giggled again. “Well, if you have a trait swapping power, you can’t help but wonder if anyone else does too. Or if there are other powers people have.”

“Except that I never even considered it until you brought it up.” You glared at her.

“Heh, sorry about that.” She giggled again. “Just think, if someone has a different power than you, that would qualify as a trait right? Which means you could even swap powers with someone, but that would mean you’d lose your swapping power, but you might gain a cool new one in exchange.”

“Hey wait, we got way off subject here. You never answered my question.” You said. “Do you want to swap genders or not?”

“Maybe, but maybe I’ll just swap sexuality with you so I’d get a girlfriend instead of a boyfriend.” Jesse responded.

“If you want a girlfriend then just get one. I’m not swapping sexuality with you. I don’t wanna be gay.”

“Why not? What’s wrong with being gay?” Jesse asked.

“Nothing, but that doesn’t mean I want to be. If I’m gonna be gay, it’s gonna be as a girl. I want to stay attracted to girls, not guys.”

“What if I let you swap anything you want with me after you try being gay for a month and get a boyfriend?” Jesse suggested.

“Anything? Like what? We’re the same age now, so I don’t need that, or intelligence.” You scoffed at the idea.

“Like ANYTHING. Gender, name, clothes, possessions, or anything.” Jesse said.

“Hmm. If I say no to this deal, will you swap gender with me?” You asked.

“Sure. Being a guy might be fun. But if I can be a lesbian, even if only for a while, that would be fun too.”

“Okay then, let’s swap...”

Love you
- David Ferron

Jesse, currently your older twin brother, took a quick peak at your phone before setting his eyes back on the road. He gave you a little "told you so". You let out a somewhat nervous chuckle.

David Ferron was one of the players of the highschool football team, and by extension one of the more popular guys among the girls at school. Just from observation, he seemed pretty chill and cool; you could see why girls would want to be his girlfriend. You just never pictured yourself as the lucky girl...

GIVE IT BACK!!!!" you say loudly, immediately realizing that not only had you become very sensitive and protective of your social life like a normal girl but that your now twin brother had only one hand on the wheel, "AND YOU'RE SUPPOSED TO BE KEEPING YOUR EYES ON THE ROAD ANYWAY!"

"Relax, 'little sister'" you still didn't exactly like Jesse teasing you as some "younger sibling" when you two were born by minutes in this new reality - and it felt rather surreal to be called the "little sister" when not to long ago Jesse had been your little sister before becoming your twin brother, older than you by a few minutes. "and stop calling me little sister" you whine

...

You stand still, watching your brother drive off back home. You turn around, the house of your "boyfriend" in view. You want to run away, but you also know that home is like miles and miles away and it's already very late. Breathing heavily, you begin telling yourself "ok Jason - I mean Jane..." you let out another deep breathe, "ok Jane, there's no really going back right now. Just get this over with and maybe you can swap back when you get home". Hesitantly stepping towards the door, you shyly pressed your finger against the door bell. Within several seconds, the door opens.

"Hi, good looking" David Ferron, wearing a plain black t-shirt that allowed his muscular build to show off, greeted you. You stood still, a little shocked at being on the receiving end of such flirting. "Something wrong, babe" he asks with concern. You snap back to reality.

"No,no. I'm fine" you nervously say, letting yourself in the house

David suggests watching a movie for the night. You choose some random horror film (you were never into horror movies yourself, but you think of it as a girl thing to watch s horror film with company - whether that be other girl friends or boyfriends....). You sit against David on the couch as the two of you watch the horror film. "Oh, ok." you say. Now that you thought about it you are getting a little hungry.

Jesse turns her back to you, but then her head turns back to you. "Ok, hold on, it will be easier to bring you back to ground this way" Jesse says, motioning you to climb onto her back. You obey, climbing onto your sister's back, wrapping your tiny arms around her neck the best you could while the back of her arms providing a little support for your little bottom. Before long you were riding on your sister's back through the waters, getting closer back to the sandy beach. Once the two of you were back in shallow waters, your sister let you go, now that you could just walk yourself and follow your sister's lead towards where she had set up y'all's spot.

"I brought some cash with me so that we can eat something from here, what do you feel like eating?" Jesse says as she grabs some money out of the bag.

"I wanna cheeseburger" you say

"Then off we go" your sister says, pointing to the nearest place that you assume was where Jesse was going to get you a cheeseburger. You followed your sister's lead, and when you caught up to her you got to hold her hand as the two of you walked to the lunch hut.

Jesse got the two of you cheeseburgers and soda, her's being bigger than your's though. While you wanted to whine about your sister getting a bigger burger than you, not realizing the difference between y'all's stomach sizes, you found that the smaller burger and fries were filling enough for your little tummy. And the soda was still just as refreshing as any other soda.

Once the two of you were done eating, you ask your sister if you can go back in the water to play. "Let's wait a bit Jay Jay, I've heard that if you get into water to soon after eating a meal you get cramps"

"What are cramps?" you ask

"cramps are basically painful feelings where you feel like your insides are being squeezed together" she answers. This answer scares you

"I don't wanna have my insides squeezed so tight" you whine, clinging onto Jesse's legs.

"Don't worry, Jay Jay, we just have to wait a bit before re-entering the water so that we don't get any cramps". As she heads back to the spot, she lets you stay riding on her leg until you two arrive back at y'all's spot. "How about we make some sand castles" Jesse suggests. You nod.

You try to make sand castles with the sand, but for some reason no matter how hard you try the sand castles you built keep collapsing easily. "Why... won't it stay together" you whine, about to tear up.

"The sand's too dry here Jay Jay, it needs a little bit of water, how about we get a little closer to the ocean" Jesse explains

"you said we would get cramps if we did"

"Only if we get deep into the water and besides soon we will be able to re-enter the water without getting cramps anyway" Jesse explains further. You nod at your sister. You grab the sand castle building shovels and bucket, running towards the the waves as your sister follows you from behind.

"Is this a good spot" you ask your sister, standing close enough to the water to be standing on wet sand but not to close as for the waves to destroy any sand castles. Your sister nods. The two of you sit down and start building sand castles, these staying put together unlike the other sand castles back there.

You want to suggest to your sister that you two try to make a "sand kingdom" with a city and everything, but then you see several guys approach Jesse. You kind of recognize them as being your old friends, David and Mark, from back when you were big and at high school rather than pre-K. They seem to be very friendly with Jesse as the two of them talk with her - a little too friendly.... And for some reason Jesse seems to be enjoying their attention a little too much for your liking. She even seems to be blushing a little, this made you think back to what boys and girls at high school would do - this disturbed you as you started to get an idea of what your former friends and Jesse were thinking about...

Not wanting this to go any further you decide to -
1151111111122211422131211.title: No - I wanna stay the little brother

11511111111222114221312111.content: What do you try to swap with one of them to disrupt the flirting?
11511111111222114221312111.title: swap with either David or Mark to disrupt the f...

choices: Swap ages + families with Mark or David
Tell Jesse your new feelings for her
115111111112221142213121112.content:
Jesse tells you and the two former friends of yours that she has to use the restroom real quick. As she walks off, Mark and David shift their attention towards you.

"Lucky you have such a hot big sister, little fellah" David says to you

"You can say that again" Mark remarks

"What are you talking about" you say defensively, you know not what they want with your sister

"it's a grown up thing, squirt, you wouldn't understand" Mark replies

"well I wish I could understand like you two" you say

"Yeah, we wish" David and Mark say in unison. Although they were being sarcastic, you saw the opportunity to swap amd took it.

When Jesse had returned, neither Mark or David flirted with Jesse any further. Instead they chat with Jesse like any other good pair of friends.

You can now sit peacefully and finish your sand castle.
You look back at your big sister, but something strange happens. Something inside you feels funny. You take note of Jesse's looks, and while you always thought she looked pretty, now you feel rather attracted to her. You don't like these strange feelings, as your stomach starts to feel as though it has butterflies, so you shift your attention back to the sand castle. But instead of bringing yourself to finish up the sand castle, you daydream about marrying Jesse...

You look back at Jesse, Mark and David, now feeling envious of the latter two. You wish you didn't have to be related to Jesse now that you have these feelings for her and they get to be so close to her and marry her if possible. Although you wanted to stay a little boy, now you wouldn't mind trading placed with either Mark or David in order to get closer to your hit big sister.
Or you could just tell your sister about your new feelings....
115111111112221142213121112.title: Feelings towards Jesse

choices: Big Sister Jesse  returns and comes to the rescue
You trick Mark into swapping height or physical places
115111111112221142213121113.content:
Before long your former High School friends set themselves down on the sand, very close to you and your big sister - especially close to your big sister. You tried to focus on making your sand castle, but in the background remained David and Mark's advances on Jesse, and you were not too keen on how much Jesse seemed to be enjoying it. Even though you were now the 4 year old sibling, some part of you remained very protective of your now 'grown up' big sister.

You were almost done with the sand castle when your sister told you to stay at this spot for a bit "David and I are gonna get some more refreshments for all of us, so Mark will keep an eye on you while I am gone, ok?" you nod nervously. It wasn't before long that you noticed that Mark didn't seem to happy, quite the opposite in fact - soon he became annoyed at you noticing.

"What are you looking at brat?" he remarks rudely at you.

"You're not being nice" you remark.

"who are you to judge, squirt" Mark flicks his finger at your face. It hurt only a little luckily.

"Stop being a meany" you say. He went back to finishing up your sand castle.

All of a sudden a big hand knocks down the sand castle. You were in shock.

"Stupid thing anyway" Mark coldly remarks

Your eyes begin watering. You worked really hard in that sand castle. "Why... you.. didn't have... to" you say in between the tears

"Yes I did. Serves you and your sister right for being such brats" Mark proclaims before pushing you to the ground. You try to get up, but Mark shoves his hand onto your chest. You wiggle yourself, trying to escape, but Mark is pressing his big hand hard against you. You can't get up, being pressed against the ground, and it is a little harder to breath with the giant hand on you. All you can see is the big shadowy figure of Mark against the bright sun, staring down at you. Never in your life have you been dreadfully still. "Don't worry..." he says, his voice projecting am opposite meaning, "I'll build you another sand castle". With that he starts liking sand on top of you, his hand still pushing yoi against the ground, continuously piling samd on top of your tiny body, covering your legs, arms, and soon your belly. Only your head is not being covered in sand so far. His hand is no longer pushing on you but you still can't move. Mark keeps piling more and more sand on you, making the sand on top of you heavier and heavier.

You try to scream, but Mark covers your mouth. "We are not done yet." Mark scolds you. "Now Shut up or I will bury your head".

You were helpless, you had no idea what to do. You wanted nothing more than for Jesse to come and rescue you. If only you somehow swap something important with Mark. Maybe his height, so that you would be big enough to stand up to the bully (until he was dealt with, then you could return to being your small self). Though you thought you could also try swapping places with Mark, as in him being trapped under the sand and you free to get away from the bully. The only trouble was getting him to allow the swap, tricking him perhaps.
115111111112221142213121113.title: Mark and David stick around

choices: one week later - first day of pre-K
1151111111122211422131211131.content:
Mark's threats evades your sense, you are too busy panicking, your cries for your sister muffled by Mark's hand. Mark grows ever so annoyed with you, proceeding to hover to shovel of sand over your face, ready to pour onto you.

WHAM

Mark is knocked down on the sandy ground, and now you see the form of your sister above you, digging your body out of the sand pile. Freed at last from the sand, you are both overjoyed and very upset. "I WANT MY MOMMY!!!!!" you scream. Jesse picks you up into your arms, holding you tightly close to under her face. She caresses your head gently, bouncing you lightly.

"What happened?" you hear another voice close to Jesse. It sounded like David's voice.

You immediately point at Mark, whose was trying to get back on his feet. "He destroyed my sand castle and tried to bury me under the sand!!!!!" you cry. At once, Jesse placed you in David's arms. You looked back, watching Jesse storm towards the still recovering Mark. You have no idea what is about to happen. All you know is that you watch your sister slap Mark so hard that the sound of the impact scared you enough to cower into David's chest.

You also hear your sister screaming at Mark.

"WHAT THE FUCK WERE YOU THINKING!!!!"

You hear another loud slap.

"NOBODY MESSES WITH MY LITTLE BROTHER AND GETS AWAY WITH IT!"

You hear yet another loud slap. Curious, you look back. Mark is standing up again, but he looks worn out, standing weakly before the ferocious Jesse.

"Get out of my sight" Jesse says, the tone of her voice alone enough to make Mark run off.

It does not take long for Jesse to speed right back towards David, taking you back into her arms, hugging your tightly as you cry in your sister's embrace.

"it's ok, it's ok. I'm here" Jesse says to you softly. It takes a long time for you to calm down, Mark had scared you real bad. You were also in shock by how Mark could do such a thing to you. It did not occur to you at the moment that Mark does not remember being your friend at high school, but it also never registered to you even back when you were older that Mark would have such a dark side, even if he was always a little too hard on his girlfriends. David on the other hand, seems to be much more friendly with you;.

"I'm sorry this happened" David remarks

Jesse shakes her head. "It wasn't your fault" she tells David as she continues to console you. Once your tears start slowing down, you are able to utter a word :"he destroyed my sand castle"

Jesse laughs, but not as gleefully as before "We can build another one. Would you like that?" You nod slowly.

"How about I help too little buddy" David comments, rubbing his hand in your hair, which wipes off a lot of the sand that got stuck in your hair. You nod slowly.

Jesse helps you build another foundation for the new sand castle, while David helps fill the buckets with sand for you to use. The fear and shock you had before fades away the more you build the new sand castle. David and Jesse continue to help you build the best sand castle possible while chatting to each other. You barely paid any attention to their discussions save for one exchange.

"Come to think of it, Mark probably isn't going to want to give me a ride home anymore"

"That's okay, you can hitch a ride with me if you'd like"

"I think I would like that indeed"

Hours later, after having built a bigger sand castle than the other one and playing with both Jesse and David in the water for a bit, Jesse tells you that it was time to go home. Satisfied with your day at the beach, you happily follow Jesse's lead, David walking with closeby Jesse. David takes a seat in the front as Jesse buckles you up in your car seat. On the car ride home, Jesse has some old tunes play on the radio for you to listen to. You hear David and Jesse talk between eachother as Jesse drives though you don't pay much attention to what they are talking about. All you know is that after at least an hour, Jesse drops David off at home - though you do notice that it took long for them to say goodbye.

It was several minutes of more driving before Jesse speaks again.

"Hey Jay Jay"

"Yez???"

"Did you like spending time with David?"

"He was my friend from back when I was older" you reply

"I know, but I meant at the beach"

"Yez, I guess so"

"Well, would you be cool with David being around more often?"

"I guez why not" you reply. "Why do you ask?"

"Nothing nothing" Jesse remarks, though when you see part of her reflection in the mirror above you thought your saw her cheeks redden a little.

"You aren't sick, Jesse, are you" you ask innocently, not understanding why the cheeks were red

"What, no no... well maybe... just not the bad kind of sick" Jesse remarks

"What do you mean? Mommy never said anything about a good kind of sick" you say confused

"Nevermind. You'll understand when you're older, it's another grown up thing"

Your sister's confusing words and burning cheeks aside, you honestly don't think you ever want to grow up again. You aren't even sure why anyone would want to grow up, isn't it a lot more fun to be a kid?
1151111111122211422131211131.title: Big Sister Jesse  returns and comes to the rescue

choices: Jesse isn't sure what to believe
115111111112221142213122.content:
" I wanna build sand castles," Jason announced to Jesse.

" Okay, go right ahead."

Jason headed towards the shoreline.

" Where you going?" ask Jesse.

" I need water for the castle. It won't stick without it."

Closer to the water, with Jesse right behind. When they got close enough, Jason plopped himself down on the sand and started building. Jesse kept it on him to make sure he didn't get into any trouble.

A little girl who is sitting close by came over and asked Jason if she could help. Soon they're playing together building castles. The girl's mother and Jesse started to talk.

A while later, Jesse told Jason, " Come on I have to go to the bathroom."

"Awe let them play, I'll watch him while you go," said the girl's mother.

While Jesse was away, Jason said to the little girl, " Bonnie I have a power."

Bonnie asked, " You do?"

" Yeah I can swap things between people."

" What does that mean?"

" I told you, I can swap things." Jason try to explain but it was hard for him. Finally, he said, " I'll just have to show you. Let's swap clothes."

" Clothes? Do you want me to take off my bathing suit and give it to you? That's not magic!"

" No, just agree to the swap and I'll have all your clothes."

" I don't believe you."

" Then swap with me and you'll see."

" Okay," Bonnie agreed.

After the swap took place, Bonnie was in Jason's blue and white swim trunks without any top. Jason was wearing Bonnie's teal one piece girls skirted swimsuit.

https://www.hannaandersson.com/girls-clo...

Bonnie ran to her mother shouting, " I'm wearing JJ's clothes."

" What are you talking about?" Bonnie's mother asked. She could not tell that anything was wrong. As far as Bonnie's mother knew, Bonnie had always worn boys clothing.

By the time Jesse had returned, Bonnie's mother had had enough. " I'm sorry, but we have to go," Bonnie's mother informed Jesse. She then yanked Bonnie by the arm and pulled her towards the car.

" What happened?" Jesse asked.

Jason wearing a girl swimsuit said, "I donno."

" Whatever, are you done building your castle?"

" No, there is more to do."

Jason didn't tell Jesse what he had done until the ride home.

Out of the blue, Jason said, " Jesse I swapped clothes with Bonnie."

What happens next?

you somehow meet with Bonnie again and swap back / or swap more things with her
1151111111122211422131222.content:
Jesse slammed the brakes on the car. "What?" she said loudly, scaring you a little.

The car behind had slammed its brakes too just in time. Jesse seemed to notice, bitterly uttering strange words before driving again. "We will talk about this when I find somewhere to park", the tone of Jesse's voice scared you a little.

Jesse found a gas station not long after, parking the car before turning back to face you. "Why did you do it?" Jesse asks

you stay silent, not sure how to respond

"Answer me" Jesse says, now seeming irritated.

"Because..... Bonnie seemed friendly... and I wanted to show her my powers"

"And you decided to do this while I was away in the restroom? And left Bonnie stuck with the swap? How could you do something so stupid" Jesse yelled.

You start tearing up, "I'm sorry..." you cry, "I thought it would be fun".
Seeing that you are crying and very scared, Jesse takes a few seconds to calm down before continuing, "I didn't mean to scare you, Jay Jay. Just if you are going to be living as my little brother, then you can't just go swapping with random people without my supervision"

"But these are my powers, not your's. I was fine without supervision before yesterday, why can't I use my powers as I like?" you whine

"That was different, back then you were bigger and older. But you yourself agreed to be my baby brother and to swap our 'smartness', so you have the mind of a little boy not a grown up. You don't know any better anymore" Jesse responds.

"That's not fair" you whine

"Yes it is" Jesse says. She exits the car, opening the car door next to you. She bends down a little to be face to face with you. "Look, let's make a little deal. As my little brother, you can use your swap powers on anyone for anything as long as I am with you and with my approval - and I will be very lenient on what you get to swap"

"Lin-y-ant?" you say, confused as yet another word you know you had heard a while back

"'lenient', basically I will be mostly ok with what you want to use your swap powers for. Does that sound fair?" Jesse explains, lifting her picking up close to you, "Pinky promise?".

You had calmed down a little by then even if your cheeks were still a little wet from the tears, so you lift up your pinky, locking it with Jesse's pinky.

"Good, then it's settled" Jesse says. She then unbuckles you from the booster seat and lifts you up into her arms. "How have some cash with me so how about we get ourselves a little snack, like an ice cream bar, while we are here, would you like that" Jesse asks you with a soft tone. You nod while you wipe the remaining tears from your eyes. Jesse smiles at you, "I'm sorry for scaring you earlier, I just want to let you know that I was only angry because I love you", kissing you on the forehead. You are a little confused as to how angry relates to love, but you figure that Mommy says a lot of the same kinds of things to you too whenever you get scared from doing something bad.

Next, as the two of you enter the gas station store -
1151111111122211422131222.title: Jesse believes Jason

11511111111222114221312221.content:
You and Jesse sat outside while you ate your ice cream. Jesse couldn't drive while eating and she was worried that you would make a mess if you ate in the car.

Jesse looked at you. She didn't say anything wrong with the way you were dressed. Over your one-piece bathing suit, you were wearing a Disney princess cover up dress and pink flip-flops. She could also see the little stud earrings in your ears.

She thought to herself, " Everything looks perfectly normal to her.". Jesse remembered wearing similar things when she was your age. Of course, that was only a day ago. Why shouldn't you be wearing what she had since you were now her age. It was only because you had told her that you had swapped with Bonnie that she had any inkling that you were strangely dressed.

" You really swapped clothing with Bonnie?"

You didn't like being yelled at by Jesse. You also loved your big sister and wanted to be just like her. These were the clothes that she wore at your age and you wanted to wear them too.

" No, I was just trying to fool you."

Jesse was relieved. She let out her breath and said, " Please, don't try and fool me like that again. It's very important that you let me know every time you use your power. Promise me you won't ever use your power without telling me first."

You agreed with Jesse. But she couldn't see that you had cross your fingers while making the promise.

You hold your sister's hands with one hand, the other hand holding the fudge popsicle you happily consume. You look up to your sister Jesse, she is savoring her fruit bar. The two of you are outside gas station store but still in the shade, when you look back you see the reflection of the two of you (from behind) in the windows. Memories flood your head, back when you were big and Jesse was small you would sometimes walk Jesse over to the Ice cream truck whenever it came by the neighborhood or park. She always preferred the fruity flavor ice creams while you got yourself anything that was chocolate related. The two of you would stand by the house outside, you the big brother holding your then little sister's hands as the two of you savored y'all's respective treats. In the reflection before you however, the positions had been reversed, Jesse was the big sister holding your hand and you were the baby brother she bought the treat for. Not the other way around. Your four year old little mind couldn't fully grasp the irony of this, though you did find it a little funny how much y'all's roles have flipped since yesterday. The only thing that remained the same here was that she was eating a fruity treat and you got a chocolate ice cream.

You look up again, staring at your sister eating the treat. "What" she says, having noticed you staring up at her.

"nothing" you say. Jesse didn't seem all that convinced. You makes something up "I was... just thinking that you... look pretty with your hair like that", referring to how her hair was not tied in a ponytail.

"Well Mom would always tie my hair up as a ponytail when I was your age, but I have been thinking about letting it out free like this more often" Jesse comments. You nod in agreement, finishing the last bit of the chocolate icecream. Jesse had finished her fruit bar around the same time. She took the stick out of your hand, throwing it away long with the stick that when with her fruit bar before leading you back to the car.

"Alright, we need to be heading home now" Jesse says as she lifts you up into the booster seat.

"But I wanna go back to the beach to play some more" you insist

"It's almost around 4 pm and I'm not sure if Mom will want us out so late" Jesse replies as she buckles you up in the booster seat.

"Well can't you just ask here" you plead. You then use a little tactic you got from Jesse, back when she had been your little sister - use puppy dog eyes while putting on a very cutesy innocent face in order to guilt trip the older sibling. Jesse was always able to get whatever she wanted from using it on Mommy, Daddy and you especially - and now it looks like it is having the same effect on her.

"Cheater" Jesse pouts before picking up dialing Mommy's number. "Hey Mom, I was just wondering if it was ok if we stay out a little later? Jason wants to play a little more at the beach". You wait patiently during the phone conversation. "Ok. Love you Mom". Ending the call, Jesse looks at you and says -

"Looks like Mom is alright with us staying out later, just as long as we start heading home when it gets dark" Jesse informs you. With that you start dancing, or rather squirming, around in your booster seat in excitement as Jesse drives you back to the beach.

Back at the beach, with Jesse having reset up the beach spot and reapplied the sunblock on the two of you, you start running towards the shoreline.

"Jay Jay, wait for me!" Jesse shouts to you from behind, chasing after you.

You keep going until you could barely run against the water, which was also when your feet could barely touch the sandy floor of the shallow ocean waters. Jesse catches up to you not long after.

"Please don't just go running of without me again" Jesse tells you.

"Okay"

"Now how about we go out a little father". With that Jesse starts gently pushing you forward as she moves father out into the ocean until the water reaches up to her shoulders.

"Too deep!" you panic, afraid that you will drown in the water. Luckily, Jesse was there to keep you from drowning.

"If it makes you feel better, then hold onto me".

You waist no time getting behind your sister in order to climb onto her back the best you could. You had your tinny arms wrapped around Jesse's neck, you legs trying to cling around Jesse's figure, though Jesse's arms provide the support for your bottom. Jesse swims freely around the deeper ocean waters, with your riding on her back. The water feels very cool and refreshing under your neck.

After sometime in the water, Jesse starts heading back towards the shorelines.

"Where are you going?" you ask

"I need to use the restroom again, and this time you are coming with" Jesse informs you

... back on the sand, your sister takes you towards the restrooms. Before you sister enters the girls' restroom, you ask her something "can't I just pee in my diaper?"

"then I would need to go all the way back to our spot and here again change you into a fresh clean diaper, and besides you are supposed to be trying to potty train yourself, remember" Jesse points out.

"Fine"

With that you head off into the boys' restroom, finding the nearest urinal to pee in. Being only 4, you take off your trunks and diaper entirely, butt-naked as your pee into the urinal.

Once you were done, you put your diaper and swimming trunks back on and head out of the boys' restroom in search for Jesse. As you exit the restroom you bump into -

choices: Run off and swap without Jesse's permission
115111111112221142213122221212.content:
"Oh there you are buddy!" Jesse says. She then notices that you had fallen on the ground, and you were tearing up. Knelling down, Jesse helped you back up. "Ouchy Boo-boo?" Jesse asks. You nod. She gently wipes the little droplets from your tiny face before lifting your arm. She then places a gentle kiss on your elbow. "There all better"

"Won't I get cooties though?" you ask

Jesse giggles. "Well my cooties have healing powers. How about that little bud" You see know reason why your sister would try to trick you, thus you are cheerful again.

You throw your arms around your sister before she has the chance to stand up. "You're so nice to me"

"Well you were always nice to me JayJay, and I love you"

"I wuv you too"

"Well there is something I haven't done for you yet though"

"Whaz that?"

"Give you a piggy back ride!" Out of nowhere, Jesse hoists you up onto her shoulders. You wrap your tiny arms around her head, your legs are already secured by your sister's hands. "You've always let me have piggy back rides when I was little, so I wanted to return the favor now that you're little"

Up on your sister's shoulders, you take a good look around you. And then you looked down at the ground. "Wow, I'm so high up!!!" you exclaim, with a big wide smile that would have melted your sister's heart.

"So where to?" Jesse asks you

"That way!" you say, pointing straight. You don't know what will be there, you just want to be over there - or rather you wanted your sister to give you a ride to over there. Riding up from Jesse's shoulders, seeing everything from up so high, made you feel very big. Even though you remembered having been this big not too long ago, being up on Jesse's shoulders had more of a novelty to it. But suddenly your sister stops where she's at.

"Hey buddy, aren't those your friends from high school?" Jesse asks you, looking into the direction of your old grown up friends Mark and David - though it became very clear that they were now Jesse's grown up friends.

You sat idly on your sister's shoulders while she chatted with Mark and David. They seemed to be having fun for whatever reason, regardless you were bored. And very impatient. You start whimpering a little, tugging on your sister's hair to get her attention.

"Not now"

"But I'm bored"

"Excuse me for a bit boys". Jesse set you down somewhere near Mark and David, she was also kneeling down. "Look, right now Mark, David and I are... Having a little grown up discussion, and you aren't exactly helping"

"But I wanna play!" you exclaim, stomping your foot.

Jesse looks back at Mark and David with a some kind of fake smile before looking back at you. "I'm sorry but if you are going to be acting like a brat, then you can just wait here until I am done, ok"

"But I wanna play"

"Just play in the sand then until I am done"

"But I wanna play with you"

"Well I am a little busy at the moment, so please be a good boy and stay at this spot until I am done" your sister was pointing at the very spot you were at as she said this.

And there you were stuck in this boring spot while your sister went back to chatting with those boys. So unfair! How could your sister leave you like this! The nerve! How could she treat you like this! It wasn't like she was even really your big sister - the only reason she is so big now was because you were the one who gave her your age and stuff in the first place - whatever that age was that is. Either way, she can't tell you what to do!

Now what are you going to do about it!
115111111112221142213122221212.title: Jesse

" What are you guys doing here?" Jesse asked both Mark and David.

" Not too much, just getting in a little swimming."

" It's really a nice day for that. Do you come to the beach often?"

Jesse and the boys continue their small talk for a while. When a pretty woman in her twenties with long brunette hair and a green bikini walked over to them. Her face was made up and it was clear that this woman didn't want to ruined her look by getting wet in the ocean.

The woman sauntered rihht up to Mark and said, " Has anyone told you how sexy you look?"

This woman was clearly out of Mark's league. She was much too mature for him. Probably out of college by now. Mark ( and everyone else ) was speechless.

Before Mark could think of an answer, familiar shouts could be heard in the distance. Jesse turned to see Jason running towards the group. But when he arrived, Jason didn't head towards Jesse, he headed instead to the woman.

" Give me my body back?" Jason yelled at the woman.

11511111111222114221312222122.content:
" Mom says we have to be home soon," Jesse informs you.

" Okay, but I want to drive."

" You want to be older again? I thought you wanted to stay 4 years old?"

" I do. But I want to drive home too. We'll just swap driving ability until we get home."

No matter what age a person is he likes to drive. From the first time he pushes a plastic car with his feet until he gets his license driving is important to all kids.

Jesse saw how disappointed you were with having to return home that she decided to agree. " Just until we get home. Then we'll swap back?"

" Okay."

The swap was made, but neither you nor Jesse changed physically. It was the car that changed. The booster seat was moved to the driver seat so you could see the road. The gas and brake pedal were moved so your little body could operate them. Even the steering wheel was shrunk to accommodate your smaller hands.

You got into the driver's seat and Jesse entered the front passenger seat. You started the engine and were on your way. You could drive the car as easily as you ever had.

Before Jesse could do anything you were back at the beach.

" Hey! What are we doing here?" Jesse demanded.

" I wanted to go back to the beach."

" Mom said come home now. If we don't I'll be in trouble."

" Tell Mom it was all my fault."

What happens next?

115111111112221142213122221221.content:
Before you could do anything, Jesse grabbed you out of the driver's seat. "What are you doing sister?" you ask sheepishly, Jesse looks very angry again. You then freeze as Jesse sits back down in the middle seats with you lying down on her lap facing down.

"Hold still" Jesse tells you. Before you could respond you all of a sudden feel the impact of Jesse's hand against your bottom.

"Ow!" you scream

"that's 1, four more to go" Jesse tells you before proceeding to spank you several more times. Each spanking stung your bottom, you were trying very hard not to scream in pain. It had been forever ago since you had been spanked and it was typically Mommy or Daddy who had spanked you. Back then you didn't ever think Jesse, formerly your little sister, would ever end up spanking you. Now that she was spanking you, it was dawning on you just how much of authority Jesse had over you now that you were her little brother.

Once Jesse was done spanking you, you begin to cry "I... sorry...". Jesse sits you ip in her lap, you were facing towards her.

"Tell me what you are sorry for" Jesse tells you

"I... sorry.. for.. tricking you... and.. disobeying Mommy" you struggle with each word because of the tears.

"I accept your apology" Jesse says, "now swap back the driving skills so that I can take you home". You nod hesitantly as you swap back the appropriate driving skills. "Now I'm not going to tell Mommy you were being disobedient this time. But try this again next time and I will consider telling Mommy not only about such but also about your powers"

"Please... don't... I obey, I promise" you say
Wity that Jesse starts driving the two of you back home.

Later down the car ride Jesse asks you something "You aren't scared of me Jay Jay, are you?"

You don't know what to say, you stay silent

"I wasn't trying to hurt you Jay Jay. When I spanked you it was not to harm you but to help you"

"help?" you ask

"I'm just trying to keep you safe and Mommy would have gotten worried"

"I didn't think about that" you say, you didn't want to scare Mommy. "I'm sorry"

"It's ok Jason. I've forgiven you" Jesse says. You don't feel so frightened anymore, though you are still left silent with it dawning on you only now that Jesse was now an authority figure.

Still, you loved your big sister. And you wanted nothing more than to be just like her, and just as cool as her.

You slide on your nighttime diapers and pajamas, with some help from Mommy who tucks you in bed. "Sweet dreams baby" Mommy tells you, kissing you on the forehead before heading out. With the lights off, you were alone in the room, in the small little bed suited for a toddler boy such as yourself, in the dark. This was going to be your first night as a rejuvenated 4 year old (as the night before you were stuck as a 2 year old baby). This was also when you remembered that, being 4 in mind too, you were afraid of the dark. You cling onto the teddy bear next to you tighter. This teddy bear had been Jesse's back when she was your little sister, but now that you two had swapped ages you had gained some of her possessions including the teddy bear.

You tried to make yourself go to sleep, trying to tell yourself to ignore the monsters that were probably lurking in the closet... or under your bed. Eventually you did fall asleep - only to have a nightmare. You wake up instantly, breathing heavily, crying, and burying yourself into the teddy bear. Only it didn't feel exactly like the teddy bear... You take a look at the teddy bear - and you saw a GIANT SPIDER in its place - and it BITES AT YOUR HEAD.

"AAAAAAAAHHHHHHHHHH!" you wake up, breathing heavily from having awoken from such a nightmare. You take a look at the teddy bear in your arm, which was a normal teddy bear, not a giant spider. You then hear the door open. Spooked, you cower under the covers.

"Is something wrong Jay Jay?" you hear the soft voice of your sister. Revealing your face from the covers, you see your sister in her nightgown, looking very concerned.

"I... didn't wake everyone up, did I?" you sheepishly ask. Jesse shakes her head sideways

"I think I was the only one who hadn't fallen asleep yet. Everyone else, especially Mom, tends to be heavy sleepers here"

"okay"

"did you have a bad dream?" Jesse asks you out of concern. You nod, your eyes a little watery. Jesse offers "would you feel a little better if you slept with me for tonight?"

"really?" you ask, "I thought I wasn't allowed on your bed"

"Well when I was your age whenever I got scared from nightmares, Mom and Day would let me sleep with them in bed so that I wouldn't be as scared in the dark. So I figured that maybe something like that would help you feel a little better too."

You reply -

You leaped out of the bed, still holding onto the teddy bear, wasting no time running towards Jesse. "Yes please...." you whimper, clinging onto Jesse's legs. Jesse picks you up from the floor, carrying you to her room. You feel really secure in her arms, resting your head on her shoulder. You've been carried a lot ever since swapping ages with Jesse, but before it was out of convenience due to your small stature, but right now you really needed this, to be held in your big sister's arms. You would have preferred being held in Mommy's arms honestly, but Mommy was not awake right now, and your big sister has been really kind to you even after the age swap.

Jesse sits herself in bed with you in her lap. The bed sheets cover the two of you, but you mostly. "I'll keep watch, I promise that no monster is going to get you" Jesse tells you. With that, you begin to make yourself comfortable, cuddling yourself against Jesse, still holding onto the teddy bear. Your big sister's arms are wrapped around your over the bed sheets. Even then, your sister was still able to feel you shaking.

"Jesse..."

"Yes?"

"Could you sing me a lullaby?"

"Sure thing". Your big sister starts softly singing "You are my Sunshine" to you. Part of you wonders if she might have chose that song because you might have once sang it to her when she had been the little one. Regardless, your sister's soft, relaxing singing helps you drift off to sleep.

...

A little bit of morning sunlight is able to stir you from your sleep. You did not have any nightmares this time. As you awoke, you found yourself still in the embrace of your sister, whom was still sitting up but very much asleep. You lean over to get a glimpse of the nearest clock over by your sister's nightstand, it says 7:00. Satisfied with having survived the night, you look back up to your sister. She was wearing a nightgown, which you thought felt so soft that your sister's body was easily able to replace a pillow, and her hair was down, instead of being tied in a pony tail. "She really does look pretty like that" you thought to yourself, "like an angel". You try to climb up your sister's upper body the best you could, trying to get up to her face. "thank you" you whispered as you tried to place a kiss on sister's cheek. You slip immediately afterwards, back onto the lap. Your sister begins to stir from her sleep.

"Uhh..oh, it's only you Jay Jay" your sister mumbles, her eyes still half closed as she lets out a yawn. She takes a look over at the clock. "Man only 7:00? Why couldn't I have woken up later?"

"Sorry" you say, now feeling guilty

Jesse looks down towards you. She smiles, as groggy as half asleep as she still was at the moment, "there is no need to apologize little brother" she says, "I'm just glad you were able to have a good night's sleep"

The door opens as Mommy enters the room. "Jesse, have you seen Ja--" she notices you before she could finish her question. "Oh"

"Jason had a bad dream last night, so I let him sleep here with me so that he wouldn't be scared anymore" Jesse explains

"Oh my, are you ok baby" Mommy asks you, leaning down towards you

You nod, "Jesse protected me from the monsters of the dark" you say

"That's good to hear. I'm sorry I wasn't awake then"

"That's ok Mommy" you say, hugging your Mommy

Mommy looks at Jesse. "Thank you for being such a good big sister for Jason, Jesse" she thanks

"No problem Mom" Jesse replies before letting out one big yawn.

"Well you can have a little beauty sleep sweety, I'll take things from here" Mommy tells Jesse, who seems rather pleased with the suggestion as she slides back into the bed to nap some more.

Mommy proceeds to give you a bath, dry you and help you get dressed. She comments on how your diaper wasn't wet this time, congratulating you with a pat on the head, you feel really good.

At the breakfast table, Mommy makes you some pancakes, your favorite. You make a little mess of your self trying to eat the pancakes because of the sticky syrup, but regardless you were able to eat your breakfast and Mommy was able to get you cleaned up again with a few wipes. "Once I do a few things first, I can take you to the park if you would like" Mommy says to you. As fun as going to the park sounded to you, you were hoping to spend some more time with Jesse rather than having to hang out with your even younger siblings, Ariana and Jerry.

"Can I hang out with Jesse today" you ask

"Your sister has plans today, sweety. But you can ask her if you want though" Mommy says.

You want to hang out with your big sister because you now look up to her alot, but most of all you really wanted to use your swap powers and your big sister made you pinky promise not to use your powers without her supervision.... However you begin to think to yourself that if the swaps basically change reality then would your big sister even know if you make a swap without her supervision. It wasn't like she even noticed anything odd about you wearing Bonnie's swimsuit until you had told her about the swap. However, your 4 year old little mind was still afraid that your big sister would somehow find out about any sort of disobedience regardless and you did not want to make her mad again.

"Jason?" Mommy asks you, getting back your attention.

You decide to
11511111111222114221312222122121.title: Yes please, you sleep with Jesse in her bed

11511111111222114221312222122121112.content:
Skipping forward a couple of weeks, you were now going to attend your first day of preschool - or rather your 2nd "first" day of preschool as since you are only 4 now you would be starting all over. You were rather anxious those past several weeks, Mommy and Daddy noticed and so did Jesse. Mommy and Daddy assumed that you were just nervous about starting school, but Jesse knew exactly what was really going on in your head. As Mommy walks you towards the PreK classroom, you think about to the night before, when Jesse sat with you on your bed to discuss the coming school day. She assured you that you would have fun at preK, while also reminding you that Bonnie, your "girlfriend", as she teased, from that day at the beach, will be in the same preK class as you.

Mommy bids you farewell, giving you a kiss on the forehead before dropping you off in the preK classroom, where you saw a bunch of other children around your age playing. A young pretty woman you assumed to be the teacher greeted you, welcoming you to your new first day of school. You go around the room, switching between playing with the random figures and dolls, the building blocks, costumes and so on.

Eventually you went back to the costumes, in which you saw a cute little princess dress. You decide to put it on, thinking you would look cute in it - you don't realize that you would look girly as result since you are only 4. After putting on the princess dress, you go up to a nearby mirror to observe yourself. spinning, twirling and posing in front of the mirror with a little wand in your hands. However there was someone else in the mirror too.

"Bonnie?" you say, turning around to face the girl you remembered from the beach. The girl was smiling, wasting no time giving you a friendly hug, which you returned.

"You swapped clothes with someone else too?" Bonnie asked

"No, I just put this on"

"But Boys don't dress up like princesses"

"Some do I think" you reply. You then notice that Bonnie is wearing a princess outfit too. Realizing this, the two of you playfully chuckle at one another.

"Come on, let's go play" Bonnie says, grabbing and tugging your arm to take you to the building blocks. "Let's build another castle, ok?" She says. You nod back, you had fun building sand castles with her at the beach, so why not build a big tower with the building blocks too? The two of you work together to make the best block castle y'all possibly could. You really like having Bonnie as a friend, even if she was a girl; boys around your age always seem to try to steer clear of girls because of "cooties" but for some reason you didn't care about whether or not you were going to end up getting cooties from Bonnie, she was cool. Once the two of you were done, Bonnie stood up, posing in her little princess outfit. "I am the princess of this new castle" she proclaims

"But I wanted to be the princess"

"But there can only be one princess, and princesses are supposed to be girls" Bonnie replies

"But were are both in princess outfits" you point out

"Well, what would you suggest we do about that?" Bonnie asks. Before you can answer, Bonnie lights up, having gotten an idea in her head. "Oh I know, how about we swap genders so that you can be a girl so that you can be the princess"

"What about you?"

"Since I would be a boy, I can be the brave knight who rescues the pretty princess" Bonnie says "after I change into another costume that is"

You think about the offer, though there was one problem: "I dunno, my big sister told me to not use my powers without her permission from now on"

This doesn't stop Bonnie. "Is your big sister your mommy?"

"No" what was silly question

"Then you don't have to do what she says, cause's she is not your mommy or daddy" Bonnie reasons

Now that you think about it, Bonnie makes a very good point. Besides it was not like Jesse would be able to tell the difference if you did remain a girl - the only reason she knew about your other swap with Bonnie was because you told you so. Upon thinking about it, you decide to -

Mommy didn't seem so angry anymore. She let out a deep breath and looked at the both of you. "If this is what you two want... then I guess I don't see much problem with things staying this way". Jesse wipes away any remaining tears from her face. Mommy then looks back at you, bending down. "But I want you to promise me that you will not use your powers without asking me first from now on" Mommy tells you. You simply nod, not wanting to get Mommy angry as to change her mind.... But what Mommy didn't know was that you had your fingers crossed behind your back while promising Mommy to ask her first being using your powers. Before she lets you go, she tells you something else, "Now I may not remember what it was like before all this, but mommy's instincts tell me you were having it rough" she then pulls you in for a tight hug, "I know your father and I aren't always the best parents, but I promise that I will be a better Mommy for you this time around". She kisses you on the forehead before leaving the room.

And pretty soon there will be a lot of explaining to do from the both of us"

Jesse smiles. "There's my sneaky little brother" she says, playfully rubbing her hand in your hair. This makes you feel better instantly. "Now come on, I'll let you play a little game of mine just this once" she says, popping a video game into the game system in her room.

"What is it? It's not going to be too hard... or scary, is it" you ask

"Nah, this one's a pretty chill game. But it's also a classic" Jesse explains as you place yourself in her lap. She places the game controller in your hands.

"This is way to big, sister. I can barely reach some of the buttons"

"Don't worry, I'll help you just a little bit. You're going to have fun, I will make sure that" Jesse tells you. You relax in your sister's lap, the controller in your tiny hands, although Jesse's hands are also partially covering your hands and touching some of the buttons you can't reach, as "Super Mario Sunshine" pops up on the TV screen in front of y'all.

Jesse felt she pulled one over on Mom. She knew that there couldn't be any swaps without her permission. She assumed that Mom would eventually give up and things would return to normal.

In the morning, she woke up got dressed for the day and went to school. The day at school was normal. She went to class and hung out with her friends. She never brought up what happened with her mom. They couldn't understand anyway.

When she got home, she found her room was very different. During her time at school, mom replaced everything in her room including the clothes in her drawers. ( Mom also made arrangements to have the walls painted and the carpet replaced.)

Her room looked similar to her room when she was 4 years old. There were bright posters on the wall, juvenile furniture and toddler style clothes in her size in the drawers. This included replacing her panties with pull up diapers. There were also, dolls and toys for little girls on the shelves and in the closets.

Jesse found mom and ask her, " What are you doing?"

"Well honey, you should be four years old, so I'll treat you like a four year old. I don't care how big you are."

" What?"

" From now on, you'll be treated like a four year old. That means you won't be going to school anymore. Either me or babysitter will always be watching you. Even The Net Nanny on your computer will be set to its highest level. You might as well swap back now because you are going to be living like a four year old regardless."

Mom then ushered Jesse to her room and then made her change out of her school clothes and into clothes suited for a four year old which included Pull-Ups, a cutie dress and no bra.

"Mommy's going to take some time off... for a few days..." Daddy answers, the sound of his voice sort of suggests sadness. Soon, the car with Mommy inside it is out of sight. It does not take long for Daddy to go back into the house. It does not take long for your siblings, save your big sister, to follow. It does not take long for you to become very sad. It does not take long for your eyes to water. It does not take long for Jesse to notice either.

"Nothing bad is going to happen to Mommy, Jay Jay.... She just needs some time alone" she bounces you a little to cheer you up.

"Buh.. I want.. my Mommy" you were still tearing up

For whatever reason, you start to feel a little sleepy, so you rest your head on your sister's shoulders, dozing off as she carries you back into the house.

Jesse tucks you in your bed before heading to the basement area, where she gathers her possessions that Mommy had locked up. "You know, switching places with Dad would be quite the upgrade" Jesse thought to herself. Of course the only problem was that she didn't have the swap powers, you did. "However, if Jason is able to swap any trait, then surely that would include his powers" Jesse said to herself, "I could just convince my former big brother to let me borrow his powers for a bit, and then trick Dad into swapping ages with me. Then I would be the head of the household". Of course the only downside was that Jesse would end up losing most of the free time she has as a teenager, replaced with work and... finances. "Perhaps I ought to think about this first" Jesse comments to herself

" Do you really want Mommy to be in jail? Do you really want your little brother to actually be a woman you don't know who is in her 30s? Is it fair, that an attire family should lose their mother all because you don't want to be who you should be?"

"I think by tomorrow I'll be out of diapers!" Jason said excitedly.

"Tomorrow?" Ericka said unbelievingly. "When did you have your last accident?"

"Yesterday morning, but I have been trying real hard since then. I didn't have an accident all day and I stayed dry all night."

"Well when my little sister had an accident, my mom put her back into pullups. She said she would ahve to stay in them until she stayed dry for at least a week. She also had to wear a nighttime diaper for a month."

"A month? Why so long?" Jason said crestfallen.

"Well, I guess because you can't control yourself while you are a sleep."

"I don't care. I've been trying real hard and I'll be out of pullups by tomorrow."

"Good luck," she said reassuringly.

Jason found that getting to the bathroom every three hours wasn't as easy as it seemed at school. You couldn't go for the first and last five minutes of the class and you had to wait if someone asked the teacher first. Then once you were at the potty, you couldn't just sit there until you went. You were expected back in class. Jason used the boysroom, but he always sat on the potty like he was taught. After doing his business, he would wipe himself too. But Jason was happy that he made it through the day without wetting himself.

No one said anything about his clothes or his diapered state at school. It was all normal as far as anyone was concerned. By the end of the day, Jason didn't even think about what he was wearing, he was just focused upon staying dry.

When he returned home, he immediately told his mom about his dry state. He hoped that one full day without an accident would be enough. But even though she praised him for his effort, she said it would take a while longer to be sure. Mom didn't know what was the urgency of getting out of diapers.

Jason then told Jesse about his day. How he stayed dry all day and that if she would just do what he did, she would be potty trained in no time. That she didn't have to wait to swap back.

"If it's so easy, then you do it. When you are out of diapers we can swap back," she retorted.

"But it's hard at school. I can't just leave to potty. I'm not with mom all day so I can just potty anytime I want. It'll be easier for you."

"If you want, you can stay with mommy and I'll go to school until this is over." Jason didn't realize that Jesse wasn't with mom all the time, she spent several hours a day in daycare with Jerry. They weren't in the same 'class' but they were at the same place. The difference was that Jesse played with the older kids (the four year olds and Jerry played with the two year olds.)

There was no use in hiding it. You had to tell your mom about your accident. You came up to her and the entire weight of what was happening was hitting you. Not only were you not potty trained, but you were a teenaged boy who's mommy picked out his clothes and those clothes were all girl's clothing made for a four year old. If you had any friends they would also be four year olds. You didn't go to any school at all anymore. They wouldn't allow you into Pre-K or even daycare. All because you swapped with your little sister. But now even if you swapped back everything, you didn't know if things would return to normal. You might be stuck in Pre-K. There might be more, but you weren't sure. It might be that at the end of this, you would pee 'like a girl' for the rest of your life. Or that your sister was changing things that you didn't know about.

By the time you reached your mom you were sobbing. "Mom, I need a change."

"Awww poor baby," she said as she wrapped you in her arms. "It's OK. It's only natural to have a set back now and again." Your mom didn't know what you were thinking.

"It's been so tough and I worked so hard. But things aren't going right; not with school not with anything."

"Don't worry. I'll find another daycare for you. And then before you know it, you'll be out of diapers and in your big girl panties. Then you'll be in Pre-K. You'll be my big boy soon. I promise."

"But, but, I don't know..."

"Look I have an idea," Mom said trying to comfort her child. "I was going to go to the salon this afternoon. I was going to let you play while I was in there. But I have a better idea. I'll get you a makeover too. I'll have them do your nails and style your hair. I'll have them pierce your ears. You'll look so pretty when you come out, that any school would be missing out not to take you."

The thought of a makeover appealed to you. It must have been because you had swapped clothing with Jesse and makeup and accessories were related. Plus Jesse was never allowed any of these things. It made you feel special that you were allowed. But then you realized what you were thinking. On the other hand, polish could be removed without any problem.

What happens next?
