115111111222121121211312111.content:
You and mom arrived at the salon. Mom talked with the stylist and told her what she wanted done on you. You weren't consulted at all. Not that you would know what you wanted anyway. This was your first time there. You and mom went to a changing room where she changed into a robe. Then she took off all your clothes except for your diaper and put you into an identical robe.

"What's this for?" you asked.

"It's so your clothes won't get dirty while they are making you beautiful," she reassured you.

You were then separated as a stylist fetched you. You knew this girl. You had been friends. But that wasn't true anymore, You had swapped all your friends with Jesse. That was a big waste since Jesse was back in Pre-K anyway. All your knowledge was gone too, you were lucky if you knew all the shapes. You thought you did, but you weren't sure.

"Hi," the stylist said, "I'm Leah. I'm going to make you very pretty." She led you to the mani-pedi station. She buffed your nails and put on a clear coat of polish. All the while she was talking to you. She said, "I know your sister, Jesse. We go to school together." Leah was in a work study program. She went to school three days a week and worked here for two. Since Jesse was transferred today, Leah didn't know about it. You already knew you had been friends with Leah, but you didn't feel that friendship anymore. All your friends were now little girls.

While your nails were drying, you were taken to have your hair washed and blow dried. Then you were returned to the mani-pedi station for your first coat of nail polish. She did all these things without asking your opinion.

Everything was pleasant until you got the biggest surprise of your life. Something that hurt more than the piercings. They waxed your body and removed all your body hair. You weren't sure what they were doing until the ripped the first tract. That hurt a lot. It was a good thing you weren't too hairy to begin with but it still hurt. This was the real reason you were put into a robe. It made getting to the hair on your legs and chest easier. You complained, but it didn't help. Your mother had already decided and you hadn't any choice in the matter. (Besides your mom also had a waxing.)

When it was over, both mom and Leah told you how pretty you looked. Mom paid the bill with her credit card and then before leaving the shop, she took you to the bathroom. It was time for your potty practice.

What was next?

115111111222121121211312111221111.content:
"Come on everybody," one of the attendants announces, "It's nap time."

"But I'm not sleepy," you tell her.

"Are you surer? Just lie down a little and you'll find out. Besides do you want to be the only kid who isn't taking a nap. Then you will be all tuckered out for all the times we are doing this afternoon."

There wasn't any need to argue with her. She was just doing her job, besides even though everyone knew you were sixteen, you were treated like everyone else. Nap time would give you time to think about what happened to you.

In the nap time room, a bunch of mats were laying on the floor. You knew which was your mat, it was the only 'big' one. All the other mats were small for little kids, but one only one was big enough for you. One of the other kids jumped upon it first. But when you got over there you made him leave. No four year old boy was going to mess with a sixteen year old like you, even if you were wearing girls clothes and he was completely potty trained and you weren't. Well he might mess with you a little, but he would have to back down.

Laying down and closing your eyes you tried to think about what had happened. You couldn't think as clearly as before the swap, you had the education of a four year old now. You didn't like a lot of what happened. You didn't like wearing pull-ups, but at least you hadn't had a accident. The potty training routine every three hours had been working. Maybe you could convince Jesse to just go with it and swap back early.

Wearing girl's clothes didn't really matter too much, as long as you didn't look in the mirror. They were just clothes. Were leggings that different than pants? So what if you top was a little longer than usual and had a peplum making it look sort of like a dress. It's not what you would pick out. Actually, your mom now picks out all your clothes...well whatever.

You really liked Alaina. She was very friendly and had a bubbly personality. You seemed to remember liking your old friends too, but there was a bond you had with Alaina that seemed stronger than you had with even your best friend. Alaina never lied to you, or tried to date one of your exes. Having Alaina as a friend was definitely the best thing about this whole thing. The only problem was that you didn't like playing with the toys and dolls that she did. It wasn't her fault, you just didn't have the interests of a four year old.

"That was it." you realized. "This life wouldn't be so bad if you had the interests of a four year old. When you pottied correctly you felt happy. When you were around Alaina you were happy. Even pushing around the little boys made you feel happy. Even takign a nap in the middle of the day seemed like such a great idea. The only problem was that things you were expected to do you didn't like. You didn't want to play with dolls, you didn't want to sing the Alphabet song, you didn't want to watch childish cartoons. but if you had those interests than it would be fine. You would avoid the stress of being a teenager for a little while and when you were done you would be fresh. Everything was done for you and it would be great if you simply just have the interests of a little girl.

With that resolved, you tried to get some sleep. But before you knew it, the alarm on your wrist went off. It was time to potty.

You were brought to the potty room. There were several potties for children. You were surprised to see that there were other children on some of the potties. They were sitting on the potties, out in the open with their underwear pulled down to their feet. Boys and girls were sitting side by side, they didn't have any (or very much) modesty at all. An attendant watched them. You got onto the only adult-sized potty that was obviously designed for just you.

The attendant pulled down your leggings and pull-ups and told you to sit. You forced yourself to act like all this was normal. Then you pottied as you had several times before. You weren't wet and you didn't need to go, but you waited until either their was a stream or until the attendant thought enough time had passed.

Pottying in front of strangers was definitely one of the bad points of your predicament. If you didn't convince Jesse to swap back, you would have to put up with it. You didn't think she would give in.

Sitting on the potty, gave you more time to think. You were formulating a plan. You decided you had three options: 1, just wait it out. You would learn to potty eventually. 2) swap interests with Jesse. Then your life style would become at least tolerable. 3) convince Jesse to swap back. Remind her of the fun of playing at daycare and all her old friends.

In the meantime, nap time was over and you hadn't pottied. So you were let up and had snacks with everyone else.

What do you do?

You knew that tomorrow at daycare would be a lot more fun. You were so happy that you felt like singing as you headed towards your room. You started with one of your favorites, "Twinkle Twinkle Little Star."

Once you got there, you were overjoyed. Your room had changed. This wasn't the first time that your room changed since your swapping. When Alaina returned you realized that you weren't wearing pullups anymore. You were wearing cotton underwear. You didn't know what it looked like but you were sure they weren't diapers The underwear felt a little tight, but you didn't care you were just happy to be out of pullups. You knew you didn't need them anymore.

"I'm back in diapers," Alaina told you excitedly. "I don't believe it."

"See I told you."

"But what about mommy? Won't she be mad I'm wearing diapers?"

"No, she won't. She will think you haven't been fully potty trained. Just like I was."

"How long will I stay in diapers?"

"Well I suppose until you are potty trained."

"You mean forever?"

You didn't ant to damper her enthusiasm so you said "If that is what you want."

You played with Alaina the rest of the day, until you mom picked you up. You were going to miss her (even if you didn't miss playing with dolls) when you swapped back with Jesse.

You were fully potty trained now. All you had to do was wait for Jesse to return from school and then you could swap back everything. You went into the bathroom when you got home. You didn't feel the need to go but you wanted to make sure you weren't wearing diapers anymore. You pulled up the hem of your shirt and pulled down your leggings to see you were wearing Doc McStuffin panties https://www.macys.com/shop/product/doc-m... "These must have been what Alaina had been wearing when we swapped, " you thought. "I'll get my boys underwear when I swap back with Jesse.

When Jesse finally arrived you tried to get her alone. Jesse was home late because after school she hung out with her friends (all high school aged kids, mostly boys.)

"OK, you said. I'm potty trained. We can swap back," you told her.

"What are you talking about?" Jesse asked.

"I'm potty trained. We can swap everything back."

"So what you've been potty trained for a long time. What does that have to do with anything."

'You said when I was potty trained, we would swap back."

"Why would I say that. We both are potty trained." Jesse didn't remember swapping potty training. When you swapped with Alaina, reality changed.

"Whatever, let's swap back."

"I don't want to. I like being in Pre-K They wanted me to be in a higher grade. They gave me this test,. But I totally flunked it so I could stay. I'm the smartest person there. It is so much fun."

"Don't you want to wear girl's clothes and again and have friends like Alaina?"

"Who's Alaina?"

"You know your best friend, she lives down the street."

"Oh here. I have my own friends now."

What happens next?

Jason woke up to his mother popping her head into his room "Jason, It's time to get up and ready for school" she called. Jason got out of his bed where his mother had begun selecting clothes for him to wear today. Soon his mum was changing him out of his Pink Pajamas and into a Pink T-shirt that read "princess" and a knee length skirt that was also pink, he had also been put into panties like he wore yesterday but he didn't mind as he was about to swap back with Jesse anyway. Once he was dressed his mother left his room to make breakfast at which point Jesse entered the room, "alright Jason I'm ready to swap back" she muttered clearly sad that she would be losing her intelligence and new friends at Pre-K but she would at least be going back to preschool with Alaina or so she thought.

"thanks" Jason replied "so we'll swap back everything we swapped right?" he asked confirming with Jesse to which she simply nodded, Jason focused on the swap and then he felt the swaps occur, he felt his intelligence coming back to him and he saw that his clothes had changed into the T-shirt and Jeans that Jesse had been wearing before and she was wearing the pink ensemble he had been wearing. However, Jason didn't realise that he was still wearing panties and Jesse was still wearing briefs because in this reality he had swapped with Alaina not Jesse. Jason felt happy that he was back to normal at least as far as he could tell, He enjoyed being treated older again like he had been before and this was reaffirmed by seeing his mother treating Jesse as she used to.

Jason was about to catch the bus to school when he heard his mum call out "Where are you going?, i'm driving you to school", Jason paid this no mind assuming that his mum was simply offering him a ride to school. Once lunch was finished everyone got in the car and Jason was in the front seat once again, Jerry was dropped off at daycare and Ariana was dropped off at primary school. You sat in the car with Jesse while She dropped off Ariana, constantly looking at your watch as high school would start in 10 minutes and you didn't want to be late. Once back in the car your mum began driving to the Pre-K school which you didn't pay much mind to as you simply thought that it was Jesse being dropped off but when you didn't get out of the car too your mum called out "Jason, come on you don't want to be late" then it dawned on you, you had swapped schools with Jesse but when you swapped you were in the same school so it was if nothing had changed!

Sighing in defeat you got out of the car where your mum dropped you and Jesse off at Pre-K, all the kids liked you as they had Jesse the day before and you remembered liking them as Jesse had become friends with them even though you hadn't gotten to be very close with them, when you had some time alone during class you asked the teacher "why aren't i in high school?, I'm 16 and way too smart to be here!". Your questions were met with a calm tone and sympathetic voice from the teacher "well you had to leave high school because you couldn't cope remember?, and when you seemed as if you could cope and were given the test a week ago you failed so we're keeping you here for a while". This left you mortified, Jesse failed that test because she wanted to stay but because you swapped schools YOU failed the test, "Can i retake the test?" you asked

You knew this was bad, but if you swapped to fix it, it probably would get worse. Jesse might decide that she likes high school and not switch back even after you were potty trained if you swapped that. You also didn't want to look like a little girl to make your clothing seem right. Swapping probably could backfire on you. It could backfire on you bad. That if how you got into this situation in the first place. Despite wearing a pretty girlie outfit and wearing a pullup, you decided to man-up.

"I'm not going to swap anything more with you. I'll learn to potty train and then we'll swap back everything. That is what I am going to do!"

"If you say so," Jesse said. It only took a couple of minutes for the carpool that would take Jesse to school arrived. It usually left before you had to leave since there were a couple other girls to pick up.

When she was gone, your bravado fell away. You looked at yourself. You couldn't believe that you would go to school looking like this. Pink unicorn leggings https://www.childrensplace.com/us/p/Girl... with a white unicorn tee https://www.childrensplace.com/us/p/Girl... and the most masculine thing you wore was white rainbow sneakers https://www.childrensplace.com/us/p/Girl... The leggings were so formfitting that there wasn't any doubt that you were wearing a diaper underneath.

The stress showed on your face. You knew (or at least was pretty sure) that no one would think what you were wearing was odd. But you knew. You didn't want to wear it and if you had to you didn't want to be seen like this.

Your mother saw you and she knew you so well that she knew instantly something was wrong.

"What's the matter, honey?" she asked.

"Oh, nothing."

"Are you having trouble at school?"

"No, not really."

"I wish I knew what was wrong," your mother said out loud. She meant it too, she hated to see her children in distress.

"I wish I could tell you," you mumbled.

That was all it took, you swapped all you know about your power and what swaps you made with your sister. You forgot it all. This brightened your mood as you didn't see anything wrong with how you were dressed anymore, nor that you weren't potty trained. As far as you knew,everything is as it should be which is what your mom thought before the swap on knowledge.

On the other hand, your mom knew everything that had happened. She knew about your swapping ability and that you had swapped potty training and clothing with your four year old sister. She knew that your sister told you she wouldn't swap back until you were potty trained. She grew instantly mad at Jesse for playing such a trick on you. Your mom would make Jesse swap back as soon as she got home. The problem was that she had left already. It was too late to make her do it now.

Without any of your previous concerns, you headed towards the door.

"Where are you going?" your mother asked.

"To school."

"Dressed like that?"

:Mom, you dressed me yourself Besides I like it. It's so cute."

"But your dressed like your sister." Your mother didn't realize that you didn't know what she knew about your situation.

"No, I wear this all the time. Don't tell me you don't like it. You put me in it just a little while ago. You want me to change?"

"I think you should."

"OK."

You waited for mom to lead you to your room. After a few moments you you went without her. You assumed that your mom would follow. She 'knew' you didn't know how to dress yourself.

A short while later, "Well change," she said. "what are you waiting for?"

"I don't know how to. I was waiting for you. Hurry up, I'll be late for school."

What happens next?

Your mother now in her business attire knelt down next to you and began to help you with your shoes "alright right foot first" she instructed, Just to make sure you had swapped properly you asked "do i really have to go to school?" to which your mother stopped fastening the Velcro on your right shoe "look honey, i know you don't want to go to preschool and would rather spend time at home with mummy but you're 4 years old and next year you'll be in kindergarten and i can't afford to not be working". You put on a sad face like your mother would suspect but in reality that lifted a heavy weight from your shoulders. "Now come on, we need to drop off your older brother and sister before i drop you at preschool and Jerry at Daycare", You help your mum put on your last shoe and then get in the back of the car where Jesse used to sit.

On the car ride to school you could tell that Jesse was enjoying being 16 and she probably got more out of this swap than you, Once at Preschool your mum handed you off to one of the workers and you were let out with the other kids. You didn't recognise anybody there because all your friends were in High school, looking around you saw at least 30 children between the ages of 3 and 4 running around having a blast. Not finding senseless running or chasing any of the kids that you dwarfed you walked over to a corner and sat down, It didn't take long for one of the workers there to notice you alone and she came over to you and sat down.

"hello there Jason, what's a big girl like you doing sitting here all by yourself?" she asked, You looked over to the woman who sat down next to you and saw a cute girl in her early twenties wearing a pink shirt with a name tag on it that read 'Katie'. "it's nothing Katie i just don't enjoy all this stuff that everyone else is doing, it's silly and I'm too grown up for that kind of stuff" you reply "hey you read my name tag good girl, high five" she responded lifting her right hand to which you halfheartedly high-fived. "so all grown up huh?" she asked "none of this any fun for you because it's for little kids?", you looked at her and stared into her hazel eyes for a moment before responding "yeah i don't really fit in here".

Katie paused for a moment "is this about the potty training?" she asked "in a way yeah" you replied "your mum told us you were a bit upset that you weren't potty trained yet but don't worry, we'll get you potty trained in no time every 3 hours we'll get you to go and you'll be trained in no time!" she exclaimed. You looked at her, "thanks" you replied. "and hey if nobody here wants to be your friend how about i be your friend?" she asked "okay" you replied.

You have determined that you have switched occupations with Ms. Richmond, making her a student and you the teacher of the third grade class. Many of your belongings had moved with you to your desk, and you found a teacher ID card to confirm what you had swapped.

“I finished this worksheet Mr. Nelson.” Ms. Richmond told you, calling you by your last name.

“That’s great Emma.” You said, not knowing what her first name was until you read it off of her worksheet.

“What should I do next?”

“Umm... here.” You pick up a stack of worksheets with similar math problems to the ones she was doing. “Try these.”

“Are you sure I can’t get something a little more challenging?” She asked. “I did the other sheet easily.” Despite being in the 3rd grade, she still had the knowledge that she did as a teacher before you swapped with her.

“I don’t have any with me right now.” You tell her. “I’ll make sure to get some harder ones just for you soon enough, for now why don’t you do whatever you want?”

“Okay, I’ll go read a book I have in my bag.”

“You do that.” You say as she sits down and grabs a book out of her purse and opens it up. You also found it funny how she still uses her purse to carry her school supplies instead of a backpack. You meanwhile still have the backpack you used for high school before you swapped with your sister.

Knowing what you did about the swap now, you decided to stay the way you were for a little longer. You searched the computer that you now had since you were now the teacher hoping to find a lesson plan or something.

Jesse had a lot of fun pretending to be in charge. She didn't realize that she was actually in charge. She checked on her siblings pretending to act like an adult.

Jason returned to Jesse's room and started to play with her dolls once again. But it wasn't any fun for him. He didn't like playing with dolls. There wasn't anything else to do but swap 'likes' with Jesse.

" Jesse, I want to like the things you like. Can we swap that?" Jason asked. This time Jason didn't say pretend.

Jesse thought it was pretend like everything else and said, " Sure."

When Jason returned to Jesse's room he felt completely different. He was excited to play with Jesse's dolls. Not only did he like playing with dolls, he found that's some of the dolls were his favorites. Before swapping he thought all of Jesse's dolls were the same. But now he could appreciate each doll

A very few of the dolls he loved. Some of the dolls he liked a lot. Some had special features, like you could brush their hair or change their clothes, that he now had and appreciation for. Some were old dolls that he didn't care about anymore.

He ran into the room and started to play. He enjoyed himself even more than Jesse had since it was all new to him.

After playing for a while, Jason wish that this was his room. He liked the decor, the paint on the walls and all the stuff inside. Jason decided to make another swap with Jesse.

Jason found Jesse and asked her, " Want to swap rooms?"

Jason had the bigger room, so of course, Jesse said " Yes."

Jason returned to what had been Jesse's room to find that all his stuff was in there. That wasn't what he wanted. He wanted to not only have Jesse's room, but he wanted her things too, especially her toys.

Again Jason found Jesse to ask her to swap something. Jesse didn't mind giving up all her toys and stuff. She didn't have any interest in any of that stuff anymore.

When Jason returned to what was now his room, it looked as it had before any of the swapping had taken place. The only difference was that it was now his room with his stuff in it.

He had a great deal of fun playing with his toys and dolls. He only wished he had someone to play with. He knew his friends wouldn't want to play dolls with him. He needed another swap.

When he found Jesse in what was his former room, she was playing with her Xbox. She was so engrossed in the video game, that when Jason was about to ask her to swap friends she shouted at him. "Leave me alone! You can have anything you want! You don't have to ask me anymore!"

Jason was taken aback and left the room immediately. He didn't swap anything then. But by the time he returned to his new room, he realized he could swap anything with Jesse without having to ask her.

Jason was playing with Jesse's dolls in Jesse room having Jesse's body but it wasn't very much fun. He didn't know what to do with the dolls. Should he talk to them? Should he pretend to take care of them? Should he make them interact with each other? He didn't know.

Then he decided he had enough after a little while and decided to play another game. he thought maybe it would be fun to dress up like a princess or something as he had seen Jesse do. He went to Jesse's closet to look for a princess costume. He found the costumes there, where he expected them, but they weren't made for a person his size...well the size he is now. They were sized for his old body. They would dwarf his four year old frame. When they were originally bought they fit Jesse perfectly. Now they were huge.

Jason was looking through the closet and found that all the clothes were in the style of a four year old girl, but sized for someone much bigger. It started to dawn on him, that this wasn't his room now, it was still Jesse's. Ariana entered the room and asked, "What's for lunch? I'm hungry."

"Don't ask me. Ask Jesse," Jason told her. he thought that Jesse should be in charge of that now. He was just the little girl now. Or so he thought. Jesse should be in charge now.

Ariana left the room and came back a few minutes later. "Jesse says she wants mac and cheese. I'll have that too."

"OK, sounds fine to me."

Ariana waited a few moments. "When are you going to make it?"

Jason realized his mistake. He swapped bodies with Jesse, but he was still Jason. He was still,the boy in charge. It didn't matter if he was the youngest person physically in the house. Resigned he went to the kitchen to make lunch for the three of them. The problem was he was so short he couldn't get the mac and cheese box off the shelf. He called Jesse to help him. She was tall enough to reach the shelf. Jason looked at his old body as it was getting it. He had never seen himself like this before. Especially since his old body was dressed in Jesse's clothes (except they were his size.)

"Hey," Jason said to Jesse, "since you are me, you should be in charge for real. Would you like that?"

"YEAH."

After the swap, Jason was about to go back to Jesse's room to play. Maybe now it would seem like more fun. But before he could go, Jesse asked,"How do you make mac and cheese?" In her head, even though she was in charge now, she was still four years old. Jason realized that if this was going to work, then he would have to give his knowledge to Jesse. He also thought that playing with Jesse's dolls wouldn't be anymore fun this time as last. If he was going to do this right, he would have to swap not only his knowledge but what they liked to do with each other. This was getting more complicated that he had thought.

Maybe he should just make the mac and cheese himself. He had to stand on a chair to reach the faucet to fill a pot with water. He turned the water on. The sound of the water made him pee his diaper. Not being able to control himself was starting to bother Jason, especially since he doesn't know how to change himself anymore.

What happens next?

With the pot full of water, Jason asks Jesse to help him and put it on the stove. A flame was placed under the pot. It would take ten or fifteen minutes for the pot to boil.

"Jesse, I need you to change my diaper," Jason said. His diaper had flooded. The running water made him pee uncontrollably. Jesse followed Jason first into Jerry's room than into his room to find the changing table and diapering supplies. Jason spread his arms to indicate that Jesse should lift him onto the table.

Jason could change his own clothes but didn't know how to change his diaper. That knowledge was specifically swapped with Jerry along with all his potty training abilities. Jesse didn't really know how to change a diaper either. She assumed you had to remove all clothes under your waist to get it off. The only experience she had was when she wore pullups. She wore panties now, mostly.

Once on the table, Jesse pulled off Jason's shoes. Then she opened the button on his pants and pulled them completely off. This exposed the wet diaper to her view. She tried to pull that off, but it was held tight by the fitted tabs. "They won't come off," she remarked.

"I think you have to pull the tabs open," Jason guessed.

Jesse tried to open the tabs gingerly as if they needed to be reapplied later. Seeing Jesse struggle, Jason suggested, "You might have to rip them."

Jesse did as requested and pulled off the diaper. She saw Jason's penis for the first time in her life. "What is that?" she remarked.

"It's my di..., it's my pee pee," Jason corrected himself in mid sentence.

"What's it for?"

Jason didn't know how to explain or if he should. "Hey why not swap all we know?" Jason suggested. This might Jesse to be in charge. If she knew what he knew, then she could do what he could. Like make the mac and cheese.

"That's a good idea." And the switch of knowledge happened. Jesse now knew everything that Jason had known. She knew what the penis was and everything that Jason picked up in school and elsewhere. Strangely enough changing a diaper wasn't included in the knowledge. Jason was less help now than he had been. His knowledge had been reduced to that of a four year old.

Jesse called out to Ariana (her eight year old sister) to help. Ariana knew quite a bit more than either Jesse or Jason when it came to the subject of diaper changes. Ariana had paid more attention when mom diapered Jerry, plush she had a doll that 'required changing'. Although it used velcro straps instead of sticky plastic ones.

Between Jesse's larger body and Ariana's diapering insights they got the diaper on. It wasn't as tight in the waist as it should have been, but Jason's pants would keep it up. Although it might leak. (Both Jesse and Ariana had forgotten to use a baby wipe to clean Jason's privates.) Jason's pants were pulled on and he was sent on his way.

Jesse returned to the kitchen to finish the preparation of the mac and cheese. She knew exactly how to make it now. Jason returned to Jesse's room. He now knew all the names of Jesse's dolls and stuffed animals. As well as how to play with them. But that didn't make playing with them any more fun. Ariana returned to watching TV as she had been before.

What happened next?

You decide upon Ariana, she is half your age and has a much smaller amount of chores mainly due to not being able to do most the more maintenance based chores around the house, that meant you should also have less chores in that regard. However the main attraction of swapping with Ariana was that you would still have a degree of independence and wouldn't be confined to limited movement such as if you swapped with Jerry or Jesse. You made your way to Ariana's room to ask her if she wanted to swap only to find when you gently pushed the door open she had her face buried in one of her pillows and you could swear you heard her crying.

You pushed the door open a bit more and asked softly "are you okay Ariana?", she sniffed "yes, just go away" it was quite obvious she was fighting back tears. You walked into her room a little siting down on the chair next to her desk "you sure, because you don't seem okay, i can help you" you say. Ariana pulled her head off of her pillow and looks at you, her face is red and it's clear she's been crying for a little while "boys are so mean!" she said almost shouting. "Are they giving you a hard time?" you asked "yeah..." she sniffed "just because they're bigger than me they think they can pick on me and my friends!". It then struck you, you could solve her bullying problem and get the swap you wanted in one go, all you needed was to convince Ariana it's a good idea.

"well i can help with that" you reply, "how?" she says as if she doesn't believe you. "well i need you to keep this a secret but i just got a superpower that allows me to swap things with people" you continue, Ariana seemed skeptical however was still at the age where she could be convinced of anything provided you have a half decent explanation. You fill her in on the power how it works and how you have tested it so far and it works however you don't mention that you need permission so you have something to fall back on., "So, if i swap our bodies, you'll be big and strong and you can stand up to the bullies!" you finish your explanation.

Ariana wipes her eyes and smiles "okay let's do it!" she replies, You focus on the swap and then as you open your eyes you have shrunk down to your sisters height of 4 foot 1 and inch, everything seems so much smaller now, you look at your hands that seems so small now and as you look up her Brunette ponytail whips around and smacks you in the neck, you are now in your sisters body. Jesse looks at herself and flexes an arm muscle, "Thanks Jason" she says with your deep voice however before you can respond she begins talking "although i look silly in this big body with a dress on, can we swap that too?" she asks to which you simply focus and now you were wearing the yellow dress and flip flops she had been wearing additionally there was also now a yellow ribbon tied around your pony tail.

"Alright now we look right, thanks Jason!" she said giving you a hug you told her it was no big deal and left her room, as you walked you still felt Jerry's diapers wrapped around your waist so you assumed that your potty training (or lack thereof) hadn't been swapped away, You left Ariana's room satisfied with your swap despite being in her clothes you thought that this was going to be fun.

The rest of your day after swapping with Ariana was fun, you played with your siblings, swapped Dad back with Theresa when he got back from his date, you weren't asked to wash up the dishes after dinner because you couldn't see over the counter and in general you had a blast, despite having an accident before bed time. Waking up groggily in the morning you raised your hand to your head to find your hand to be much smaller than you remembered then it came back to you what had happened yesterday, the swapping with your brother, dad and Theresa then the swap with Ariana. Sniffing the air you could smell that overnight you had used your diaper which frustrated you slightly but you knew you couldn't do anything about that. Getting out of bed was different your feet didn't touch the ground so there was a bit of a rush when you were falling to the ground.

Walking over to your wardrobe you once again saw that it was filled with Ariana's clothes, looking down at the pink pajamas you were wearing you decided that since you had already gone this far you may as well dress to suit your body. Grabbing a pink T shirt with a love-heart on it and a similar skirt to hide the bulge coming from the diaper as well as a pink ribbon and white socks you made your way to the Nursery where your Diaper had been changed before, on the way you encountered Ariana who had finished getting ready for primary school "Hey Jason!" she said waving from down the hall "Hello Ariana" you replied in your high pitch voice. As you got closer Ariana sniffed the air "want some help?" she asked, blushing you nodded. Once in the nursery you got helped up onto the changing table and then Ariana changed your diaper as she had for Jerry before "want me to do your hair in a pony tail with your ribbon too?" she asked again you nodded.

Once Ariana was finished you got changed into your clothes and then walked into the Kitchen where Jerry was in his high chair being fed breakfast by your mum "Breakfast is on the table for everyone, Jason make sure your bag is packed and you make it to the bus stop in time". You talked with Ariana and Jerry for most of the time you spent having breakfast, once finished you left to your room to find your school bag which had swapped to be Ariana's bag which had a similar Pink with a love-heart design to the pajamas you wore last night. Checking all your things were in the bag (you found a diaper and changing supplies as well) you slung it over your shoulder and headed downstairs, putting on Ariana's pink Velcro sneakers that lit up if you clicked them together you and Theresa left for the bus stop.

Theresa kept talking about how you were the best brother ever for helping win Dad over so she could date Tim, which you found funny given your situation. Once at the bus stop Theresa stopped talking to you in favour of talking to her friends which didn't bother you much, eventually the bus arrived and you got on it was a little daunting at first given your relative size to everything however you were relieved when you heard the voice of your friend Susan waving to you from the middle of the bus. You quickly made your way to Susan who had saved you a seat and behind her were your friends were Brian and Geoff, the seat next to Susan was just above your hips so with a bit of a jump you managed to get up onto the seat next to Susan "Hey Jason, nice outfit did you pick it yourself?" she asked, smiling you replied "yeah". Susan was wearing a plaid skirt and top with grey leggings and some half inch heeled boots "i like your outfit too" you added "thanks!" she replied.

The rest of the bus ride was spent catching up with your friends, you felt glad that they didn't act out of the ordinary due to your different appearance but as far as they knew nothing was different. Once the bus arrived at school you encountered....

Once the bus arrived at the school you and your friends got off the bus, like everything else the school seemed much larger which took your focus away from the group of students who you were walking past. Suddenly while your attention was elsewhere a leg came out from the group and tripped you up causing you to fall on your face, you could hear laughter behind you as the group pointed at your diaper which was now exposed "oh my god he's still wearing them the little sissy!" You heard a boy named Drew yell, "he looks like my annoying brat of a sister!" a girl named Heather said with a snigger.

Your friends quickly came to help you and as Susan offered you a hand to get up she asked "are you alright?" you nodded although you could feel your knees and hands were grazed, "what was that for?" Geoff shouted, ignoring him Drew began to taunt you asking "can't stand up for yourself huh?, need your friends to do it for you hey sissy?" what happened next took him by surprise as Susan walked up to him and kneed him in his crotch. Jason took a doll and played with her using this as a way to get her to swap with him so he started a conversation while playing with her “hey Jesse have you ever wondered what it is like to be a big kid like me?” You asked while playing with the doll

“Yes I have” she responded instantly while playing with her doll enjoying the time she was having with him since he never played with her

“Would you like to see what it is like to be treated like a big kid for once” Jason asked getting to the point he wanted to

“What do you mean?” Jesse asked

“What if I told you that I could make you be treated like me and me you and all you have to do is accept” Jason responded

“Like pretend?” Jesse asked confused about this whole conversation and just wanting to go back to playing with you but you stopped all of a sudden.

“Yeah like pretend, so would you like to pretend to be the big brother while I be the little sister for a while” you say making it sound like a game since she doesn’t quite get what you are saying.

Theresa looked at him and quickly rushed to his side "well, not by yourself of course but you can help me make some lunch". It had worked he was now being treated like his four year old sister.

Theresa walked with him to the kitchen and asked if he wanted mac and cheese like he always does, he accepted as he knew that most four year olds especially Jesse would be more than content with having mac and cheese. Going along with it Jason grabbed them and climbed on almost reaching the ceilings, he was shown how to use a measuring cylinder and a big fuss was made when he poured it in without spilling. once he was finished the food was put on the table and he began eating, Theresa had made herself some as well and started eating with Jason.

Just when Jason was halfway finished his lunch Jesse came flying down the stairs and asked Theresa if she could make her lunch to which she responded "you're 16 do it yourself" a big grin stretched across Jesse's face as she finally realised that you could in fact make it so people treated them as each other, as Jesse walked into the kitchen Theresa turned to you "do you want me to braid your hair after lunch?", which caught you off guard a little you however said yes and went to take your bowl to the kitchen as you had finished.

you found Jesse using the steps to grab a packet of cookies out of the cupboard, she noticed you and got down "it worked!, Theresa thinks I'm 16!" she said bouncing up and down "yeah and she just asked me if i wanted my hair braided" you replied "Wow really?, whatever you did must be really powerful!" Jesse was really enjoying this "can we pretend more?" she asked "what do you mean?" you inquired "well if you are going to get your hair braided you won't be able to do much with your short hair, so maybe we could swap hair?" she asked. You thought about what she said "oh also we could swap clothes so you are even more like me, or both!" it sounded interesting and her point about the hair braiding had some merit to it

"so can we swap more? it will be fun!" she asked

you decided that since you had already swapped with Jerry you may as well keep swapping with him. you walked around the house until you found Jerry and you eventually found him playing in his room, you stood in the door frame waiting for him to notice you. he quickly noticed you standing there and put his toys down, "i don't want to swap back potty training yet big bro" he said confidently. I'd like a break" Jerry was confused, "what do you mean?" he asked "i am asking that we swap the way we are treated and our responsibilities". Jerry proposed

"i don't know" Theresa replied, it was then that she remembered that in the past when she went with dad and mum that Jerry would get tired and refuse to walk any further "actually, best bring him in the carrier, we don't want him getting tired", your heart sunk Theresa unknowingly just doomed you to a fate so humiliating it was worse than death, your mum carried you to the car and put you in the booster seat, while she went to grab the carrier, Theresa sat in the passengers seat and waited, your mum returned with the carrier and put it in the back with you, before getting in the drivers seat.

you spent the entire car ride dreading this, seeing the carrier right next to you, then you stopped in the parking lot. you wanted to escape but you were stuck in the booster seat, you saw you mum open the door next to you and put on the carrier and then walk over to your door and unfasten you from the booster seat, she then picked you up and put you in the carrier before locking you up, you were prone and unable to move, hanging there from your mum's chest "okay Theresa dear we need to go to the grocery shop first to get stuff for the week and then we will go to the dry cleaners, the walk to the shops was mortifying you had no control you were just hanging there along for the ride, your mum just acted like nothing was different, she discussed things with Theresa looked for the best deals, this annoyed you when she would lean over making you feel like you were falling.

your mum and Theresa were about half way through the shop when you felt something bad in your stomach you had become a custom to this feeling you needed to poop, you were about to warn your mum but then you did it there and then, it wasn't more than 30 seconds until your mum smelt it "oh no, smells like somebody couldn't help themselves" she handed the trolley to Theresa, "i need to go change Jason keep shopping", Theresa simply nodded.

your mum made her way to the mothers changing room in the supermarkets bathroom area, and undid the carrier, "its okay Jason you'll get the hang of it eventually", she then proceeded to change your diaper, before putting you back into the carrier, she met back up with Theresa who was almost finished. At the checkout as your mum was paying the lady at the checkout commented on you "aw isn't he so cute?" this slightly irked you but you brushed it off, on your way to the car you began to think, did you really hate the carrier, if you were honest this is what you wanted when you wanted to be treated like you were younger and you should have known that if you were treated like Jerry you'd have to do what Jerry used to do.

That's right it was Sunday today meaning everyone would be gone tomorrow except for you and your mum, you then fell asleep wondering what tomorrow would be like with no school. When you woke up you smelt something truly awful, then you sat up and heard not to mention felt the squelching coming from your diaper, you had obviously gone over night without realising, however it was never this bad usually somebody was there to clean you up and change you but this was horrible it was soaked and filled with your own shit, luckily your mum was walking by and saw you were up and came to let you out of the cot.

"rise and shine sleepy head" she said cheerily until she picked you up and smelt what you had done over night, "oh that's a nasty one lets get you changed" she picked you up and took you to the nursery where she changed your diaper, you were glad to have got that out of the way as it was far from pleasant. when you were done getting your diaper changed your mum carried you to the dinner table where she placed you in the high chair "I'll get you breakfast in a minute Jason i just need to do a few things quickly", you then saw your mum walk over to the nursery to dispose of all your used diapers.

also at the table was your brother Jerry who had made himself cereal despite making a massive mess of it "hi little bro" Jerry spoke up "hi Jerry" you replied "so hows being me?" he asked "you replied with "I am actually enjoying it a lot" you replied, this shocked causing Jerry to look at you confused "really, what about the high chair and being carried in the carrier? , surely you don't like having no potty training?" he asked "when i thought about it the carrier was actually fun it also made me feel safe, sure the being fed in the high chair wasn't all great, but hey i wanted to be treated like you and be your size so you know why not, it's different for a change... but yes having no potty training sucks but hey roll with the punches" you replied "okay then" Jerry replied a little surprised continuing he said "if i didn't know any better i'd say you still want to be me today" you instantly replied saying "yeah i do".

Jerry laughed a little and went back to eating his cereal, a minute later your mum placed a bowl of cereal and a sippy cup in front of you and started to feed you, half way through your breakfast Jerry finished his and your mother spoke up "what are you doing Jerry put your bowl in the sink and clean up your mess, then get ready for school your bus will be here in an hour" Jerry was taken back by this, he never had to clean up after himself before he didn't know what to do, also he knew by trading responsibilities and treatment with Jason he'd have to go to high school but then it dawned on him, he didn't know what he had to do or what to pack.

meanwhile Jason was enjoying his breakfast he found it funny how his mum who was so serious to him in the past was talking to him in this cheery way it was quite enjoyable to watch, he also saw Jerry take his bowl to the sink and then struggle to clean up his mess he left on the table eventually your mum told him to just leave it saying she'd clean it up.

once you had finished breakfast she took you upstairs and changed you into some cargo shorts and a t-shirt, she then left to deal with the rest of your family and clean up after Jerry, after she left Jerry showed up in your room "hey little bro i need some help" Jerry asked he was obviously worried. you followed him to his room and saw that it had also changed, in the same ways yours had but in reverse "i don't know what to do for school" he said desperately
