you didn't want to swap away your knowledge with him, sure you wanted to be treated like a toddler but you didn't want to think like one, you then showed him his timetable and explained how it worked and how it would help him, after a while you think he understood to the best of his abilities, he was packed for school and knew what he had to do once he was there "okay so now you are packed you should probably have a shower and get dressed", Jerry left the room looking for mum "what are you doing you asked "I'm going to get mum she gives me baths and changes me" she replied as if it was obvious "not any more remember, I'm the two year old she dresses and bathes me you are the 14 year old she wouldn't help you!", that's when it dawned on Jerry this was going to be a lot harder than he thought "can you help me?" he asked.

you being the good brother you were decided you would help him, "well i can't explain a shower to you and effectively get you to do it by yourself in 30 minutes so for now deodorant will have to do" you said as you pointed to the metal can on his desk "first take off your shirt", this took some effort but eventually you two got it off him "now press the red thing on the top with the little hole pointed at your armpit" Jerry managed to do it however he sprayed a bit too much, this would take some work. next you tried to explain to him how to get changed, it took a while but you two successfully did it.

when you two were done there was about 5 minutes left until the bus arrived, you two walked downstairs and saw the rest of your siblings either ready for school or just finishing up their breakfast. Theresa gave you a hug and told Jerry that they should probably head off to the bus stop now, and with that they were gone a few minutes later your dad left for work giving you a hug as well, and then soon after your mum called out to your other sisters "girls time for school lets get in the car!" the girls raced to the car and your mum picked you up and carried you to the car where she put you in the booster seat, Jesse also sat in a booster seat but hers was more like a cushion that made her sit higher and she buckled herself in.

your mum got in the drivers seat and headed off, first she dropped off Ariana to primary school and then she dropped off Jesse to Preschool before heading back home, when you got home she unbuckled you from your booster seat and let you play with Jerry's toys for a bit, you noticed that the entire time she was home she was working, doing chores and house work she didn't take a break, this allowed you to appreciate what she did for you every day.

around lunch she picked you up again and put you in the high chair once more for lunch, she fed you macaroni and cheese, which you hadn't enjoyed in a while but suddenly it was nice and tasty maybe it was because your mum made it, after you were finished she left you in the highchair and cleaned up lunch then she sat down again and asked "so do you want to go to the park?", this sounded like fun to you as all you had been able to do for entertainment so far was play with Jerry's toys which was getting a bit boring. your mother left and returned with the baby carrier and her handbag, she lifted you from the high chair and put you in the carrier, once again, she slung the purse over her shoulder and walked out the door being sure to lock it.

you had gotten used to the baby carrier after your shopping trip yesterday and had come to enjoy it you felt happy like this, you felt as if you were flying almost looking down on most things, you see how most 2 year olds would find it fun and then laughed to yourself as you realised that like those 2 year olds you too were enjoying this, you enjoyed the entire kilometer and a half walk to the park where your mum sat down on a bench and undid the carrier letting you out, and then taking it off "go play, mummy will just be here if you need me like always".

you ran off to the play equipment that they had set up, and had a blast it had been forever since you had done this, you joined some of the other kids playing here and joined their game of tag, when you made it to the top you saw that your mum was resting on the bench just reading a book, this made you smile, from what you saw earlier today she does a lot of hard work and not only is this a break for you but a break for her. your concentration on your mum was quickly broken by a 3 year old girl who tapped you on the back and yelled "you're it".

after an hour you felt a familiar feeling in your bladder you needed to pee!, you took the slide to get to your mum but as soon as you got to the bottom you couldn't hold any longer and drenched your diaper, you made your way over to your mum and asked to be changed. your mum put down her boo and realised that you had wet yourself, she put her book away and picked up her purse and the carrier and walked you over to the bathrooms where there was a mothers changing area in which she changed your diaper and then disposed of the wet one.

as you left the changing area she looked at her watch "well it's about time we were heading off anyway", she put on the carrier and lifted you up to put you in it and fastened you in, she started walking home but then you realsied she wasn't walking home, she was walking to the shops, you were confused by this because she went shopping yesterday, however when she got there she went to the confectionery isle where all the lollies were and stopped at the chocolate bars "because you have been such a good boy today i will let you choose one" she said, this made you happy and you pointed to the caramel Kit Kat, she leant over leaving you in a falling motion for a moment until she got back up, she took to the counter and bought it for you, she opened it and handed it to you "now what do we say?" she asked "thank you she replied and walked home, you enjoyed the walk home even more now, when you got home your mum headed straight to your room and then let you out of the carrier and put you into your cot to take a nap
115211222112211122121111221.title: help him pack and explain school to him

choices: No!, everything was so hard and everyone thought i was dumb!
yeah, everything was fine, no matter what i did or said things were fine
1152112221122111221211112211.content:
you woke up about 3 hours later from your nap and were glad you hadn't used your diaper in that time, you called out for your mum asking to be let out, she came by a minute later to let you out, "there we go, how was my big boys nap?" you looked at her and simply replied with "good" and walked out to the living room and climbed up the couch, finding the remote you turned on the TV and set it to Thomas the tank engine, it was nostalgic watching these old TV shows that you used to love as a kid, they hadn't exactly kept up because it was all predictable and inconsequential but then again the same could be said about what you watch now.

after half an hour the door opened, with Jerry and Theresa walking through the door, Jerry walked up to his room immediately. you decided you would see how he went at school today considering the whole episode this morning however as you did Theresa got in your way to give you a hug "thanks for the help with dad not liking Tim yesterday" you quickly shrugged the compliment off trying to get out of her hug. "so how was your day what did you do?", you could tell she wasn't going to let you go until you answered "i went to the park!, i played tag and ran around for like forever!" you replied "really?" she asked in a hyped up tone "lucky you" you could tell that she was about to bombard you with so many questions you'd die before she stopped but you were saved by her phone going off "oh that's Tim's ring tone!" she squealed before running off to answer it in her room.

you made your way up the stairs to Jerry's room where he was sitting on his bed, "hey Jerry how was school? was everything okay?", Jerry looked up at you "..."
1152112221122111221211112211.title: wake up later in the afternoon

11521122211221112212111122111.content:
"No!, everything was so hard and everyone thought i was dumb!" Jerry replied, it seemed that due to not swapping your intelligence with him, you doomed him to a bad day, he knew nothing and was suddenly expected to know 12 years worth of extra knowledge, he must have had it really rough "well you are home now" you said softly. you couldn't come up with anything to say to him you felt a bit of guilt, you could have prevented this but it would have cost your intelligence and who knows what else it was here where you saw how truly dependent on mum he was.

"how was your day?" he asked, you were up against a wall here, he was down in the dumps you can't just go and say you had an excellent time it would make him feel even worse "you know pretty average, mum forgot to take me out of the high chair after lunch" you said trying to keep a straight face. This didn't help, you enjoyed being young in fact you were having a blast, however your brother needed your mum and it wasn't like she could just go with him to high school so you decided that you should probably offer to swap back "hey Jerry if you want we can swap back and everything will be normal again"
11521122211221112212111122111.title: No!, everything was so hard and everyone thought

115211222112211122121111221112.content:
Jerry wiped away his tears that were starting to roll down his cheeks in an attempt to hide them from you "NO!", this surprised you "why not?" you asked. "because i enjoy being tall and the older brother, and i don't ever want to mess myself ever again!" he said sternly, he was still a 2 year old on the inside and it was showing he was about to throw a tantrum "okay then i get it" you say softly trying to calm him down, trying to distract him you remember the struggles you had this morning "how about i teach you how to shower?" you offer.

this was enough to calm him down at least a bit, he mutters "okay" while sulking, you try your best to teach him how to shower himself, this is hard and it goes nowhere for the most part (mainly because he kept trying to play with the bubbles), however you think he got the core concept of how to do it himself and this managed to calm him down. After that you help him to get changed "thanks for helping me little bro" Jerry says smiling "i have an idea that i think will be fun!" he says "what is it?" you ask "lets play outside!" this didn't seem to outlandish but you decided to go with it when you got outside you expected him to want to play catch or run around but instead he picks you up and runs carrying you around "you're flying!" he yells.

this carries on for half an hour or so, and when he is tired he puts you down in the baby swing on the swing set you have in the backyard and starts pushing "was it fun?" he asks "yeah it was amazing" you replied "where did that idea come from I've never done that for you?" you ask, he smiled "dad does it for me, i love it but i'm too big to do it now but i thought that maybe you might like it" you laugh a little "well you got that right" you answer "hey little bro" Jerry asks,"yeah?" you answer "how high do you want to go?" he asks, you smile and say "as high as i can go" you had a blast on the swings with your brother he carried you around running some more and you played some other games here and there but it eventually became dark and your mum ushered you guys in for dinner.

as you came in your mother knelt down, and picked you up "did you and your brother have fun playing outside? she asked, "yeah we did i flew and went in the swings" you replied as she placed you in the high chair "well then it seems like you've had a big day, you'll get a lot of sleep tonight!" she says with the cheery voice you had become accustomed to, everyone arrived at their leisure and sat down, just as your mum placed all the dishes on the table your father dashed through the front door "sorry i'm late' he said as he sat down still puffing.

you were enjoying your spaghetti that was again fork-fed to you when your mum put down the fork with your food on it "oh i just remembered, while Jason was down for his nap i got a call from the Jones's asking if we were still able to make it to their Halloween party" Jason had completely forgotten about it until now he had no idea what he was going to go as even more so now, it's on Thursday night so make sure you have your costumes ready and if you need me to pick something up for your costume let me know".
115211222112211122121111221112.title: no!

1152112221122111221211112211121.content:
as dinner was being finished up everyone brought their plates into the kitchen and mum started washing up, she had forgotten about you though, so you were sat there in the high chair waiting "Theresa help me with the washing up!" she called, Theresa groaned "ughh really mum, do i have to?" Theresa asked, "yes you do Theresa, come on i do stuff like this plus so much more every day you could at least help out a little" your mum replied. you could hear this all and it was starting to get pretty heated, and then you heard the big one "you have it so much easier!" Theresa screamed "i would kill to just stay home do a few chores and look after Jason it'd be a breeze!" that's when your mum responded "yeah right, you'd be begging me to go back to school in a day" she replied "however this is real life not some freaky Friday stuff" we can't prove it to each other, however both you and Theresa knew that wasn't true, at least not for your family.

Theresa stormed off to find you and saw you in your high chair "oh god I'm so sorry Jason it looks like we forgot you" Theresa apologised "its okay" you reply, then she carries you over to the kitchen, we can do that mum, with some help from Jason!" your mother laughed "how?", "Jason has a swapping power!" she replied "yes dear and I'm the queen of England" this annoyed Theresa "fine I'll prove it" she turned to you and said "swap our clothes" you agreed and you two swapped clothes, this took your mother by shock "my gosh Jason you're wearing her dress except it's sized for your little 2 year old body!" This confirmed your suspicions, about your power that you had when you first got it, you only notice a swap if it involves you or you are present for it.

"see i told you" Theresa said in a confident voice "he can swap things between people so long as he has your permission" Teresa continued, "i would say this is unreal but it is very real" your mum said still in shock "have you used it much?" she asked "he only used it to help me prove a point to dad about Tim". after your mum regained her composure and you swapped clothes back with Theresa your mum asked "so let me guess we will be using his power to swap places for a day?" Theresa simply replied with "yep"

your mum wrote up a list of things that Theresa needed to do tomorrow and then they got ready to swap "so just to clarify we are swapping: responsibilities, lives and clothes for some reason" your mum asked "yep" Theresa replied, you swapped all those things and then suddenly Theresa was in her mum's clothes and vice versa "so 'mum' it's time you got to washing up" your mother said in a joking manner, you and your mum walked to the living room where you sat down and played with Jesse and mum watched TV with dad Jerry and Ariana.

a little while later you felt the familiar feeling in your gut and bladder again you got up and ran to your mum for help but then you couldn't hold it in any longer, you had messed and wet yourself again. your dad quickly smelt this and called Theresa "Theresa honey Jason needs a change" Theresa popped her head out of the kitchen after just finishing the washing "okay got it" she walked over and picked you up "oh and honey its about time he has his bath also and then goes to bed you forgot to give him a bath last night" your dad added "okay i got it" Theresa replied, as you were being carried away you could see your mum put her feet up and smile.

"this isn't too bad now Jason is it, much easier than having to go to high school isn't it, although you wouldn't know would you" she said aloud "don't worry Theresa you'll manage" you replied showing your vote of confidence, "thanks Jason" after you were cleaned up you didn't get a diaper put on you instead you had your pants put back on and you were carried to the bath, where Theresa bathed you, before drying you off and putting a diaper on you, she carried you to your room and then changed you into pajamas before putting you to sleep in your cot
1152112221122111221211112211121.title: drama between mum and Theresa

choices: She forgot to bring a spare diaper!
11521122211221112212111122111211.content:
You woke up the next morning with the familiar but unpleasant smell of a full diaper, Theresa was up earlier than normal because she had to be mum today "morning Jason, oh you smell lets get you changed" she said carrying you to the nursery to get your diaper changed "god i am tired" Theresa complained "have some coffee, you need to be awake when mum is up so she thinks you find this easy" you reply "good idea" Theresa replied giving you a high five when she finishes changing your diaper, she carries you to the high chair in which she places you and goes to the coffee machine, she sets it to make some coffee while she makes you breakfast.

She returns with a mug of coffee and a bowl of cereal, she alternates between spoon feeding you the cereal and drinking her coffee, once done she takes both the mug and the bowl away and starts cleaning them. just as she leaves Jerry makes his way to the table "i had a shower by myself little bro and got dressed by myself" you looked him up and down, he had his shirt on the wrong way around and his hair was still wet "good job although your shirt is the wrong way around "really?" he asks before he takes it off to put back on, he struggles a bit but manages to get it on the fourth time, "can you help me pack after breakfast?" he asks "sure" you reply

Theresa makes her way out of the kitchen and sees Jerry "Jerry I've decided to make some bacon and eggs for breakfast would you like some?" you were annoyed by this, how come you didn't get any? "Jason want to help me cook?" she asks "sure" you reply she picks you up out of the chair and sits you down on the bench "i need somebody to test the bacon make sure it isn't poison" she says jokingly, your face lights up when you hear this and she sees it, you watch her make breakfast and occasionally talk about something here and there.

After you have had your fill of bacon you see that Jerry is finished with his breakfast and heads upstairs, you ask to get down off the bench and follow him. you meet him in his room where he has his timetable out, you help him out with packing and then talk to him for a bit before your mum calls for Jerry saying That they need to go to school, Jerry says good bye and you wish him luck with school today, you make your way downstairs to see your dad give Theresa a kiss on the cheek before heading off, Then Theresa calls for Ariana and Jesse, to get in the car. you found Theresa and she carried you to the car where she buckled you into the booster seat before she got in the drivers seat, that was when you remembered she only had her provisional license and hadn't driven much, for once you were glad to be in the booster seat.

The driving while a bit worse than your mum's was still good enough that you didn't crash, she dropped off your sisters and you noticed that when they left the car both sisters referred to her as 'mummy', you could tell that this shocked Theresa as well. when you got home you asked Theresa to be pushed on the swing, she put you in the baby swing and started pushing, while also reading the checklist that she had to do, ten minutes later she stopped pushing "okay Jason we are going to stop with the swing for now, i need to do the washing and hang out stuff to dry, I'll push you when i'm hanging the clothes up on the clothes line". she took you from the swing set and placed you on the ground where you just sat down for a while imagining stuff, 20 minutes later Theresa returned with a basket full of clothes, she grabbed you and put you in the swing again and started pushing, she hung the clothing and pushed you on the swings which took her a while since she had to do both, when she was done she let you off the swing and started working around the house, you watched TV until she found you for lunch.

"Alright Jason time for lunch" she said as she turned off the TV, she picked you up and put you in the high chair, she made jam sandwiches for both of you, hers was intact while yours was cut into quarters, she let you eat this by yourself which you didn't mind. "alright apparently after lunch we go to the park and then go shopping for some of the things we missed out on when we went shopping on Sunday, which isn't much" she said aloud while looking at you "yeah that's right" you replied, Theresa left and returned with one of mum's handbags and the baby carrier. The carrier took some adjustment but Theresa got it on and placed you in it, with that you set off for the park.

The walk gave you time to think about how much this power had changed your life and your attitude towards it, aside from the obvious things there was your new relationship with your sister, while you had never really been at each others throats before you had the power you weren't all that close but now you were strapped to her chest on the way to the park and now that she thought you were a toddler she was much nicer to you and for the most part you enjoyed it and part of you wished that this new life you had could be permanent. once you arrived at the park Theresa sat down at a bench and let you out of the carrier, however before she let you run off she pulled a plastic bag out of the handbag she brought and it contained small plastic shovels and buckets, she then looked at you and asked "would you like to go play in the sand pit together?" your face lit up and you gave her a hug, you don't know why but the idea of making sand castles with your older sister sounded like so much fun because you hadn't done that kind of thing in ages.

You spent the entire time at the park having a blast with Theresa making holes in the sand and making castles, you had so much fun and it just made this new life so much more appealing as a permanent thing in your life. after about an hour and a half of playing in the sand Theresa looked at her watch and realised that you two had been here longer than she planned "oh no, sorry Jason we have to go now we've been here for half an hour longer than planned", this actually made you somewhat sad as you were really enjoying this, however you knew it had to end eventually so you packed up the tools and buckets. Theresa stood up and brushed off her dress and then brushed off your clothes, then put the tools back in the plastic bag as to not get sand in the purse. She then put the carrier back on and placed you in it before slinging the purse over her shoulders and walking to the shops, the shops were only about a kilometer away which didn't take too long in which time Theresa talked to you about how she was enjoying being mum and that you were making it very easy for her.

Once you arrived at the shops Theresa shopped around for a few things that she missed with mum the other day however when she was halfway down her list you felt it, that horrid feeling in your gut that you had come to recogise as you needing to poo, "Theresa" you managed to say before your bowels could no longer hold and you messed yourself. Theresa smelt it pretty quickly "oh god that does not smell good" she muttered "don't worry we'll get you changed" she opened her handbag and...
11521122211221112212111122111211.title: your day with Theresa

choices: checking in on jerry when he gets home
115211222112211122121111221112112.content:
A sour look spread across Theresa's face as she looked up from her handbag you couldn't see her face but because you weren't moving and she wasn't saying anything you knew something was wrong "what's wrong" you asked, her voice sounded weak "I'm sorry Jason i forgot to bring a spare diaper", this took you by surprise and it wasn't good "i can go get a new one from the baby needs isle but they won't let me use it until i buy it so you'll be stuck in that dirty diaper for a few minutes i'm sorry" she said obviously disappointed with herself, you remained quiet.

Theresa did her best to find everything quickly but even with that it was still 10 minutes before you were at the checkout and those ten minutes felt like an hour and the smell got worse and worse as it lingered in the air, people gave Theresa bad looks and whispered to themselves quietly, you could tell that Theresa had noticed too. a few minutes later you and Theresa were in the changing room with the purchased items in paper bags leaned up against the changing table, once Theresa had cleaned you up and changed your diaper she started to cry a little, and she gave you a hug "i'm sorry for that Jason" she sobbed "i can't believe i was so irresponsible, maybe mum was right i don't know how hard her job is" she cried weakly. "it's okay Theresa, you replied "we all forget things sometimes, you have been perfect up until this point so what if you made one mistake it isn't the end of the world"

Theresa smiled tears still falling down her cheeks "thank you Jason" she got up and wiped away her tears "well then we have to get going i need to get dinner ready and change everyone's sheets" she said with a bit more energy in her voice, she picked you up and placed you in the carrier and started walking home, on the way home you fell asleep, you had played a lot with Theresa today, on the swings and at the park you needed some rest. once you got home Theresa put you in your cot and resumed her duties around the house.
115211222112211122121111221112112.title: She forgot to bring a spare diaper!

1152112221122111221211112211121121.content:
you woke up about 2 or so hours later when you heard your mum and Jerry walking through the front door, you stand up in your cot waiting for somebody to come past who will let you out and sure enough Jerry walks past and sees you standing there "want some help?" he asks "yeah that would be great" you respond, he walks over to the cot and lifts you out and heads to his room, you follow him and enter his room "so was school any better today?" you asked "a bit, i just didn't talk much and tried to hide from people "well at least it's a little better" you say halfheartedly.

Jerry lists some of the things that annoyed him here and there and other details from school then he remembered something "oh that"s right, i was told these are 'due' tomorrow" he said as he pulled some sheets of paper out of his bag, you recognised it as homework "that Jerry is homework, and if it is due tomorrow that means it needs to be done by tomorrow and given to the teacher", Jerry looked at you "what school at home?" he asked that sucks!.

you looked through the sheets of paper, most of it was math questions but there was some art stuff there, "okay Jerry I'll tell you what, you do the art and I'll do the math" Jerry agreed because the less work he had to do the better, The math questions weren't that hard it was mostly stuff you'd done before but you put in your best effort, Jerry meanwhile drew a dragon for art however the dragon looked a lot like a snake with disproportionate wings however it was the best you were going to get so with that you two were finished.

as the homework was done you two left his room and went to the yard to play around until you heard Theresa call everyone for dinner, you walked up to Theresa who when she saw you knelt down and gave you a hug before lifting you up and into the high chair, dinner tonight was a curry of sorts you weren't sure what kind but you enjoyed it and being spoon fed by Theresa none the less.
1152112221122111221211112211121121.title: checking in on jerry when he gets home

choices: the next morning with mum, clothes shopping
the next morning sombody wants to swap/you want to swap with sombody
11521122211221112212111122111211211.content:
As everyone finished up their dinner Theresa started collecting everyone's plates and wiped down the table, after which she let you out of the highchair and called out to your mum to help her in the kitchen. when your mum arrived she jokingly remarked "so this ends where it started", your sister laughed "i guess it has, however you were right yesterday, this wouldn't be a freaky Friday situation when it was all over because i still feel like i am right" your mum was surprised by this "really?" she asked in skeptical tone. "yeah i actually really enjoyed looking after Jason today and the work was of no major inconvenience it gave me something to do and was in my opinion much easier and simple than things like mathematics", your mum smiled awkwardly "okay I'll give you that one, hanging washing is much easier than calculus".

"I'm not saying your work is simple it is energy draining and it wasn't easy getting up in the morning, and hell it would keep me in shape if i was working around the house all day" Theresa stated, she walked over to her mum with her arms open "can we forget last nights little spat?" Theresa asked. Your mother returned the hug "okay sure", when the hug was over your mother asked "so should we swap back yet as it seems i have some dishes to clean", Theresa chimed in "oh on the topic of swapping back, can we do this every week?", your mum was surprised by this "really, do you actually want to do this every week?" she asked "yeah why not?" theresa asked "i had a blast today and i think Jason enjoyed playing with his big sister at the park today". your mother turned to you "would you like that Jason, if Theresa was your mummy once a week?", you thought about it you had an absolute blast with Theresa today minus the episode at the shops and it would be fun to hang out with your older sister more especially now that you have better relations with her. "yes" you replied, your mum looked back at Theresa "well if jason wants it i don't see why not, it might even be a good break from chores for me" your mum replied.

Theresa picked you up and gave you and your mum a big hug "thank you both!" she cheered, "now Jason swap us back and then i'll help mum with the washing up, i don't want to have to leave her with a curry to clean up" you nodded and then after a series of swaps everything was back to normal between your mum and Theresa. you felt good that your power had made the relationship between your mum and sister better while also reaping rewards at the same time, you made your way to talk with Jerry for a bit. After a little while your mum emerged from the kitchen with Theresa and she picked you up "time for your bath young man" she said as she carried you to the bathroom, when you got to the bathroom your mother stripped you down and took off your diaper and started running the bath "so what did you do today with Theresa?" she asked "Theresa pushed me on the swings while she hung the washing and then we went to the park and played in the sand pit!" you explained, your mum continued with similar conversations like this while she bathed you, "oh and from now on every Tuesday is 'Theresa Tuesday' so on Monday night after dinner you swap us like you did before and then you spend the rest of the time with Theresa as mummy until the same time Tuesday night" your mother explained.

Once your bath was finished you had a fresh diaper put on and then you were taken to your room where you were changed into your Pajamas and then put to bed in your cot.
11521122211221112212111122111211211.title: confrontation between mum and Theresa

choices: A kangaroo costume and you were going to be a joey!
115211222112211122121111221112112111.content:
As you woke up the next morning for once you weren't greeted by the foul smell of urine and fecal matter instead you still had a clean and dry diaper, your mother was already up as per usual and noticed you were up "looks like you had a dry night Jason good job!" she exclaimed. as she picked you up out of the crib and carried you to the high chair, while she walked you realised how easily you were settling into this life, how easily you had accepted being cradled and carried like you are right now.

Upon arriving at the high chair you saw that as usual Jerry was up and eating breakfast, "morning Jerry" you exclaimed cheerily as you were placed in the chair "Morning" he replied sadly. "is there something wrong?" you asked "no" he muttered, you could tell he was quite upset but not why. right on time to break the silence your mum arrived with toast and a coffee and sat down "Jerry you should get ready for school you don't want to be late" she said before turning her focus to you, "guess what Jason we are going shopping today!" she said excitedly, this confused you as you had been shopping quite a few times recently "you will be so surprised when you see the costume i picked for you!" and then it dawned on you that you weren't going shopping for groceries you were going to collect your costumes for the Halloween party and knowing your mum probably also some clothes shopping.

Your mum begun to feed you your breakfast which you really enjoyed, it seems your mum defiantly put more effort into looking after Jerry than she did the rest of you which to be fair was warranted normally Jerry would need more care however this time it was you who needed the care and attention. your mum took longer than usual to feed you as she was talking to Jesse and Ariana about their Halloween costumes which they wanted mum to pick up today, you however weren't paying attention to this as you were focused on seeing what was wrong with Jerry however by the time you were lifted out of the high chair and made your way up to Jerry's room he had left for school with Theresa.

As you left Jerry's room you made your way to the living room where you struggled to climb onto the couch and sat there thinking "what could be making Jerry sad? was it him struggling with school still? or was it something new?" this bugged you for a while however eventually you put the thought to rest as you couldn't do anything about it now, at least not until he got home. you stopped focusing on Jerry's poor mood and instead turned on the TV and switched to some of the older shows you used to watch as a kid reliving those moments gave you a blissful feeling of nostalgia, however that blissful feeling was soon interrupted by a foul stench, you had been so wrapped up in your nostalgia that you didn't even notice you had to go to the toilet.

Luckily for you your mum wasn't too far away and she noticed, promptly picking you up and taking you to get changed, while she changed you she engaged in conversation "so Jason today we are going shopping as you already know, we will leave here after lunch so that we can go there do what we need and then pick up your sisters on the way home" she said as she tapped the diaper up and sat you upright "however we have some time until lunch so would you like to have some fun on the swings?" she asked, you had really enjoyed the swings these past few days and this proposition really excited you, it must be due to your new height everything seems bigger and more exciting this is also probably why you're enjoying the carrier.

After some enjoyment on the swing you had some lunch with mum and then were picked up and placed on the ground next to the high chair as your mum retrieved the carrier and then picked you up heading to the car, she buckled you in and placed the carrier next to you and started driving, while at a set of traffic lights she exclaims "oh that's right!" she said as she proceeds to look at your for a moment before looking at the road again "i forgot to tell you, but on Friday we're meeting up with some of my old college friends and we're going to meet at the park and go for a stroll and most likely have a coffee" this was interesting because you had been treated as a baby by your family and strangers these people had never seen you before although they have heard descriptions about you before would they be confused when they meet you?"

When you arrived at the mall and parked your mum got out of the car and put on the carrier, however it didn't really fit "damn Theresa must have adjusted this thing yesterday" she said aloud which you did remember her doing, your mum struggled for a bit but eventually got it fixed and was able to put you in it. Your mum walked over to the elevator and walked in, once you arrived you were assaulted by the large array of colours and light, you'd never seen the mall like this before, it wasn't just the Halloween decorations it was how large it now seemed the mall was Massive!

Your mum walked over to the costumes store which was quite busy, she walked around for a bit and found the costumes Jesse and Ariana wanted, Jesse wanted to be A princess and Ariana wanted to be a witch, she also picked up a Pirate costume for Jerry and a Roman solider costume for your Dad, Theresa had already chosen an outfit ages ago. she brought them to the counter and payed for them, up until this point you'd been silent however you noticed she didn't have a costume for herself or you "mum what about our costumes?" your mother jumped up a bit "oh goodness i'd forgotten that you were hanging there Jason, you are so quiet, and thank you" she pulled out a receipt of sorts, "i would also like to pick up order 81202" she said sliding the receipt onto the desk, the clerk went into the back and brought back a large bag with a coat hanger, something you'd normally keep a suit in. "you'll look very cute in that" she replied.

your mum stuffed all the costumes into a bag, taking extra care for hers and presumably your costume "so mum what's those costumes?" you asked "okay time to let you in on the surprise, its a ......"
115211222112211122121111221112112111.title: the next morning with mum, clothes shopping

1152112221122111221211112211121121111.content:
"it's a Kangaroo costume for me and you are going to be my Joey!" she exclaimed, This interested you as it was a pair costume she would be Dressed as a kangaroo and you'd be a baby kangaroo in her pouch along for the ride, that sounded pretty cool to you and you had to give your mum props for originality. your mum continued walking and stopped at a coffee shop where she ordered a coffee, she sat down at a table and put you on one of the seats next to her "sorry but they don't have any booster chairs here" your mum apologised "so we still have time so i am going to do a little clothes shopping" your mum declared.

Your mum looked around and noticed that there was an area for kids to play a kind of play area, "hey Jason would you like to play over in the kids area while i enjoy my coffee?" you had been relatively lacking for entertainment today as you hadn't gone to the park yet so this sounded rather appealing to you, she picked you up off the seat and walked you over to the play area and let you have fun. you spent time climbing through the structure going down slides and using the various things to interact with, you eventually noticed that your mum had moved from the coffee shop to one of the tables near the play area, even now she was keeping an eye on you and you liked that.

Eventually when your mum finished her coffee she signaled for you to leave the play area so she could go shopping, you ran along the structure to the slide and slid down you then walked over to your mum and she gave you a hub before putting the carrier back on and placing you in it, she went to all the various clothing stores looking at mostly dresses but also some shoes here and there, she even bought a thing or two which was unusual for her, normally she'd just look at things and comment about how she might get it when it goes on sale or if they had it in a different shade so it was a bit refreshing for her to actually get something at the mall. Every so often your mum would check that you were still awake and asked your opinion but you mainly spent your time looking around at all the clothes.

once your mum was finished shopping around she made her way to the car, once there she buckled you into the booster seat and you were off the whole time she was going on about how she couldn't believe the sales they had and how she thought that you'd look really cute as a joey, when you arrived at the school Jesse and Ariana were waiting, they jumped into the car Jesse in her booster seat on the right and Ariana in the middle "how was your day kids?" your mum asked "good!" Jesse replied "did you get our costumes?" Jesse asked excitedly "yes princess" your mum replied, this made Jesse squeal with joy. "what about you Ariana?" mum asked "some boy made fun of me for being weak just because i'm a girl!, if i was a boy i could easily beat him at anything!" she replied. your mum looked at you and you know why you were thinking the same thing, you could make her a boy by swapping if you wanted.

when you arrived home Jerry and Theresa were just unlocking the door, you were let out of your booster seat and allowed to go inside while Theresa was called to help carry the shopping. Now might be a good time to check on Jerry, or you could help out Ariana.
1152112221122111221211112211121121111.title: A kangaroo costume and you were going to be a joey

11521122211221112212111122111211211111.content:
once you got inside you headed up to Jerry's room, you knocked on his door as you were unable to reach it... no response... "Jerry are you okay?" you asked, eventually you got a response "I'm okay" Jerry replied sobbing "can i come in?" you asked. you heard his bread creak as he got up and started walking over to the door and opened it, you could see on his face he was sad, however in typical kid fashion he was trying to hide it, holding back tears but failing none the less "come in" he said weakly.

"is everything okay?" you say still acting as if you don't know he's crying, he sobs "i don't have any friends" he sobs "i love being a big boy i want to always be the big boy but... i don't have any friends, mummy used to be my friend but she hardly talks to me anymore and she isn't as nice to me as she used to be!" he cries, you can tell he's lonely and why wouldn't he be?, he hasn't ever been to preschool so he doesn't have any friends besides your family, especially mum however your mum now treats him like she treated you and expects him to be independent so she can focus on you. Not only that but now he has to go to high school without any friends, he must be very lonely. "hey that's not true, i'm your friend!" you reply.

Jerry looks at you "but you aren't at school!" he replied, that's when you had an idea "how about we ask Theresa if she can introduce you to some of her friends?" you asked Jerry wiped his tears "i guess" he muttered "come on" you say offering a hand out, Jerry gets up off the bed and takes your hand, having to lean over to grab it and walk without lifting you up, you lead him to Theresa's room and knock on the door, she opens the door and you see that she is sitting at her desk doing homework. she puts her pencil down and says "hello Jason!" she looks up and sees Jerry "hi" she says to him ignoring him, "Did you need something Jason?" she asked. you let go of Jerry's hand and walked up to Theresa "Jerry has been lonely at school lately saying he hasn't got any friends, could you help him by introducing him to your Friends?" you ask, Theresa is mildly confused by this "did you ask him to do this Jerry?" she asks to which Jerry just shakes his head, "Jerry seemed sad, so i wanted to help" you say really playing on the young naivety that Theresa now thought you possessed.

Theresa couldn't resist you in your current state due to the swaps, she got off her chair and knelt down and gave you a hug "you're such a good kid looking out for your older brother" she says before continuing "okay I'll introduce Jerry to them for you, maybe he'll finally get some friends" she replied , you replied "thank you" smiling, Theresa tickled you around your sides "okay now can i please do my homework?" she asked politely smiling. "okay!" you say laughing.

once you and Jerry leave Theresa's room and return to his he picks you up and spins you around before putting you on the ground "thank you" he says giving you a hug "you're the best little brother ever!" he exclaims, "why thank you" you say taking an exaggerated bow "i know how to thank you" Jerry said as he got up, "you know how Mum treats me like you now?" he asked "yeah..." you reply curious what he had in store, "so that means i can go out on my own" he replied getting excited "so that means i can go take you to the park!" he claimed and as he said it he jumped in the air. That sounded awesome to you so you excitedly replied "yeah!" Jerry put his shoes back on with some struggle and ran downstairs, by the time you made it downstairs into the kitchen he was already talking to mum who was doing prep work for dinner. she looked at you and saw that you looked excited "okay then she said unsure, you'll want to take the carrier or pram so Jason doesn't get tired and refuse to walk..." mum said aloud "its alright I'll give him a piggy back!" Jerry replied with enthusiasm.

"okay then you two can be out there for two hours" she replied
11521122211221112212111122111211211111.title: Check on Jerry

115211222112211122121111221112112111111.content:
Jerry picks you up and places you his shoulders and headed off to the park, however it quickly became apparent he had no idea where he was going, "Do you need me to tell you where to go?" you asked, Jerry laughed a little "yeah..." he replied, you continued the rest of the journey to the park giving Jerry Directions which must have looked funny to an outside observer a toddler sized teenager sitting on the shoulders of a teenager sized toddler, with you giving directions.

when you arrive at the park Jerry lets you down and sits down on a bench allowing you to go play on the equipment, you run around having fun but then you think about Jerry he must be bored his attention span probably hasn't improved and no amount of being thankful is going to stop him from being bored, so you sit down and use the slide to get off the equipment and run to Jerry, "Tag you're it!" you exclaim, Jerry understands and then you suddenly engage in a game of tag, however it is extremely one sided as Jerry is much faster and finds the game much easier none the less you enjoyed it a lot.

once you were too tired to continue you asked Jerry to go home and he picked you up putting you on his shoulders "that was so much fun!" he exclaimed "yeah!, i was so close to catching you" you exclaim "yeah but i let you!" Jerry replied, you two broke out in laughter, normally you two wouldn't interact together like this, having fun playing together but this swapping power allowed you to do this, have fun and better relationships with your siblings and family, you were having the time of your life as a 2 year old because you were able to keep your mental faculties.

"i am enjoying being the older brother so much!" Jerry exclaimed "and i am enjoying being the younger brother" you reply "sure i am incontinent but everything else is so much fun, definitely worth it!" you exclaim. Jerry stops talking for a minute "wait you are really enjoying being the baby of the family?" he asked "yeah I'm having a blast!" you reply, Jerry stuttered "can we stay like this for a long time?" Jerry asked "as far as I'm concerned we can stay like this forever" you replied "really?" Jerry replied ecstatic "yeah sure why not, you want to be the big brother and i want to be the younger brother why should we change that?" you respond.

Thank you so much!, Jerry replied he started running home, you held onto his forehead and yelled "weeeeeeee" as your hair blew in the wind.
115211222112211122121111221112112111111.title: At the park with Jerry

choices: Sombody wakes you up wanting to swap somthing
1152112221122111221211112211121121111111.content:
Upon arriving home Jerry put you down and you made your way to the kitchen Where your mum was, she noticed you walk in and stopped cooking to look at you kneeling down "how was the park with your big brother Jason?" she asked, "it was great, we played Tag and ran around and he gave me a piggy back on the way home it was a lot of fun! you exclaimed "I'm glad you had fun Jason, Dinner is almost ready why don't you go watch TV with Jesse and Ariana?" your mum proposed "okay!" you replied as you made your way to the TV to watch Cartoons.

You sat there and Enjoyed TV until eventually Theresa walked into the living room "it's dinner time", you walked towards Theresa and just as you reached her you felt a familiar yet unwelcome feeling "Theresa" you moaned before you suddenly couldn't hold it anymore and you used your diaper "oh no" Theresa cried, did you have to use your diaper again? she asked, Theresa picked you up and walked through the kitchen to the nursery calling out to your mother to let her know you had to use your Diaper and that she was going to change it.

once in the nursery Theresa put you on the changing table and begun to change your diaper "hey you did well this time, you managed to realise that you were about to use it!, in no time at all you'll be out of diapers!" she exclaimed, you just stayed still and let Theresa change your diaper, once finished she carried you over to the high chair and placed you in it, mum brought out everyone's dinner which was meatballs, as she had been for the past few days she fed you in the high chair, which you immensely enjoyed. once dinner was over mum cleaned up and then gave you a bath before putting you to sleep for the night
1152112221122111221211112211121121111111.title: The rest of the day

choices: Meeting Jerry Once he gets home
1152112221122111221211112211121121111111.content:
You woke up the next morning later than normal, you looked at the clock in the hallway and saw that it was half past nine and that meant everyone was gone already, you must have been tired from being at the park with Jerry. You heard a thud upstairs and a hushed curse that you could tell was your mum, she was in the attic for some reason then it dawned on you tonight was Halloween! she was probably getting the decorations out so that they could be put up. Your family had a weird outlook on Halloween, they celebrated it sure and put up decorations however they didn't start celebrating until the day hence why no decorations had been put up yet.

Soon enough your mum walked by with a cardboard box labeled 'Halloween' in orange marker and she noticed you standing up in the crib "good morning Jason how are you?" she asked as she walked into your room "good, i haven't used my diaper yet!" you replied "well isn't that great!" she replied putting down the box on your dresser and picking you up holding you with one arm and then placing the box under her other arm. She walked down to the kitchen and set you down in the high chair placing the box on the table "give me a moment to make you breakfast sweetie" your mother asked as she walked into the kitchen. She quickly returned with toast and placed it in front of you and went back to retrieving the rest of the decorations, you ate your toast with your mother progressively bringing more boxes with her down stairs. She finished moving the decorations around the same time you finished breakfast and once you were done she collected the plate and let you out of the high chair "come on Jason let's decorate the outside of the house".

You got to work decorating the outside of the house, you couldn't do a whole lot due to your short stature however you managed to decorate some of the fence and bushes outside with spider webs and bats, your mother spent her time putting up lights and skeletons and other hanging decorations. after a lot of work your mother looked at her watch only to realise it was 2pm and you had missed lunch "oh no we missed lunch!, come one Jason lets quickly throw something together" Your mum picked you up and raced inside before buckling you into the Highchair in the dining table, she was back with a sandwich for you and a cup of tea for her that she was still in the process of making. Once lunch was finished she Let you out of the Highchair and started organizing costumes.

When she returned she picked you up and took you to the car and placed you in the Booster seat. She then drove to your sisters schools and picked them up, she spent the whole return trip talking to your sisters about how amazing the house looked and how good of a job you had done.
1152112221122111221211112211121121111111.title: The next morning

1152112221122111221211112211121121111111.content:
When you got home there was no time to waste, as soon as your mum parked in the driveway and everyone was out she called out "alright girls get into your costumes, we need to get to the party in half an hour", You were unbuckled out of the Booster seat and carried up to your mothers room. She sat you down on her bed and then opened her wardrobe and pulled out two suit travel bags that you assumed were your costumes, she grabbed the Larger one and took it into her en-suite. About 5 minutes later she emerged from the bathroom in her full costume.

from top to bottom she had a helmet of sorts that covered her entire head leaving a hole for her face, it also had long ears that stood upright, Below that she had a brown full body suit that covered her from her neck down, it had paws of sorts on the hands and large animal feet as well as a tail that protruded from her backside and the last thing you noticed was the pouch just beneath her stomach. "so what do you think?" she asked. You had to admit it was really well made "yeah it is much higher in quality than i was expecting" Your mum sat down next to you "yeah i really wanted to stand out this year, speaking of which it's your turn". Your mother undressed you quickly and then helped you get into the outfit, the outfit was pretty much the exact same except smaller and it lacked a pouch.

"there you go, you look so cute now, ooh all the mums are going to be so jealous" You smirked at your mothers aspirations "can i go spend time with Jerry before we go?" you asked "sure" your mum replied. You hopped off the bed and your mother opened the door for you and you quickly ran to Jerry's room. When you arrived You saw that he was obviously waiting for you "hey Jason can you help me with the costume?" he asked. "sure just promise not to make fun of mine" it was then that Jerry noticed your costume and held back a snicker. You helped him get into his pirate costume that was pretty standard: Eye patch, hook, loose shirt, Breeches and Boots topped off with a bandana wrapped around his head. Soon enough you heard your mum call out for everyone to get into the car as we need to get to the party.

You walked down with Jerry to see everyone was in their costume, Dad was in his roman solider costume, Jesse was in a Pink Princess dress, Ariana was in her witch costume and to your surprise Theresa was in a Cleopatra costume. "oh my god Jason you look so cute!" she exclaimed "mum picked it" you reply. Mum grins as she can tell everyone is going to love your costume.

Everyone got in the car ready to go to the party, in the car Jesse and Ariana Expressed their shared sentiment that you looked very cute, something you had gotten used to hearing ever since you swapped with Jerry. Once you arrived at the Party destination Your mum unbuckled you from the booster seat and placed you in her pouch. The feeling of being in the pouch was similar to the sensation of being in the baby carrier only lower down, almost everyone looked at you even some of your friends saw you and waved. After a while your mum handed you some candy that was in bowls around the place, you didn't really pay much attention to the party, what did occupy you was the fact that the pouch was deeper than you though originally you had to be standing up to peek out of the pouch so if you lay down or sat down you were hidden in the pouch and whenever you'd pop out to check your surroundings people just saw that as you being an shy 2 year old and they loved it.

After a while Theresa took your mother aside "hey mum can we swap costumes?" she asked this confused your mum "why?, i spent a lot of time preparing my outfit and i know you did too why do you want to swap mid party?" Theresa looked around for a bit and whispered to your mother "look I'm a tad jealous of the attention you're getting and would like some of it, it also means i can spend time with my little brother, plus I'm Cleopatra so if you hang out with dad it'll be a romantic couples outfit of Caeser and Cleopatra"
1152112221122111221211112211121121111111.title: At the party

choices: You get woken up still at the party
1152112221122111221211112211121121111111.content:
"okay fine" She agrees, Your mum and Theresa walk away to the bathroom so nobody will notice the swap and then you swap costumes around until Theresa and mum have swapped costumes, Now in the pouch attached to Theresa you emerge from the Bathroom. Theresa immediately makes her way to her friends to show you off, they all love her outfit and have no idea how they didn't notice you before they all make faces and sounds that people would to babies and then go back to talking to Theresa.

After a while You and Theresa were approached by some of your friends "hey Jason how are you?" Geoff asks "yeah we haven't seen you in ages" Susan asked "we should catch up this weekend!" Brian suggests "sounds good" you reply falling back on old habits. Theresa piped in "Susan if you can hold Jason for me I'll check with mum if he can" That's when you remember that you are perceived to be a 2 year old for all purposes and you'd need permission from your parents to do that. In the time it took Theresa to get back you spent some time catching up with your friends, it felt like ages since you'd had contact with them and it was good to catch up.

When Theresa returned she returned with good news "yeah mum's okay with it she trusts you guys" Susan handed you back to Theresa and Theresa placed you in the pouch once again. You and Theresa spent the next half an hour talking to a combination of your friends and hers, only to be interrupted by a familiar yet unwelcome feeling in your guts, you groaned "Theresa... i need to" and then you couldn't hold it, you took a shit in your diaper and a warm trickle of liquid soon followed. Theresa quickly excused herself and ran to your mum "mum i need to change Jason", Your mum quickly grabbed the bag she brought with her and handed it to Theresa. Theresa made her way to the bathroom once again and then lifted you out of the pouch and laid you down, "it's alright Jason no harm done, at least you recognised that you had to go and tried to warn me" Theresa said to comfort you "thanks" you replied still disappointed that you're still unable to control your bladder. Once you were changed Theresa placed you back in the pouch and you returned to the party. It didn't take long but you began to feel sleepy you told Theresa that you'd be taking a nap then you drifted off to sleep.
1152112221122111221211112211121121111111.title: Mum agrees

1152112221122111221211112211121121111111.content:
The next Morning Your mother wakes you up at 9:30am, the party last night really tired you out. As you woke you noticed that your mum had put extra effort into looking good this morning, She had her hair wavy and long, it wasn't in a pony tail or braid like she normally would have it during the day. Her makeup obviously had a lot of care put into it, Her dress was unmistakably a sundress that stopped around her calves which you hadn't seen her wear in years. Then it became obvious she was clinging to her youth, "good morning mum you look nice today" you said as she picked you out of your crib "Thank you Jason, now you didn't have a bath last night so we need to give you one this morning" she replied.

Once in the bathroom your mum filled the bathtub and grabbed some of Jerry's toys that you had become accustomed to playing with while in the bath, "so what are we doing today?" you asked as you were lifted into the now full tub "Today we are going to a mother's club meeting with the girls" she replied. As you played with the toys and your mum began washing you you thought back to who the 'Mothers club' were, After a while you remembered it was something your mum would do once a month with some of her friends that all had kids that weren't in preschool. You began to piece together your mum's behavior with today's events, She wanted to cling to her youth and her lifestyle but with Jerry (now you) being 2 and 8 months, that wasn't long until he was going to go to preschool at 3.

Once you were done in the bath your mum lifted you out and dried you off before putting on a diaper and dressing you in a button up shirt and jeans as well as combing your hair, she then carried you down to the stairs and made you toast for breakfast. After breakfast she went into the attic and brought down the stroller that she used to use when Jerry was younger "come on Jason we're walking there, hop in", you got into the stroller and your mum buckled you into the stroller, she packed the stroller with the diaper bag and her purse, put on a wide brimmed hat and then you were off. The Trip wasn't a very long one only 15 minutes or so to a cafe with a park nearby, however it was still interesting, the stroller was a new thing for you and everything looked so big you felt safe and secure but there was also another feeling that came with being in the stroller as opposed to the Carrier but you couldn't place it.

Once you had arrived you saw that you were one of the last people to get there, all the mothers were sat around a table with their child in a high chair next to them. Your mum put you in a high chair and then sat down next to you asking one of the baristas to make her a coffee and ordering you a cuppa-chino with marshmallows. Looking around you recognised some of the women from the party last night but didn't know any of their names, you didn't recognize any of the kids either they all looked under 2 years old though. Eventually once you had received your cuppa-chino, the mothers began talking about how good Theresa and your Pair outfit was but commented about how it was weird that your sister was the mother in the costume as opposed to your mum. That's when you remembered you fell asleep before you could swap the costumes back so for all intensive purposes that was still Theresa's outfit, your mum played it off as Theresa considering herself to be his second mother which wasn't too far from the truth.

You noticed that the discussion seemed to go in a circle around the mothers present at the meeting, they'd talk about and criticize each other in passive aggressive ways in turns which you found quite funny, however, When they got to your mum you were once again what was used to criticize your mother. "You know Jason is almost old enough to go to preschool","what will you do when Jason goes to preschool","he won't be a baby forever" you heard them all say as if they practiced this beforehand. Your mum didn't know what to respond with simply responding by saying "well I'll have to cherish these moments while i can".

After a while the mothers got up from their seats and migrated with their kids over to the playground where they laid out a picnic rug and handed out lunch, once you and the other kids had finished lunch you were allowed to go play in the sand pit. Once in the pit you got to know the other kids, there was Caleb who was 1 and a half years old, Keira who was 1 year old, Mitchel who was 10 months old and lastly Elizabeth who was 7 months old. The idea popped into your head that maybe you could sustain this lifestyle and so could your mother, if you swapped with one of these kids you could be younger or at least perceived that way and your mum could continue living the way she enjoyed.

However if you did swap you'd want to be careful especially with Elizabeth and Mitchel, But then again even if you didn't stay like this and swapped back with Jerry it meant your mother could live like this for longer plus it's not like Jerry would know you swapped he'd always think you were that age. The question was who to swap with if at all?
1152112221122111221211112211121121111111.title: The next morning

choices: Swap Multiple things with one of them
1152112221122111221211112211121121111111.content:
You were pretty Content with being like this and Jerry permitting you were happy to relive childhood again so you immediately ruled out Caleb and Keira. You tried to remember some of the criticisms about you directed at your mum from when the mothers were drinking coffee, from what you could tell the things of criticism was: Your age, Your clothing, Your ability to speak properly, your intelligence and how mature you looked (you were still just a shorter version of yourself). The idea crossed your mind that maybe you could swap some of these things away to deflect some of the criticisms.

The question once again is what should you do and how much should you swap?
1152112221122111221211112211121121111111.title: Swap with Mitchel or Elizabeth

choices: No, nothing for now, just hang out with Jerry
1152112221122111221211112211121121111111.content:
You decided that you should swap with Elizabeth, as far as you were concerned you were in this for the long haul and you were loving it so you made your way over to Elizabeth to swap with her. "Hello Elizabeth" you said as you sat down next to her in the sand pit. She was making a castle using some of the buckets that have molds built into them, "hewo" she replied not really paying attention. You could tell not a whole lot was going on in her head and her speech was rudimentary at best so you'd need to be patient and careful, making sure you didn't swap anything by accident. "do you want to play a game?" you asked, to this she looked at you and muttered out "otay". You tried your best to explain your power to her but she didn't understand any of it and you could tell she was getting bored. "it's like pretend" you finally tried after what felt like a hundred attempts to explain it, "otay" she responded Finally she understood somewhat you were trying to do.

"repeat after me, I pretend to swap the ages people see us as" you instructed she thought about it and replied with "i pwatend to swap da aghs peepel see uz as". it wasn't perfect but you tried anyway and used your power. You decided to not try swapping anything else with Elizabeth, you wanted to be careful especially with somebody that young. if you needed to swap any of your more 'adult' features away you would swap it with Jerry. Making your way back to your mum you saw that the mothers were laying less into your mum about you and more into a different mum. Looking at your mum you asked "how old am i?" your mum seeming a lot happier responded "why your my little baby already 7 and a half months, time flies so fast you're already so grown up". Content with your new age you sat at your mother's side and ate some food that was there.

About an hour later your mum looked at her watch and addressed the rest of the women "sorry ladies but i have to go, my kids get off school in an hour", one of the mothers asked "we'll see you next Month yeah?" to which your mum replied "of course it's going to be a while until this one is in preschool" All the ladies laughed except for the woman who you gathered was Elizabeth's Mother. Your mother picked you up and placed you in the Stroller and buckled you in, She seemed much happier now which was all that mattered to you at this point, however, the criticisms of the mothers club preswap still lingered in your mind maybe you should swap some things to fit in better as a baby.

Once home your mum put you in the crib for a nap which you appreciated, your mum picked up your siblings however you woke up when you heard Jesse and Ariana bolting up the stairs, close behind was Jerry who noticed you and entered your room Question was do you want to swap anything with him?
1152112221122111221211112211121121111111.title: Swap with Elizabeth

1152112221122111221211112211121121111111.content:
"hey Jerry how was high school?" you asked, Jerry lifted you out of the crib and as he put you down he responded by saying "it's good, i am struggling to understand a lot of things but some things are better" As you and Jerry walked back to his room and unpacked his homework for the day he explained in better detail how things didn't make a heap of sense but he was learning to keep his head down and not get noticed that much. He also updated you on the whole issue of not having friends in high school which for the most part was remedied due to you convincing Theresa to introduce him to some of her friends, Working together you managed to help Jerry finish his homework in only an hour.

The remainder of the day was uneventful, You hung out with Jerry and had a blast in the process, dinner was excellent, your mum seemed much happier than she seemed at the beginning of the day and that made you glad. As your mum tucked you into bed that night you felt as if you had accomplished a lot and were proud of yourself.
1152112221122111221211112211121121111111.title: No, nothing for now, just hang out with Jerry

choices: No, just enjoy the day with your friends
Let them know, possibly for a swap
1152112221122111221211112211121121111111.content:
(apologies for the misleading title, i was typing the next morning the option and my laptop automatically chose the next day at school based on previous chapters i have written and i didn't notice this until after i had pressed submit)

As you woke up the net morning you woke up happy remembering that you were meeting with your friends today, it had been ages since you had seen them and you couldn't wait to hang out with them for the day. Your mum walked past your room as she normally did and saw you sitting upright, "hello there Jason rise and shine you'd better get ready for your playdate!" cringing at it being called a playdate you knew that your mum would refer to any outing like this as a playdate for at least a few years if you stayed like this long term. Your mum helped you out of the crib and then carried you to the high chair in the kitchen where you saw everyone was up already.

Jesse and Ariana were watching cartoons together and Ariana was in her soccer uniform ready for her game in an hour, your mum put you down in the high chair next to Jerry in his seat "so you're going to see your friends today?" Jerry asked "yeah it's going to be fun" you responded. You continued to talk to Jerry until you felt a bad feeling in your stomach which you recognised "Jerry i... need... to.. use.. the..." and then you couldn't hold it any longer you let go of your bowels and made a mess in your diaper. "Don't worry I'll clean him up" Theresa offered. Theresa carried you up to your room where she laid you down on the changing table, "looking forward to Tuesday?" she asked "yeah i am" you replied remembering how fun you found last Tuesday "good because so am i" Theresa replied before tickling you for a moment after she finished changing your diaper.

Once back in your high chair mum had breakfast ready and you ate it quite quickly, once finished your mum carried you to your room and changed you out of pajamas into a t-shirt and jeans. Just as you were dressed you heard a knock on the door, your mum carried you to the door to see your friends there. Geoff was standing there in a similar t-shirt jeans combo to you and he had combed his blonde hair back today and was clean shaven, Brian however was unshaven and his ginger beard was quite scruffy just like his hair, Susan had her brown hair back in a pony tail and was wearing a green dress that you'd seen her wear a few times before.

"Hey Jason" Susan exclaimed as she walked into the living room "hey buddy" Geoff said seconding the notion "hey guys how are you?" you asked slipping once again back into old habits like at the party, your mum who was carrying you also said hello and begun talking to your friends about her plans and when you should be back. Once your mum was finished she handed you to Brian before collecting the Carrier "you can carry him around in the carrier like normal or you can use the stroller that i have down from the attic" Susan grabbed the carrier and begun adjusting it for her frame "i think we'll just use the carrier like normal" she replied. Once she was finished Brian handed you over to Susan and she began placing you in the carrier "and lastly we have the diaper bag in case Jason needs to go while you're out" she said holding a grey bag with a strap "thanks" Susan replied slinging it over her shoulder with her handbag.

Once your mum had said goodbye for the 7th time you and your friends were off they were walking in the direction of the mall and began talking, nothing seemed out of place to them and the conversations you had with them were as normal as they were before the swaps the only difference being topics you talked about lacked school based topics because you no longer went to school. The only question left in your mind was should you let them in on your powers and should you swap with them or not?

1152112221122111221211112211121121111111.content:
You decided against informing your friends about your power, you hadn't had quality time with your friends in a while and you were determined to have some fun even in this new form. "so Jason how have you been?" you hear Susan ask "good" you reply "i went to the mothers meeting with Mum and her friends yesterday, I've become much better friends with Theresa recently too". "yeah we can tell" Geoff interjected "i mean you did have a pair costume with her on Thursday" he continued "and might i add it was very cute, you looked adorable as a joey Jason" Susan added. "yeah..." you muttered to yourself remembering that you still hadn't swapped mum and Theresa's costume yet.

Upon arriving at the mall you all found a table in the food court and ordered fast food "Just don't tell your mum" Susan joked as you ordered the food, when you had picked up the food Susan let you out of the Carrier and sat you down on one of the seats where you ate the meal by yourself for the most part but Susan insisted on helping you every so often. Once you were finished a certain conversation took you by surprise "Okay so Geoff and i will go watch the new Darkness rises movie and we'll meet back here in 2 hours alright?" Brian confirmed with Susan "Yeah, Jason and i will play here for a bit before we go shopping" and like that you were left with Susan. It didn't take you long to realise that the movie they were watching was R-Rated, normally you'd all see it even though Susan didn't really like that kind of movie that much but now that you weren't old enough to see it you would be spending time with Susan instead and she wouldn't really mind.

"alright, we can play on the equipment for about half an hour before i want to go shopping for a bit" Susan said looking at her watch "equipment?" you asked "you know the play equipment where little kids like you have fun while adults eat?, you play there every time we go to the mall" she reminded you "oh yeah i forgot..." you say unconvincingly. She walked you over to the equipment and let you do what you wanted, you quickly lost yourself running around it felt almost therapeutic to just not think and run around and you enjoyed yourself. As you came down the slide for the 3rd time you saw Susan was talking to a middle age mother and her attention was averted from you for a minute so you listened in "is he yours?" the mother asked "no, he's a friend we're here as a group and I'm looking after him while our other friends see a movie he's too young to see" Susan replied

The mother talked to Susan for a while longer about how kids are treasures before Susan noticed you standing there "you finished on the equipment?" to which you simply nodded in reply, you walked back to Susan who put the carrier on and then you in it and left after saying good bye to the mother she was talking to. "so did you have fun Jason?" she asked "yeah the slide is so big and it feels like it goes on forever" you replied, in truth it was more fun than you'd expect mainly due to your new size you were able to properly appreciate it.

Susan began shopping for a bit, she tried to buy you some clothes that she thought looked cute but you refused every time after a while Geoff and Brian walked up to you and Susan "lost track of time again did you?" Geoff asked "yeah sort of" Susan replied laughing a bit. You carried on shopping for a bit until you were interrupted by an unpleasant feeling in your gut "Susan... toilet... quick" you struggled to mutter while holding on as much as possible, Susan began to run towards the toilet and entered the changing rooms for kids, however as soon as she opened the door you guts weakened and a stream of urine poured out quickly followed by excrement.

"Damn we were so close" Susan complained as she placed you on the changing table, she undid the tabs on your diaper before grabbing it by the ends and putting it in the bin "sorry" you apologised "no problem Jason, it isn't your fault" she replied as she wiped you down. You felt a bit embarrassed by your situation, you had come to terms with the fact that you'd be using your diaper for a while but in front of your friends and now with one of your best friends wiping your arse it was a bit different. Once Susan was finished and you were back in the carrier you and your friends set off for home via the park where you all got ice cream.

Overall you enjoyed your day out with your friends and suggested that you guys do this again. When you got home your mum gave you a hug and asked about your day, after a while she left you in the living room watching TV.

You sit there watching TV, the content you can watch is limited due to your perceived age but you have recently taken a liking to shows that you can watch with your siblings so it isn't that bad, your dad comes in from the backyard covered in sweat and grime as he had spent all of today doing work around the house like mowing the lawn, working on the car and other maintenance jobs. Once in his room he put you on his bed and knelt down on the floor so he was level with you "hey buddy, i need a favor" he begun "i am spent, it has been weeks since i have had a proper weekend and i need a break", you could see where this was going your dad knew about your power and probably wanted some help to have some time to relax which you sympathized with. Your dad left and quickly returned with Jesse and sat her down next to you and explained what he wanted to do "So i can be the daddy for a while and you'll be the little girl until tomorrow before bed?" she asked to make sure she understood "yeah that's right, you'll be doing daddy a favor". Jesse thought about it and responded by saying "okay but if you're going to be the little girl you have to have the ______ of a little girl!".
