Jesse ran out of the room happy as could be meanwhile your dad got up from the bed he was sitting on, he patted his butt which was now covered with a pull up and jeans on top before smiling and leaving what was once his room to take a nap on the couch.

You left your parents room and found Jerry doing some weekend homework, you offered to help him out and spent the rest of the afternoon doing that. When dinner was ready Jerry carried you to the kitchen where he put you in the high chair and you all sat down for dinner, your dad looked refreshed and relaxed whereas Jesse looked tired and wiped out after having to finish dad's chores around the house. Dinner went smoothly until Everyone was clearing up after dinner and then suddenly not used to actively having to be proactive about his potty training your dad's face turned red, you could tell from experience that he had just wet himself. He muttered under his voice to your mum "i... i wet myself..." to which your mum made a big fuss about "how well she was doing" and how it was "just an accident", it didn't do much to help your dad's embarrassment. To make it even more embarrassing for him Jesse offered to change him, he was then changed by his 4 year old daughter after wetting himself for the first time in 3 and a half decades.

You spent the rest of your night with Jerry before your mum gave you a bath and changed you into pajamas before putting you to bed.

Since the swap, all of Dad's friends were toddlers and most of them were girls. Denise is one of his friends now. She is a typical four year old, with shoulder length brown hair, barely over three feet tall. She is dressed in knit shorts with a matching top in a pastel color. We're here to get me some new clothes for my first day."

Mom and Denise's mom quickly caught up to them. Since they were both here to do shopping primarily Denise and Dad, it was decided that they would go together.

On the way to the clothing store, dad spotted Ryan. Ryan, who was one of dad's old friends, was at the mall with his wife. Upon seeing Ryan, dad let go of Mom's hand and ran towards him. Dad gave Ryan a big hug to greet him. Something dad would have never done before swapping.

Ryan saw dad approach him. He saw dad's sundress flutter. And heard dad sandals as they slapped against the floor. Ryan didn't think that either dad's greeting or how he was dressed was odd at all. Ryan, a man in his forties, was still friends with a man dressed like a four year old girl.

Mom wanted to tell Ryan's wife what had happened to Dad, but she would never believe her. Besides it was a lot of fun to see dad and his friend talking about buying outfits and attending preschool. 1152112221122111221211112211121121111111.content:
"If you want to be me," Jesse said. "Then you will have to wear all my clothes including my pullups and do everything that Mommy says."

"Everything, like don't run in the house and don't eat ice cream right before lunch?"

"Yeah, everything she says."

"I think I can do that," Daddy agrees.

The swap was made and Daddy was standing there in Jesse's yellow polka dot dress with a cinched waist and flutter sleeves that fell down to just above his knees. https://www.carters.com/carters-toddler-... The dress resized itself to fit Daddy's much larger frame. The fullness of the dress made it hard to tell if he was wearing her diapers too, but since that was part of the deal, you assumed he was in diapers.

"I think I"m going to take a nap," Daddy announced and then he headed towards Jesse's room.

About an hour later, Mommy came to get me. She said we are going for a ride. Then she went into Jesse's room and woke up Daddy.

"We're leaving," she told him. Daddy was groggy from his nap and was still wearing Jesse's dress.

"I don't want to go," Daddy said. He said it like he always did, there wasn't the touch of whine that Jesse would usually use in a similar situation.

Mommy pulled Daddy out of bed. "Now put on your shoes, we are going."

"I don't want to."

Mommy glared at Daddy and said, "Do you want a swat on the rear?"

Daddy had no choice but to do as commanded. He put on Jesse's shoes. https://www.carters.com/carters-kid-girl... They also had been expanded to fit his much larger feet and then followed Mommy to the car. I was only two now, I have to come also. But I didn't want to miss this anyway.

I got into the back baby seat and Daddy also got into the back child safety seat that was reserved for Jesse. It also was much bigger than it had been. Mommy got into the drivers seat. No one sat in the front passenger seat. Mommy turned to Daddy, "All buckled up?"

"Yes," he said.

After a while Daddy asked, "Where are we going?"

"You'll see."

Then after a few minutes Mommy said. "I know what you did. Jesse told me. I mean the real Jesse. So you want to be my little girl. If that is what you want then I think we should remember this day."

"What do you mean?"

"You'll see."

We pulled into a parking lot. IT was a Glamour Shots Studio. "Time for some pictures," Mommy announced.

Daddy was once again pulled out of the car. He struggled, but some swats on his padded rear hastened his step.

Inside the studio, Mommy talked to the receptionist about what she wanted. They agreed upon four dress changes and backgrounds. Daddy was going to be dressed as a princess with a sparkly long flowing gown and a pretty updo wig, a fairy with wings and a shorter more puffy dress, a ballerina in a leotard, ties and a tutu and in a tankini for a beach scene. Light makeup would be used and the whole photo shoot would take all day. The entire thing would be charged on Daddy's credit card of course.

"I'm not doing it."

"Listen here," Mommy said in a low whisper. "If you ever want to get back to being yourself you'll do it. Jesse won't swap back until I say so. But here is a little more incentive." Then Mommy swatted Daddy's backside again. "Do you want me to put you over my knee and give you a proper spanking?"

What happens next?

The assistant wanted to help put the outfit on, but Daddy said, "I can do it." Daddy wanted the young lady to leave and give him some privacy, but she wouldn't. It was her job to make sure he got dressed properly. She saw him as a four year old girl and so she didn't see a need to leave.

It was a 'blessing' that Daddy was wearing a diaper, or the woman would have seen his penis or at least the outline thereof. The assistant wouldn't know what she was seeing, but it would have embarrassed him anyway.

It was a good thing she was there, because Daddy was having trouble getting the tights on. He had never worn tights before.

Soon he was dressed and returned. When he saw the photographer all ready and the backdrop of the ballet scene, the whole thing became real to him. He didn't know what would happen to the picture when he swapped back with Jesse, but he assumed that it would stay the same. He didn't swap lives with Jesse. His swap was more narrow, consisting of how people treated him and the clothes he wore. If he allowed the picture to be taken, there would be photo's of him dressed as a four year old and it would be him.

"Honey, do we re..."

"I'm Mommy to you." Mommy snapped back interrupting what Daddy was about to say.

"Mommy, do we really have to do this." Daddy didn't know why Mommy was so angry.

"Yes we do."

"Well, I'll tell you. I saw Jesse doing your chores in the backyard. She was doing a good job and I didn't know it wasn't you. So I came out and I hugged her from behind. You know how I like to, then gave her a passionate kiss on the mouth. I stuck my tongue into her mouth and everything. When she pulled back, I didn't know what to think. She was horrified and then she told me what you had done. I was so embarrassed.

You made me french kiss our daughter. I'm going to make you as embarrassed as I was."

When you woke up, you were in your crib No one woke you up, you had woken up on your own. You were a little damp now, but didn't need a change yet. There wasn't any need to cry out, you had a plushie in your crib and that was good enough entertainment for now.

While playing you noticed Theresa walking past your room. She looked to be in a hurry. She didn't even look in to see you were up. There were other strange sounds in the house too. Mom called out to Theresa that they had to hurry and that dad will meet them there. You didn't know what there was. You wished you knew, but there wasn't a way to find out. You supposed someone would tell you what was going on. Or that they would take you with them.

The more you heard, the more concerned you got. Something was wrong you could just tell. You decided to cry out.

Mom came in, she had a smile on her face. But there was something wrong with the smile.

"Jason, we have to go out for a while. Josie will be staying with you while we are gone." She said it in the same happy sing song voice you had grown used to now that you were treated like a two year old. But the sense that there was something wrong kept nagging at you. Josie was Jerry's babysitter. You suppose she was your babysitter now, but she hadn't sat you since you swapped with Jerry.

"What's wrong?"

"Nothing is wrong. We are just going out for a while."

When you couldn't convince her to tell you what was wrong you said, "I wanna come,"

"You can't. You'll have a good time with Josie. She wants to see you."

Mom was keeping something from you. You didn't know what and she wouldn't tell you. She had kept other things from you before since the swap, but this was different you knew something was really wrong.

You didn't know it and no one told you, but Jerry had been hit by a car. He might have been treated like a teen, but he was still a toddler in his actions and he stepped off the curve without looking. A car had hit him and he was taken to the hospital. No one in the family wanted to tell you that Jerry was hurt. They didn't want to upset you. They were treating you like you wanted them to, like a two year old.

Josie came over and babysat. She didn't know what had happened either. Not that she would tell you if she did. She took care of your needs, fed you, changed you, played with you put you to bed but you were worried. You fell asleep before anyone returned home.

In the morning, you noticed that Jerry wasn't around. When you asked about it, your family tried to put you off. When you insisted (as best you could) they minimized what had happened, just saying that Jerry got hurt and would be back soon. But when Jerry hadn't returned all day or into the next you knew something serious had happened. You couldn't piece it all together, but you had an idea as you could hear the people around you. They tried to keep it from you, by going into other rooms or talking in whispers.

At first you were worried about Jerry. Then as time passed you also started to worry about yourself. There wasn't any way to return to normal without a swap from Jerry. Until he returned you were stuck being treated like a toddler. Suddenly it didn't seem to be such a good idea to swap "your place in the family" with Jerry.

What happens next?

11521122211221112212111122111211221.content:
Another day passed and you didn't know what was going on. Jerry hadn't returned home and no one would tell you what was wrong. The entire family kept what had happened from you. They deemed you too little and wanted to spare you the details as if you were a toddler, which is what you wanted. But you weren't a toddler and so you kept an ear out and tried to piece together what had happened. As much as you could tell, Jerry tried to cross the street without looking and had been hit by a car. He was in the hospital now. You didn't know how serious it was.

You started to blame yourself for what had happened. Everyone treated Jerry like a teen, but he didn't have the maturity of a teen. You never swapped that. He didn't know that you should always look both ways when crossing the street. You realized the reason toddlers were treated like toddlers was because they had the maturity of toddlers. That was the point of the matter. They were buckled in and kept on eye on because they couldn't be relied upon to do it for themselves.

You there the adult, you should have known what might have happened if you swapped 'how you were treated' with Jerry. An adult being treated like a toddler won't get into trouble. He might be restricted but he wouldn't get into trouble. But a toddler with the freedom of an adult could get into bad trouble or in Jerry's case seriously hurt.

You wished you could see him, but you weren't allowed. You were eventually told that he was in the hospital, but they told you they didn't allow babies to go there. This was true you thought. No matter how you whined or begged, you weren't allowed to see Jerry.

After a few days, you started to worry not just about Jerry, but about yourself. What if Jerry had to spend weeks or months at the hospital. You were stuck as a toddler. Pooping yourself and having your diaper changed was 'fun' for a while, but did you really want to do it forever...or at least until you were potty trained. You hadn't even started potty training yet, you might be pooping in your diaper for another two years.

Playing with toys was getting boring. You were limited to toddler videos. You were watched 100% of the time. You couldn't really decide what you wanted to do. You could fuss and then maybe get a little choice, but adults decided everything from what you wore to who you played with.

Right now the most important thing to you was to see Jerry. But there was no way to make that happen. Mom and Dad wouldn't allow it.

What do you do?

You felt a little guilty that you were getting all the benefits and he would have it tough, you decided that you should swap him something he can take care of himself, however you were unsure what to swap.

He'd deffinatly need independence of some kind, he has always relied on your mum for things and going to a place like highschool without a level of independence would be a death sentence. It wouldn't be too bad for you either as you were going to spend the day with mum anyway and it would allow you to enjoy this new lifestyle even more, with mum doing everything for you.

Then there was academic knowledge and street smarts as they are known, he will definitely need these if he wants to get around and know what he's doing at school otherwise he's just there and without a level of understanding to begin with he'd just be lost and wouldn't understand a thing. However the more you swapped away mental traits like this the less intellegent you became, that could backfire greatly.

It was a toss up, the more you helped him the more chance there was that it'd backfire and you'd get into a diffcult situation.

"Alright Jerry I have an idea, let's swap independence" you suggested, Jerry seemed puzzled, he didn't know what that meant "it means your ability to do things without mum" you continued and after that Jerry seemed to understand.

Jerry would be lost if he went to kindergarten with the knowledge of a two year old, let alone going to high school. Not to mention he might do something really stupid like run across a busy street. He needed not only your school knowledge but also your common sense. The problem was that you didn't want to lose all that without getting it back.

Sometimes you would put something in your mouth. Mommy would tell you to stop, but you didn't know why.

There were also many things high on shelves that you wanted to touch, but you could not. Mommy would scold you for this and that. This frustrated you. You wanted to try everything but it seemed there were many rules that you didn't understand.

He was fascinated by the cars, the people, the scenery as he passed them. Dad was so enthralled that before he knew it, he was at the store. Mom parked the car, retrieved dad and carried him over her shoulder to a shopping cart. She then placed him in the child seat in the front of the cart.

Mom then grabbed dad's hands and moved in close so their noses touched and said "I love you sooooo much. I love you soooo much" in a sing song voice. She did this several times, dad started to giggle at the attention. By now, dad had started to enjoy himself. This is what he wanted, he didn't have to worry about anything, it was all done for him.

People were of all different sizes and wearing all different types of clothes. Most were in boxy shapes or cylindrical shapes, but there were other shapes too. He recognized some letters on the packaging, but he couldn't read them. He didn't even know what reading meant anyway. Mom went up and down the aisle picking out what she wanted. She would ask dad rhetorical questions like "should I get this brand of the other?" dad was now glad he came along.

People quickly noticed he was acting weird. There was a pretty young lady that Harry wanted to 'play' with. When she rebuffed him, he did what toddlers do, he threw a tantrum and grabbed her.

1152321121131.content:
Mommy saw you as a two year old now. You couldn't make Mommy do anything she didn't want to. She on the other hand had total control over you. You enjoyed playing and spending time with Jerry. The toys he played with didn't seem too rudimentary to you, they seemed like fun. There were other things you wanted to play with, but Mommy didn't let you. There were also times you wanted something, but weren't allowed that either. You shared the frustrations of all toddlers.

Mommy and the other adults around you were just trying to keep you safe. The didn't know you were as mature as you had been before. You could go out of the house and walk around the block and make it back no problem. You could put in your own DVD without breaking anything. But to the world you were seen as a two year old and weren't allowed to 'get into trouble.'

After a while this became very annoying and you decided you needed to return to your old self. To do that you had to find Harry.

Jerry was having the best time though. He now had a brother who would always be with him and do the things that a two year old liked to do. He saw it as you two were in it together. He had the frustrations of a two year old, but he didn't know how it should be, he had never been older. he didn't have memories of the freedom of a teen. He might not like when his diaper itched when he wasn't changed on time, but he had never not worn diapers and didn't see a reason to wear anything else. Not that he didn't mind going nakey from time to time.

You asked him to help convince Mommy to letting Harry come over to play so you could swap back. Jerry didn't want to do that. He thought he would be losing his best playmate ever. One that was with him all day every day. Regardless, you kept asking for Harry to come over. But that never happened. You knew you were in trouble when different toddlers would come over instead. You got scared that there wouldn't be anyway to return to your old life.

Then if occurred to you. Physically and mentally your weren't growing up. Did that mean that next year you would be treated as a three year old as you were 'suppose to'? Or would you still be treated like a two year old. You hoped the former but were afraid of the latter. If that was true the only way to get older was to swap with an 'adult'. But what adult would want to become a two year old.

While you were playing with Jerry, Jerry sensed a problem..

"What's wrong?" Jerry asked.

"I want to swap back. But Mommy won't bring Harry over."

"I don't know why you are so upset. Isn't playing fun?"

"It is, but you don't know how it is to be an adult. There is more to it." You remembered about being with girls. You didn't have the same feelings about them. All your interests were that of a two year old. But you could remember how it was. But that wasn't the only thing. Besides being stuck as anything wasn't appealing. You signed and said, "I wish you knew how it was to be older."

"Well, she takes me to the park every Saturday, and she lets me have ice cream and play with my friend Ashley." Sally replied. "Oh, and she has purple hair!"

'Probably a younger mommy,' you thought to yourself. You suddenly became very curious about swapping your mommy with Sally's. Would that even be possible? Would you swap your entire family with Sally, or would her mom just replace yours? This would be your biggest swap yet, but you could always swap back. You think it's worth a shot.

"Man, I wish my mommy was that cool," you tell Sally, pretending to be dejected. You then feign excitement and say, "Let's pretend I can switch stuff with people. Can I switch your mommy with mine?"

When lunchtime rolled around, the kids were allowed to go to their cubbies and pick up whatever food they'd brought with them. You instead took this opportunity to look through your phone to find pictures of your new mommy. You found a few that were apparently taken by you, and you saw that she was on the younger side. She looked to be in her late-twenties/early thirties. She had a round face and softer features, and an overall curvy figure. And she did indeed have purple hair.

"Damn, she's kinda hot," you muttered under your breath. With her age, it was kind of crazy for her to be your biological mother. You were 16, so she'd have had to be at least 11 when she gave birth to you. However, reality didn't seem to care about this contradiction when Sally's twin sister, Julia, ran up to you and said, "It's time for lunch, brother!"

"Are we twins?" you asked her.

"Yeah! It's cool!" she said, before running off to join the other kids. You giggle and walk behind her. This would certainly be interesting. You weren't sure when you'd swap back. It would probably depend on what your new mommy was like. You continue to think about your situation as you sit down at the lunch table.

...

Meanwhile, Molly, Jason's mother, felt a ping in her head as she learned what he had swapped. She was working at her job as a manager at an office, and she was getting coffee right when she felt the ping. In shock, she dropped her mug on the ground, making it shatter into a million pieces. Her coworkers said something in response, but Molly didn't hear them. Instead, she walked almost robotically back to her desk. She was stunned, to put it mildly. Now that Jason had left the family, she wouldn't be able to talk to him so easily. Molly didn't know Jason's new mother at all. She had to think of a plan, soon. Jason had two more hours at daycare, so that gave her some time.

A friend of Molly's placed her hand on her shoulder. "Hey, is everything alright?" she asked.

Molly looked up at her and sighed. "I'm going through something difficult right now, okay?"

"What is it?" the friend asked.

"Nevermind. You wouldn't understand." Molly replied.

Yes, I love to sing," Dana told you. "But I don't like the other stuff?

133.content:
You wake up early on Saturday morning, today you didn't have any chores to do and your homework from the high school was pretty easy so you had the whole day to do whatever you wanted.

You felt a strange compulsion to search the attic. You had no idea why you felt so strongly, the apartment was just dusty a mess and had a few boxes of various holiday decorations like Christmas lights and fake ghosts.

As you creep up the attic stairs you spot a strange metal box in the corner. You move over to it and pop off the lid.

1351.content:
It was an advertisement you accidentally clicked on while searching through youtube. Before you knew it, an item was shown being shipped to your house. Somehow, whoever sent it knew your name and address despite you not putting any information in the ad. At first you were quite scared, who knows what sort of evil people could be using your info for nefarious purposes. But you ultimately denied any of that ever happening, in a way to calm yourself.

There wasn't any more room for denial when a package labeled for you appeared on your doorstep merely days later. You hyperventilated a bit, but brought the package to your room and practically ripped it open. Packaging peanuts and a piece of paper were the first things you saw; the latter being what you picked up first. "Dear Dean," the note read. "Congratulations. You are the first and only person to have the Trait Collector. Use it to your heart's content within reason, don't use it for illegal activities or else we will have to take the device back. Enjoy. Signed, The Organization."

"Strange note." you thought, tossing it aside and reaching your arms into the package. A cold metallic object was at the bottom, with another piece of paper attached to it via a rubber band. Pulling it out,you could see it was a somewhat thick remote, with an antenna and screen on the side with a few buttons, and an inverted cone on the opposite side. You murmur, "Interesting."

The note, as you realized, was actually a set of instructions to operate the device. You read through them, "Press the buttons to select a body part and aim at target. The chosen part will be sucked into device and be ejected from funnel, the part will be within a containment pod. The containment pod will follow the device and will not be noticed by people." You assume the inverted cone is the funnel the directions mention. "Target will be missing the selected part, but will not be harmed nor have no memory of having the missing part (unless the reality settings are changed). Contained part can then be swapped with same part from new target. e.g. Swapping target's hand's with contained hands will give the target the previously contained hands, while their original hands will now be in a containment pod."


"Hey. that sounds pretty neat." you smile. "I can think of plenty of funny things to use this for." You throw the directions away without giving them another glance over. By doing this, you forget to read a warning in smaller text at the bottom of the page. "Warning: Parts cannot stay contained without being attached to a body for more than 24 hours. Otherwise, the containment pod will vanish and the part will instinctively search for a body to be attached to. Due to the current version of this device, the part will seek out the owner of the device and attach to them, causing the owner's original part to disappear. Attachment via this way is permanent."
1351.title: Good idea!

13511.content: Your father was currently out at work, so you wouldn't be able to use the device on him for a while. That left two family members: your mother and your younger sister Janice. Your mother was currently taking care of cleaning the bathrooms of the house. She usually gets too focused on her work and won't immediately notice you. Meanwhile, Janice was in her room doing her homework. She always wears headphones and listens to music when doing homework, so she wouldn't immediately notice you either.

choices: Use the device on yourself, swapping your mother's feet with yours.

135111.content:
With the device in hand, you walk around the house, searching the bathrooms for your mother. Your search takes you downstairs. There in the bathroom, you spot your mother kneeling down, forcefully scrubbing the underside of the toilet seat. The smell of cleaning chemicals waft through the air. You lift up the device and examine the buttons, deciding what part to collect from your mother. "Hm, maybe I shouldn't take something too major. She's cleaning after all." you ponder. Looking up from the device, you make a decision.

You decided to use the device on your mother's feet. Taking them wouldn't prevent your mother from doing her cleaning, but it'll still be major enough. You press the feet option on the device and zap your mother's feet . After a flash of light, you could see the end of your mother's legs were now just stumps. The device had collected her feet and even the red flip flops she was wearing. You step away from the bathroom and walk up to your room. Along the way, a clear bubble shoots out from the funnel on the device and floats above you, but still follows you. In this transparent bubble was your mother's feet wearing her red flip flops. "So the clothes are collected too. Cool." you note.

Once back in your bedroom, you grab hold of the containment bubble. "interesting. It doesn't pop when I touch it." you say. Within the pod, you could see your mother's feet, wiggling their toes for some reason. You shrug your shoulders and let go of the pod, letting it float freely again. Looking back at the device, you observe the buttons; then you turn back to the floating pod containing your mother's feet.

Your parents were already outside feeding the animals so you were sure noone heard her shout. You decided to go down and look how she does but just as you stood up your door was opened and a very pissed sister stormed in your room.

With an evil glance she fixated your eyes and then checked your feet.
She let out another shout.
"You!" she said obviously angrily "why do you have my feet?! Why do I have your feet?! What is that?!" while saying that she pointed at your feet, her feet and at last to the pot.
She was still furious.


As I this you got three options
1. Tell her everything
2. Lie and tell her you don't know
3. Act as if everything was normal

"Nononononono!" she says "you will tell me everything right now! EVERYTHING! Or the two of us get some real problems!"

"Fine!" you say "that's a machine only I can use to ''extract'' traits, and if you want your feet back I'm the only one who can help you with it!". At the same moment you though about searching for some kind of way to "lock" the machine from other people.

"How could that possibly work?!" Janice said still angry but now also confused

"Easy, you go in the pot and I choose a trait to extract, then I give the trait to someone and you two swap the trait" you said

Her response was "I don't believe you!"
"You got my feet" you throw in.
Now she had to think really hard.
After a minute of complete silence she looked in your eyes and said "Fine, proof it! Give me back my feet!"

That's been what you hoped for.
"Alright" you said "you will just have to enter the pot. I will do the rest" you went to the pot and opened the glass door.

Your sister looked deep in your eyes again and silently walked in the before you closed it again.

Now you went for the screen that now showed a "start" option beside the "timed start" option. You clicked it and the bar appeared once again, you decided to type in _________

15132.content:
Rat Edd was a 67-years-old scientist. he left the big city and moved to the small town. There was a moderate smell of soil and few houses. You, Edd, had to go in a car for about 30 minutes to get to the shopping mall, and the mail was always delivered late. Recently, as the small town started its development industry, the town became a bit noisy as the schools and houses were built more and improve the road, but it was still a good place to live here.

You retired, but you are still interested in science and technology. In particular, you have recently studied the body to make a 'better body' and associate it with science and technology. Your accomplishments in this study are made by a machine called 'trait swapper'. This machine has the ability to swap two user's physical or mental traits. You have tried for six months to make this machine.

It was a sunny day. A few days after inventing the machine, you slept satisfactorily. By 9 o'clock in the morning, you get up in bed. You go to the bathroom to have breakfast as usual. when you are shower, you see yourself in the mirror. Black fur without gloss, dry body with only bones and skin, and wrinkles. You feel like you're getting tired from day to day. It is evidence of getting older. after you wash off, you suddenly think of the machine you invented during breakfast. The problem of machine stability has been solved. Now all you need to do is record the experiment using the machine.

15322.title: Females

154.content:
The college courtyard provided a scene much like every other morning, being filled with a throng of students. Several dozen young men and women were scattered about, going about their normal routines as they awaited the start of their morning classes. For some that was finishing their breakfasts, while for others it was conversation or smoking.

Sandra sat at one of the courtyard tables with her friend Emma, quickly putting the final touches on her homework. She frowned and briefly chewed on the head of the pen as she contemplated the final answer, then gave up with brief shake of her head. Maybe she could get the answer from someone else before class started.

"And Tyler tells me that Corey has been chasing after Brandon," Emma droned on, though Sandra only just started to pay attention. Then Emma paused to reach for her cigarettes. Sandra groaned slightly as she caught sight of the movement, wondering how her friend could possibly smoke those things. Didn't she know how bad they were for her health? And besides, they smelled absolutely horrible...

And as Emma lit her cigarette and took her first drag, Sandra asked in annoyance, "Do you have to do that?"

Emma just rolled her eyes in response, annoyed at the nagging from her non-smoking friend. She enjoyed smoking and saw no reason why it was anybody else's business but her own. So just to annoy Sandra, Emma blew a bit of smoke her way, smirking faintly as the other girl wrinkled her nose.

Sandra scowled at that, wondering why all smokers seemed to be so inconsiderate of the non-smokers around them. She was just about to snap at Emma when she paused in a brief moment of confusion.

A faint shimmer passed through the air of the courtyard, almost completely unnoticed. Several of the students paused where they were, feeling as though something wasn't quite the same.

"You mind if I have one?" Sandra asked, already reaching for the pack of cigarettes that were sitting on the table.
Just as Sandra lit her cigarette and took a long drag, as though she had been doing so for years, Emma just glared at hers and dropped it to the ground with a look of distaste. She couldn't get over the bad taste that it had left in her mouth. For a moment, she wondered how she ever could have been smoking that gross thing.

"I think you're right," Emma sighed as she stood up, "No more of those things for me."

With a shrug, Sandra took another drag from her cigarette, then blew out a stream of smoke before she responded with, "Whatever." Then as Emma started to walk away, she picked up the abandoned pack of cigarettes and slipped them into her purse before starting for her own first class.
154.title: Sandra, (female, a world with magic

1542.content:
Emma got to class early, finding the teacher, Mrs. Hildesheim, more on edge than usual. Relieved at the sight of Emma, she quickly got from up behind her desk and walked over.

"Ah, good, Emma. You're early. Listen, I've got a favor to ask... You smoke, right?" She leaned in on her conspiringly, then added, with a hopeful glint "Mind if I..."

"Oh. I left my pack outside, Mrs. Hildesheim." She said, taken by surprise by the request. The school had a strict non smoking policy among teachers. Then she giggled, taking in her shaking fingers. She needed a nicotine fix, bad. "Although I may have one tucked away in a side-pocket."

Moments later they were standing out of sight, behind an state-mandated but never used or maintained emergency exit. Mrs Hildesheim was sucking away in utter bliss, blue steam floating from her lips as she sighed a happy sigh. Emma, standing there out of solidarity, not knowing what else to do, started up a conversation.

"So, smoking for long?" Emma inquired politely, trying to stay out of the column of smoke that surrounded her.

"No, not at all. I don't smoke. At least, not until now." She sighed, looking at the glowing stump, taking one last drag. "I suddenly just got this craving on my way here. Minutes before you arrived. Oh well, It's not so bad. Thanks again, Emma." She discarded the bud, giving her a thankful smile. "I owe you."

155111.content:
As Jake walked away back to his room he was stopped by Emma

“Hey baby brother can you swap our clothes?”

“Sure why?”

“I just want to see people's reaction when I am wearing your clothes”

“Ok but I have one condition when we swap you promise to swap back”

“Deal”

Jake made the swap happen and in a flash he was wearing a yellow dress diapers(he didn't change that part) white socks and black buckle shoes along with a few red and black dot bows in his hair

“Thank you baby brother”

Emma ran away happy as could be and then Jake continued to is room where his wardrobe was now completely full of Emma's clothes diapers all sizes to fit him and his Bed was changed to a really large cot with a mobile on it

As he sat down in the cot trying to relax he cringed at how strange things had happened in the space of an hour but then he started getting very sleepy and dozed off when he awoke it was Emma getting him up for dinner

“Come on baby brother let's have dinner”
“Ok Emma”

As he walked to the table he was told to get in a high seat that was lowered down significantly and Ben was sitting at the table in a normal chair that was magically large enough for him to be level with the table

“Ok dinner is served”

Heather brought spaghetti to the table and gave everybody their plate and then gave jake a sippy cup and plastic utensils

“Oh right I am the baby of the family”

Just then jakes father James walked in

“Sorry I'm late”

“Your just in time honey”

As James sat down he acknowledged that jake was now supposedly the baby of the family and Ben was the eldest son

“So how are you all”

All the kids except Jake chirped in saying: Good thanks dad

As they started eating dinner Ben almost stabbed himself ten times and made a mess of the food

“Ok it is 7pm time for my baby's bed time”

“What?”

Then Jake remembered that he was living Ben's life this week

So Jake went to sleep super early and woke up even earlier at 5 with a diaper full of poop and piss he went up to the nursery to try and change himself but he failed and got mess everywhere

“Oh Jakey my baby boy I know you don't like a full nappy but you can't change yourself”

Then once again he was changed as by his mum and then remembered he had not swapped wardrobes back with Emma yet So he walked into her room to talk to her and she was having this dilemma too

“Hey baby brother where is your dress up school uniform in your wardrobe?”

“Why, why don't we just change back our clothes?”

“Because I feel like keeping your clothes for just until the end of this week please”

“Fine and it should be bottom draw at the back”

“Ah there it is thanks baby bro”

Jake then walked to his room to find his mother in there with clothes,ready to dress him

“Mum why are you here?”

“To get you dressed ready for preschool”

and then she got out the clothes ready for him and he were mortified it was a Cinderella style princess dress and little Mary Janes

Once Jake was dressed and still in minor shock he walked down to the breakfast Table to get in “his” high chair

As he got in he was poured some fruit loops and ate them quickly

“Ok my children time to go to school!”

Then Jake,Bella,Emma and Ben got in the car Ben in the front and Jake was in a huge booster seat
155111.title: Swap more

1551111.content:
Bella and Emma were dropped off at primary school and Ben off at high school and then Jake was brought to a huge centre where lots of two to three year olds were being dropped off Jake of course actually being 17 but nobody knew that except his two year old brother

Jake was left alone in the centre with hundreds of kids and a bunch of adults supervising

Jake of course being a 17 year old in a princess costume could not get into the climbing gym play area that reminded him of the one at McDonald's eventually jake found a way in but it was a large straight up climbing up type obstacle with layers

While on the fourth layer out of eight Jake pissed himself without noticing luckily not making a mark on his dress and eventually made it to the top and then climbed around he found lots of other kids and considered Trickling them into swapping parts with him but then he remembered that the things he wanted to get rid of belonged to members of his family that he was scheduled to swap back with and he might never see the kids he swaps with ever again

After about five and a half hours of mindless wandering Jake had enough and slid down the slide just as he shitted himself spreading it everywhere in his diaper making it uncomfortable and he started to stink

Ten minutes later his mum showed up to take him home and then she smelt him

“Oh my gosh you made a large stinky”

and on the way home Jake wet himself again

“Ok time for you mister to get changed!”

Jake once again got changed by his mother and then was asked: do you want to come with me to pick up your siblings?

“Yes”

“Well come on then”

The mother and son duo left off to get into the car

“I'll tell you what I'll put your booster seat in the front seat!”

“Thank you!”

Five minutes later he was outside the primary school where Emma went to year 3 and Emma went to kindergarten

And then ten minutes later the bell rang and the two sisters came running out and jumped into the car

“Hey mum,hey baby brother”

“Hey girls how was school?”

“Great thanks for asking mum”

“Ok now let's get your brother from high school”

Heather drove to the high schools and saw Ben being carried by jakes friend Miguel
And then Jake remembered that Ben couldn't walk yet

“Hey my big boy Ben how was high school?”

“Easy”

“As always”

Heather then drove off and arrived home ten minutes later

Jake picked Ben out of the car and asked: how was school easy for you? And is it hard getting around school crawling?

“Well I don't know but whatever I answer to the teacher they say is correct and no not really I just had Miguel carry me”

“Oh ok”

“Well little brudda how was day care?”

“Fine I guess”

“A lot easier isn't it?”

“Yeah and you know what facinates me?”

“What”

“The fact that you can speak almost perfectly but you can't say brother”

“I know”

Once inside Jake put Ben down and gave him the tv remote

“Ok kids Ben is in charge while I take Bella to the doctors”

“Ok mum”

Jake walked off and went into his room and turned on his computer and looked up to see if some of his favorite deviant art artists have released new artworks

“Classic pipilim97 never put anything up in the space of less than a fortnight”

Jake kept browsing the internet until his father got home at the same time as his mother and heard them talking

“What is news honey?”

“The doctor confirmed the reason Bella can't be potty trained is because she has a rare muscle problem that basically kills off all muscle in the bladder meaning she will never gain control over her bladder”

“Oh no that is terrible”

“Don't tell anyone she will be teased because of it”

“Ok I understand dear”
Jake felt bad for his sister almost considering asking to trade it but didn't because he had too much on his own plate at the moment

Jake then proceeded to go downstairs and watch tv with Ben until dinner was ready and he ate lasagna and went to bed again at 7pm And woke up at 5 again also with a full diaper again

“Ugh I don't like going to sleep so early it makes me wake up early”

He like clockwork got out of the cot and headed for the nursery and waited for his mother and when he got there he saw Bella there already

“Hi baby brother”

“Hi”

“Ok you to ready for changes?”

Neither kid responded

Heather changes Bella and then started on Jake when Jake was finished being changed he was brought to his room to change Into a little pink dress and some black buckle shoes and had some bows in his hair and went down to breakfast

“Ok now Jakey you will not be going to daycare today instead you will be going to work with me because it is take your son to work day and because Ben is busy with the HSC exams you are coming”

“Ok mum”

Jake noticed how accustom he was getting with acting childlike and living like he already was for the past two days

“Hey Ben how are you going?”

“Good little brudda”

“What about you Emma?”

“All fine baby brother”
1551111.title: To preschool

choices: Get up at night and sneak around
15511111.content:
Bella then asked if she could swap something with Jake and as jake heard what heather and James were talking about he expected that that was what he was being asked

“Can we swap hair?”

“Pardon?”
“Can we swap hair?”

“Yes ok I guess”

Jake swapped their hair so he now had a long pony tail and she had a crew cut

“Just for today ok?”

“Yes little brother”

Then as soon as Breakfast was had the kids and heather got in the car and all the kids were dropped off except Jake who was still in a booster seat in the front passenger seat on his way to his mothers work with his mother for bring your son to work day

“Ok little man we are here”

Jake got out of the car and looked up to see that there was a huge ten story building in the middle of townhouses and fields and to the left there was a fenced off garden filled with tables and trees and what looked like freshly put up piñatas and a recently inflated bounce house

Heather walked Jake inside and towards the fenced off garden

“Yeah it is me heather from business department I am letting my 2 year old son Jake stay here while I work”

Then the gate was opened and heather walked Jake inside Jake knowing what would happen: she would tell him to enjoy himself and that she is just in the building up to the right and sure enough she was right

“Ok big man I am just up there and you enjoy yourself”

Jake wandered off wondering how he was going to kill five and a half hours eventually seeing that he was not the only one with problems as he walked around there were kids at the age of sixteen here at the kiddy style party and as Jake walked up to them to talk he was pushed away being discriminated because of his apparent age

“Buzz off kid”

“But I am as tall as you”

“So what you are a bloody two year old”

Remembering the fact he had swapped lives with his baby brother so he was perceived as a toddler after having enough dealing with those rude teens he walked around until somebody tapped him on the shoulder telling him to sit down and when he sat down he asked: why? And then the man replied with:
“It is time to get your face painted before the piñatas are cracked open”

Before Jake had time to decline the offer the man had already started painting on his face and Jake knew if he got up now the paint would get all over his face and that would be worse when the man was finished the Jake had a painting of Wonder Woman on his face and was lead off to the piñata

“Ok kids time to break the piñata now depending on how old you are there are different piñatas Anyone two years old to five years old stay here anybody from 6 years old to 9 go to the one on the right, kids ten years old to thirteen years old go to the one on the left and finally anyone fourteen or older please use the piñata at the other end”

Jake almost headed to the one on the other end but remembered that he was MEANT to be two so he stayed at the original piñata and when he looked at the different piñatas the piñatas got tougher and tougher each age group so when Jake got a go it opened up completely on his first swing and then the candy fell out grabbing as much as he could and stuffing it inside the dress when possible he had half a Halloween night worth of candy and then it hit him this Friday was Halloween

An hour later Jake pissed himself and looked on the clock on the side of the building seeing that he had about thirty minutes to kill so he just mindlessly jumped on the bouncing castle until his mother called for him so he walked away in his little black buckle shoes and met his mother

“Hello my big boy how was your time at the bring your son to work day?”

“Good I guess”

“Oh you got your face painted who are you?”

“I don't know I can't see”

“Ok one moment”

Heather got out a make up mirror and let Jake look

“He made me look like Wonder Woman”

“But that is a girl super hero not a boy”

“I know”

Jake knew exactly why he painted Wonder Woman it was because he was wearing a dress and had long hair braided like a girls hair

“And what is this you have stuffed all over your dress and in your pockets… Candy?”

“Yes mum there was a piñata”

“Well aren't you a lucky little boy”

“Yeah I guess so”

“Don't worry I won't make you share it”

“Thanks”

“Now let's pick up your siblings”

Jake got in the booster seat and waited for heather to clip it up then twenty five minutes later he was there at the primary school waiting for his sisters and then the bell rang and his sisters ran out and jumped in the car

“Hi mummy”

“Hi girls how was your day?”

“Good mum”

Bella tapped Jake on the shoulder

“Swap it back”

“Ok”

Jake then proceeded to swap their hair so he had is crew cut and she had her long pony tail

“Why did you want to swap any away?”

“I had a sports day and I didn't want hair in my face”

Jake looked back at the sisters and then Emma spoke up:

“Nice Wonder Woman face paint”

“Hey Emma don't tease him I don't want him to throw a tantrum”

And soon after that sentence was said they arrived at jakes old high school where Ben was waiting for them

“Hi mum”

“There's my big boy Ben,Emma can you please pick up your brother and put him in the middle seat”

“Yes mum”

When Ben was in the car heather drove home and once she and jakes sisters were out Jake picked up Ben

“So Ben was school easy again?”

“Yep I got back tests all of them 100%”

“Seriously?”

“Yep”

“Oh yeah here is some candy I got from the piñata today”

“Thanks”

“If we hadn't swapped you would have done the same right?”

“Yeah course”

Jake then brought Ben inside and sat down with him on the couch kicking off his black buckles

While he was sitting on the couch Ben asked him a question

“Do you know when Halloween is?”

“Ummm yeah it is this Friday”

“Cool I get to be you this Halloween”

“Yeah I know”

As Jake said that he remembered that although he was perceived to be a two year old he still had all of his sisters clothes for the rest of the week unless she wanted to trade

Not to long after that it was dinner time and Jake got back into his high chair

“Well I had a nice time at work today how were you at the entertainment Jakey?”

“It was ok I guess mum”

“How was your day girls?”

“Good I learnt about the pulley machine today”

“That's great”

After dinner Jake was preparing to go to bed when he was stopped by his mother

“What are you doing?”

“Going to bed”

“I can't believe I have forgot this but you haven't had a bath in three days and we need to get the face paint off you”

Jake then turned around and headed to the bathroom and took off his pink dress and diaper

“Ok bath time!”

Remembering that Ben used to get mum to bath him Jake felt a bit uncomfortable getting rubbed all over by his mother

And when he was finished she wiped him down and sent him to bed

“Night night darling”

155111111.content:
Jake woke up early as usual but this time with an empty diaper but as soon as he got out of the cot he shitted himself and pissed himself

155111111.title: Next morning

1551111111.content:
Then Jake walked down to the table and had breakfast before getting in his new booster seat in the car and sitting down once his siblings were dropped off he was just in the car with his mum alone and he decided to tell her about his power

“Hey mum if you could trade anything with me what would it be?”

“Why do you ask”

“I have a power to swap traits”

“Ok then I would like to swap my breasts with you”

Obviously joking and writing this off as little kid rambling but Jake made the swap anyway and the suddenly his mother lost her DD breasts and they appeared on his chest

“Oh my god you were actually serious”

“Yes I was”

“Don't worry mum nobody will notice it swaps reality”

“Wow this is amazing… Wait have you ever swapped with me before?”

“No I need someones permission to swap”

“Ok well can you do mummy a big favour?”

“What?”

“Keep those breasts for a little while and swap a few little things with me later to make things just a little bit easier for me”

“Ok mum”

“You're a sweetheart”

As Jake was dropped off he was still not noticed by anyone even though he was a 17 year old with girls clothes and breasts

“Wow Jakey you are right nobody notices”

“I told you”

“Ok bye bye Jakey”

“By mum”

Jake then waddled off finding it a bit harder to walk with his centre of gravity changed but still easy enough

While in the tubes of the climbing gym he met a little boy who he struck up a conversation with his name was Shaun

“So Shaun do I look normal to you?”

“Not really you are tall and dress like a girl but that is normal I guess”

“Ok”

About an hour later he pisses himself beyond all belief making his diaper weigh down for once but then his mother called for him and he said goodbye to Shaun and left with his mum

“So how did you go today?”

“I met a boy named Shaun and these things on my chest are annoying”

“I know sweetheart I will take them back now”

Jake made the swap

“Thanks for lugging them around for a day”

“It's ok mum”

“I'll tell you what to make it fair next time I want to give you something or trade something I will let you choose something to trade as well”

“Now it is time to go pick up your sisters”

“Ok”

They then drove to the primary school and picked up Bella and Emma and then and then picked up Ben

As they got out of the car Jake took Ben out and had the usual conversation about school and if anything changed

When Jake got inside his mother took him to his room and asked for a swap:

“Jake can we make a deal”

“Ok”

“I would like you to swap our places in the family and cook tonight so I can do stuff for work because I am very busy what do you want in return?”

“I will need your ability to cook to do this and I want your potty training”

Heather paused and thought about it and agreed and then Jake made the swap becoming the mother of the family being able to cook and gaining potty training

So Jake got to work making dinner and made a lovely Indian curry and served dinner”

“Ok baby can you please swap our lives back and because you did so well with making diner you can keep my potty training until you go to bed”

“Ok thank you”

And like that they were having dinner, a lovely chicken tikka masala

Once finished Jake had a bath with heathers help and then although not wanting to swapped potty training with his mother and to cheer him up heather told him she shitted herself twice in the time of having no potty training

And so Jake went to bed early yet again
1551111111.title: Tell mum about his power

15511111111.content:
As Jake woke up the next day he had a full diaper as per usual and he walked up to the nursery to get changed and surprisingly Bella want there

When his mother came up to change him she asked for a swap:

“Hey my big man can you swap something for me?”

“Depends what it is?”

“Can you please give me your clothes for a day? I'll take your potty training”

“Ok sure”

Once Jake was changed and had his fresh diaper on he got dressed into the princess dress again this time with earrings and gloves and then swapped clothes with his mother and then he ends up in a business blouse and a pencil skirt and heels

Unable to walk in heels Jake asked:

“Mum can we swap feet and legs as well?”

“Why?”

“So I can actually walk in heels”

“Ok deal”

So on his way to the Breakfast table heather shitted herself so she needed to go change herself

After Jake had breakfast he got up and sat in his booster seat in the car ready to go to day care

When Jake got there he felt pretty weird being a seventeen year old who is meant to be a two year old with is mothers clothes and legs and feet

“Ok see you later honey”

Jake considered trying to leave but remembered that he was meant to be two so that would be a catastrophe and then he felt something in his pocket and it was his mother phone she must not have taken it out before swapping so he unlocked the phone and started playing games on it quickly pulling in a crowd because kids these days will look at any screen no matter what is happening

“Back off”

Jake quickly put the phone in the skirt pocket and tried to run off but fell over and tripped constantly because of the combination of a skirt restricting his movement and heels being run in

“Ouch”

Eventually he retreated to the climbing gym and hid and then started looking through photos and it was amazing how he was being held instead of Ben in the photos wearing his mothers clothes and having her legs while she wore Emma's clothes

Eventually he got bored and came down to the ground and met his mother waiting to go with a worried look on her face

“What is wrong mum?”

“I pooped myself ten times today dear”

“Wow that is a lot”

“I know why you are so eager to trade it now”

“Let's get home and I'll change myself and then we will pick up your siblings and it would be really nice if you traded everything back with mummy”

“Ok but why did you want my clothes in the first place?”

“We had a fancy dress party at work but I had no fancy clothes but you do”

“Oh ok”

The two rushed home and heather changed herself and Jake went to the toilet quickly before he lost control again and the once They were both done they swapped back so Jake was in a princess dress and diapers again and lost potty training and got his legs back and then he hopped in the car and They sped off to collect jakes siblings

First they collected Emma and Bella from primary school and then Ben from high school when they got out of the car Jake picked up Ben and brought him inside

Jake went out of his way to find Emma and then asked:

“So you are aware that it is Halloween tomorrow?”

“Yes”

“Would you like your clothes back?”

“Not really but I will at the end of the week ask me again tomorrow

After that they had dinner and Jake had another uncomfortable bath and then went to sleep this time woken up by Heather telling him to get up and have breakfast once he got up he got dressed into a pink dress with little flowers on it and little black buckle shoes and then just as Jake finished breakfast he shitted himself and pissed himself

“Oh come on I was going so well”

So Heather and Jake headed upstairs to change jakes diaper
15511111111.title: Next morning

Once changed Jake headed down stairs Jake was asked what he is going to be this Halloween by his siblings but he didn't know what mum would have Picked out for a “two year old”with girls clothes but then they were all told to get in the car and they headed off once the jakes siblings were dropped off Heather asked Jake a favour

Jake then walked down to his room and took off his pink dress and then waited and when his mother came back she was holding a fairy costume like they have in the tinker bell cartoons

Thing or how cute he was and at eight o'clock he was told he needed to go home and go to bed knowing that he did not have Any say in this what so ever on his way back home he saw Ben and Miguel going as a pirate and a parrot and then passed Emma and Bella, Bella was a princess and Emma was dressed as Edward scissor hand like Jake was meant to dress up as This year

15511111111111.title: Beach antics

choices: Swap it away for a better one
155111111111112.content:
woke up he like clockwork and went to the nursery and got changed once again then he went to find Ben who was up sitting on his bed

“Hi Ben”

“Hi little brother”

“Ready to swap?”

“Ok so first I want to switch weights,second when I need to to avoid looking silly I want to be able to go back and forth between our heights”

“Because I have always hated having to dress up In all of those fancy dresses and look pretty mum is so particular about what I should wear”

“Ok fair enough reason I have a deal for you”

“What is it?”

“I have three swap tokens that I can use to swap things between us whenever I want and you can't say no to them”

“Ok that seems fair”

“Thanks”

Jake walked out of his room and accepted the fact that this was his life now so he walked up to his mum and asked if there was anything she wanted to do toady and then his mother said she would like to spend the day at the beach again but just with Jake and Jake thought why not he had nothing better to do so he went to his room and was helped into another swim suit and then talked to his brother about heights again and swapped so he was 2,5 and walked up to his mother

“I'm ready”

His mum got the same scarf like material and wrapped him against her chest and drove to the beach and made her way onto the sand and then just walked up and down the beach talking to Ben about how much he had helped her with his swaps and then got in the water with him like this and then went home and Jake was on his way to swap heights with his brother again when his phone rang and it was his girlfriend who was asking why she hadn't seen him or heard from him in ages and he replied that he was busy and just his luck he was asked to meet up after high school ended because he no longer was believed to be safe walking by himself

Regardless Jake swapped heights back with Ben and went to his room to ponder his new predicament he eventually concluded that he couldn't because he couldn't get his life back and he was starting to like his new life minus a few things so he decided to break up with his girlfriend and completely start fresh and felt a lot more stress free and ass Jake came to accept his life more it became a lot easier and fun as long as he tried to instead of thinking about how to change it

15512221.content:
Jake's bottom was dry, his bladder was empty and his thoughts weren't clear. When Ben asked to be treated like Jake including going to high school, all of Jake's intelligence had been sucked out of his head.

Jake decided to sit down and use the blocks to help him plan out what to do. He put them to create a rudimentary floor plan of the house. The blocks were no use at all, not that Jake knew that. He had to get out of here, find Ben and then swap back. He didn't like this being treated like a baby at all. Maybe he would swap again later, but twenty minutes of being locked up in a room was enough for him as he had the patience of a two year old.

With a plan worked out, he walked towards the door. But there was a baby gate in the way. He didn't know what to do. He could have unlocked the gate, but he didn't know how. He could have simply stepped over the gate, but that didn't occur to him. He could have pushed the gate out of the way, but for some reason he didn't seem to have the strength to do that. He was trapped.

What happens next?
